 149     // Local Intents - for app manager communication                                                     
 150     public static final String BANGLEJS_COMMAND_TX = "banglejs_command_tx";                              
 151     public static final String BANGLEJS_COMMAND_RX = "banglejs_command_rx";                              
 152     // Global Intents                                                                                    
 153     private static final String BANGLE_ACTION_UART_TX = "com.banglejs.uart.tx";                          
 154                                                                                                          
 155     public BangleJSDeviceSupport() {                                                                     
 156         super(LOG);                                                                                      
 157         addSupportedService(BangleJSConstants.UUID_SERVICE_NORDIC_UART);                                 
 158                                                                                                          
 159         registerLocalIntents();                                                                          
 160         registerGlobalIntents();                                                                         
 161     }                                                                                                    
 162                                                                                                          
 163     private void registerLocalIntents() {                                                                
 164         IntentFilter commandFilter = new IntentFilter();                                                 
 165         commandFilter.addAction(GBDevice.ACTION_DEVICE_CHANGED);                                         
 166         commandFilter.addAction(BANGLEJS_COMMAND_TX);                                                    
 167         BroadcastReceiver commandReceiver = new BroadcastReceiver() {                                    
 168             @Override                                                                                    
 169             public void onReceive(Context context, Intent intent) {                                      
 170                 switch (intent.getAction()) {                                                            
 171                     case BANGLEJS_COMMAND_TX: {                                                          
 172                         String data = String.valueOf(intent.getExtras().get("DATA"));                    
 173                         try {                                                                            
 174                             TransactionBuilder builder = performInitialized("TX");                       
 175                             uartTx(builder, data);                                                       
 176                             builder.queue(getQueue());                                                   
 177                         } catch (IOException e) {                                                        
 178                             GB.toast(getContext(), "Error in TX: " + e.getLocalizedMessage(), Toast.LENGT🔵
 179                         }                                                                                
 180                         break;                                                                           
 181                     }                                                                                    
 182                     case GBDevice.ACTION_DEVICE_CHANGED: {                                               
 183                         LOG.info("ACTION_DEVICE_CHANGED " + gbDevice.getStateString());                  
 184                         receiveHistory += "\n================================================\nACTION_DEV🔵
 185                     }                                                                                    
 186                 }                                                                                        
 187             }                                                                                            
 188         };                                                                                               
 189         LocalBroadcastManager.getInstance(GBApplication.getContext()).registerReceiver(commandReceiver, c🔵
 190     }                                                                                                    
 191                                                                                                          
 192     private void registerGlobalIntents() {                                                               
 193         IntentFilter commandFilter = new IntentFilter();                                                 
 194         commandFilter.addAction(BANGLE_ACTION_UART_TX);                                                  
 195         BroadcastReceiver commandReceiver = new BroadcastReceiver() {                                    
 196             @Override                                                                                    
 197             public void onReceive(Context context, Intent intent) {                                      
 198                 switch (intent.getAction()) {                                                            
 199                     case BANGLE_ACTION_UART_TX: {                                                        
 200                         /* In Tasker:                                                                    
 201                           Action: com.banglejs.uart.tx                                                   
 202                           Cat: None                                                                      
 203                           Extra: line:Terminal.println(%avariable)                                       
 204                           Target: Broadcast Receiver                                                     
 205                                                                                                          
 206                           Variable: Number, Configure on Import, NOT structured, Value set, Nothing Expor🔵
 207                          */                                                                              
 208                         Prefs devicePrefs = new Prefs(GBApplication.getDeviceSpecificSharedPrefs(gbDevice🔵
 209                         if (!devicePrefs.getBoolean(PREF_DEVICE_INTENTS, false)) return;                 
 210                         String data = intent.getStringExtra("line");                                     
 211                         if (data==null) {                                                                
 212                             GB.toast(getContext(), "UART TX Intent, but no 'line' supplied", Toast.LENGTH🔵
 213                             return;                                                                      
 214                         }                                                                                
 215                         if (!data.endsWith("\n")) data += "\n";                                          
 216                         try {                                                                            
 217                             TransactionBuilder builder = performInitialized("TX");                       
 218                             uartTx(builder, data);                                                       
 219                             builder.queue(getQueue());                                                   
 220                         } catch (IOException e) {                                                        
 221                             GB.toast(getContext(), "Error in TX: " + e.getLocalizedMessage(), Toast.LENGT🔵
 222                         }                                                                                
 223                         break;                                                                           
 224                     }                                                                                    
 225                 }                                                                                        
 226             }                                                                                            
 227         };                                                                                               
 228         GBApplication.getContext().registerReceiver(commandReceiver, commandFilter);                     
 229     }                                                                                                    
 230                                                                                                          
 231     @Override                                                                                            
 232     protected TransactionBuilder initializeDevice(TransactionBuilder builder) {                          
 233         LOG.info("Initializing");                                                                        
 234                                                                                                          
 235         gbDevice.setState(GBDevice.State.INITIALIZING);                                                  
 236         gbDevice.sendDeviceUpdateIntent(getContext());                                                   
 237         gbDevice.setBatteryThresholdPercent((short) 30);                                                 
 238                                                                                                          
 239         rxCharacteristic = getCharacteristic(BangleJSConstants.UUID_CHARACTERISTIC_NORDIC_UART_RX);      
 240         txCharacteristic = getCharacteristic(BangleJSConstants.UUID_CHARACTERISTIC_NORDIC_UART_TX);      
 241         builder.setGattCallback(this);                                                                   
 242         builder.notify(rxCharacteristic, true);                                                          
 243                                                                                                          
 244         Prefs devicePrefs = new Prefs(GBApplication.getDeviceSpecificSharedPrefs(gbDevice.getAddress()));
 245         allowHighMTU = devicePrefs.getBoolean(PREF_ALLOW_HIGH_MTU, false);                               
 246                                                                                                          
 247         uartTx(builder, " \u0003"); // clear active line                                                 
 248                                                                                                          
 249         Prefs prefs = GBApplication.getPrefs();                                                          
 250         if (prefs.getBoolean("datetime_synconconnect", true))                                            
 251           transmitTime(builder);                                                                         
 252         //sendSettings(builder);                                                                         
 253                                                                                                          
 254         // get version                                                                                   
 255                                                                                                          
 256         gbDevice.setState(GBDevice.State.INITIALIZED);                                                   
 257         gbDevice.sendDeviceUpdateIntent(getContext());                                                   
 258                                                                                                          
 259         getDevice().setFirmwareVersion("N/A");                                                           
 260         getDevice().setFirmwareVersion2("N/A");                                                          
 261                                                                                                          
 262         LOG.info("Initialization Done");                                                                 
 263                                                                                                          
 264         return builder;                                                                                  
 265     }                                                                                                    
 266                                                                                                          
 267     /// Write a string of data, and chunk it up                                                          
 268     private void uartTx(TransactionBuilder builder, String str) {                                        
 269         byte[] bytes = str.getBytes(StandardCharsets.ISO_8859_1);                                        
 270         LOG.info("UART TX: " + str);                                                                     
 271         // FIXME: somehow this is still giving us UTF8 data when we put images in strings. Maybe JSON.str🔵
 272         for (int i=0;i<bytes.length;i+=mtuSize) {                                                        
 273             int l = bytes.length-i;                                                                      
 274             if (l>mtuSize) l=mtuSize;                                                                    
 275             byte[] packet = new byte[l];                                                                 
 276             System.arraycopy(bytes, i, packet, 0, l);                                                    
 277             builder.write(txCharacteristic, packet);                                                     
 278         }                                                                                                
 279     }                                                                                                    
 280                                                                                                          
 281     /// Converts an object to a JSON string. see jsonToString                                            
 282     private String jsonToStringInternal(Object v) {                                                      
 283         if (v instanceof String) {                                                                       
 284             /* Convert a string, escaping chars we can't send over out UART connection */                
 285             String s = (String)v;                                                                        
 286             String json = "\"";                                                                          
 287             for (int i=0;i<s.length();i++) {                                                             
 288                 int ch = (int)s.charAt(i);                                                               
 289                 if (ch<8) json += "\\"+ch;                                                               
 290                 else if (ch==8) json += "\\b";                                                           
 291                 else if (ch==9) json += "\\t";                                                           
 292                 else if (ch==10) json += "\\n";                                                          
 293                 else if (ch==11) json += "\\v";                                                          
 294                 else if (ch==12) json += "\\f";                                                          
 295                 else if (ch==34) json += "\\\""; // quote                                                
 296                 else if (ch==92) json += "\\\\"; // slash                                                
 297                 else if (ch<32 || ch==26 || ch==27 || ch==127 || ch==173) json += "\\x"+Integer.toHexStri🔵
 298                 else json += s.charAt(i);                                                                
 299             }                                                                                            
 300             return json + "\"";                                                                          
 301         } else if (v instanceof JSONArray) {                                                             
 302             JSONArray a = (JSONArray)v;                                                                  
 303             String json = "[";                                                                           
 304             for (int i=0;i<a.length();i++) {                                                             
 305                 if (i>0) json += ",";                                                                    
 306                 Object o = null;                                                                         
 307                 try {                                                                                    
 308                     o = a.get(i);                                                                        
 309                 } catch (JSONException e) {                                                              
 310                     LOG.warn("jsonToString array error: " + e.getLocalizedMessage());                    
 311                 }                                                                                        
 312                 json += jsonToStringInternal(o);                                                         
 313             }                                                                                            
 314             return json+"]";                                                                             
 315         } else if (v instanceof JSONObject) {                                                            
 316             JSONObject obj = (JSONObject)v;                                                              
 317             String json = "{";                                                                           
 318             Iterator<String> iter = obj.keys();                                                          
 319             while (iter.hasNext()) {                                                                     
 320                 String key = iter.next();                                                                
 321                 Object o = null;                                                                         
 322                 try {                                                                                    
 323                     o = obj.get(key);                                                                    
 324                 } catch (JSONException e) {                                                              
 325                     LOG.warn("jsonToString object error: " + e.getLocalizedMessage());                   
 326                 }                                                                                        
 327                 json += key+":"+jsonToStringInternal(o);                                                 
 328                 if (iter.hasNext()) json+=",";                                                           
 329             }                                                                                            
 330             return json+"}";                                                                             
 331         } // else int/double/null                                                                        
 332         return v.toString();                                                                             
 333     }                                                                                                    
 334                                                                                                          
 335     /// Convert a JSON object to a JSON String (NOT 100% JSON compliant)                                 
 336     public String jsonToString(JSONObject jsonObj) {                                                     
 337         /* jsonObj.toString() works but breaks char codes>128 (encodes as UTF8?) and also uses           
 338         \u0000 when just \0 would do (and so on).                                                        
 339                                                                                                          
 340         So we do it manually, which can be more compact anyway.                                          
 341         This is JSON-ish, so not exactly as per JSON1 spec but good enough for Espruino.                 
 342         */                                                                                               
 343         return jsonToStringInternal(jsonObj);                                                            
 344     }                                                                                                    
 345                                                                                                          
 346     /// Write a JSON object of data                                                                      
 347     private void uartTxJSON(String taskName, JSONObject json) {                                          
 348         try {                                                                                            
 349             TransactionBuilder builder = performInitialized(taskName);                                   
 350             uartTx(builder, "\u0010GB("+jsonToString(json)+")\n");                                       
 351             builder.queue(getQueue());                                                                   
 352         } catch (IOException e) {                                                                        
 353             GB.toast(getContext(), "Error in "+taskName+": " + e.getLocalizedMessage(), Toast.LENGTH_LONG🔵
 354         }                                                                                                
 355     }                                                                                                    
 356                                                                                                          
 357     /// Write JSON object of the form {t:taskName, err:message}                                          
 358                                                                                                          
 359     private void uartTxJSONError(String taskName, String message) {                                      
 360         uartTxJSONError(taskName,message,null);                                                          
 361     }                                                                                                    
 362                                                                                                          
 363     private void uartTxJSONError(String taskName, String message,String id) {                            
 364         JSONObject o = new JSONObject();                                                                 
 365         try {                                                                                            
 366             o.put("t", taskName);                                                                        
 367             if( id!=null)                                                                                
 368                 o.put("id", id);                                                                         
 369             o.put("err", message);                                                                       
 370         } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                      
 371             GB.toast(getContext(), "uartTxJSONError: " + e.getLocalizedMessage(), Toast.LENGTH_LONG, GB.E🔵
 372         }                                                                                                
 373         uartTxJSON(taskName, o);                                                                         
 374     }                                                                                                    
 375                                                                                                          
 376                                                                                                          
 377                                                                                                          
 378     private void handleUartRxLine(String line) {                                                         
 379         LOG.info("UART RX LINE: " + line);                                                               
 380         if (line.length()==0) return;                                                                    
 381         if (">Uncaught ReferenceError: \"GB\" is not defined".equals(line))                              
 382           GB.toast(getContext(), "Gadgetbridge plugin not installed on Bangle.js", Toast.LENGTH_LONG, GB.🔵
 383         else if (line.charAt(0)=='{') {                                                                  
 384             // JSON - we hope!                                                                           
 385             try {                                                                                        
 386                 JSONObject json = new JSONObject(line);                                                  
 387                 LOG.info("UART RX JSON parsed successfully");                                            
 388                 handleUartRxJSON(json);                                                                  
 389             } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                  
 390                 LOG.info("UART RX JSON parse failure: "+ e.getLocalizedMessage());                       
 391                 GB.toast(getContext(), "Malformed JSON from Bangle.js: " + e.getLocalizedMessage(), Toast🔵
 392             }                                                                                            
 393         } else {                                                                                         
 394             LOG.info("UART RX line started with "+(int)line.charAt(0)+" - ignoring");                    
 395         }                                                                                                
 396     }                                                                                                    
 397                                                                                                          
 398     private void handleUartRxJSON(JSONObject json) throws JSONException {                                
 399         String packetType = json.getString("t");                                                         
 400         switch (packetType) {                                                                            
 401             case "info":                                                                                 
 402                 GB.toast(getContext(), "Bangle.js: " + json.getString("msg"), Toast.LENGTH_LONG, GB.INFO)🔵
 403                 break;                                                                                   
 404             case "warn":                                                                                 
 405                 GB.toast(getContext(), "Bangle.js: " + json.getString("msg"), Toast.LENGTH_LONG, GB.WARN)🔵
 406                 break;                                                                                   
 407             case "error":                                                                                
 408                 GB.toast(getContext(), "Bangle.js: " + json.getString("msg"), Toast.LENGTH_LONG, GB.ERROR🔵
 409                 break;                                                                                   
 410             case "ver": {                                                                                
 411                 if (json.has("fw1"))                                                                     
 412                     getDevice().setFirmwareVersion(json.getString("fw1"));                               
 413                 if (json.has("fw2"))                                                                     
 414                     getDevice().setFirmwareVersion2(json.getString("fw2"));                              
 415             } break;                                                                                     
 416             case "status": {                                                                             
 417                 GBDeviceEventBatteryInfo batteryInfo = new GBDeviceEventBatteryInfo();                   
 418                 if (json.has("bat")) {                                                                   
 419                     int b = json.getInt("bat");                                                          
 420                     if (b < 0) b = 0;                                                                    
 421                     if (b > 100) b = 100;                                                                
 422                     batteryInfo.level = b;                                                               
 423                     batteryInfo.state = BatteryState.BATTERY_NORMAL;                                     
 424                 }                                                                                        
 425                 if (json.has("chg") && json.getInt("chg") == 1) {                                        
 426                     batteryInfo.state = BatteryState.BATTERY_CHARGING;                                   
 427                 }                                                                                        
 428                 if (json.has("volt"))                                                                    
 429                     batteryInfo.voltage = (float) json.getDouble("volt");                                
 430                 handleGBDeviceEvent(batteryInfo);                                                        
 431             } break;                                                                                     
 432             case "findPhone": {                                                                          
 433                 boolean start = json.has("n") && json.getBoolean("n");                                   
 434                 GBDeviceEventFindPhone deviceEventFindPhone = new GBDeviceEventFindPhone();              
 435                 deviceEventFindPhone.event = start ? GBDeviceEventFindPhone.Event.START : GBDeviceEventFi🔵
 436                 evaluateGBDeviceEvent(deviceEventFindPhone);                                             
 437             } break;                                                                                     
 438             case "music": {                                                                              
 439                 GBDeviceEventMusicControl deviceEventMusicControl = new GBDeviceEventMusicControl();     
 440                 deviceEventMusicControl.event = GBDeviceEventMusicControl.Event.valueOf(json.getString("n🔵
 441                 evaluateGBDeviceEvent(deviceEventMusicControl);                                          
 442             } break;                                                                                     
 443             case "call": {                                                                               
 444                 GBDeviceEventCallControl deviceEventCallControl = new GBDeviceEventCallControl();        
 445                 deviceEventCallControl.event = GBDeviceEventCallControl.Event.valueOf(json.getString("n")🔵
 446                 evaluateGBDeviceEvent(deviceEventCallControl);                                           
 447             } break;                                                                                     
 448             case "notify" : {                                                                            
 449                 GBDeviceEventNotificationControl deviceEvtNotificationControl = new GBDeviceEventNotifica🔵
 450                 // .title appears unused                                                                 
 451                 deviceEvtNotificationControl.event = GBDeviceEventNotificationControl.Event.valueOf(json.🔵
 452                 if (json.has("id"))                                                                      
 453                     deviceEvtNotificationControl.handle = json.getInt("id");                             
 454                 if (json.has("tel"))                                                                     
 455                     deviceEvtNotificationControl.phoneNumber = json.getString("tel");                    
 456                 if (json.has("msg"))                                                                     
 457                     deviceEvtNotificationControl.reply = json.getString("msg");                          
 458                 /* REPLY responses don't use the ID from the event (MUTE/etc seem to), but instead       
 459                 * they use a handle that was provided in an action list on the onNotification.. event  */
 460                 if (deviceEvtNotificationControl.event == GBDeviceEventNotificationControl.Event.REPLY) {
 461                     Long foundHandle = (Long)mNotificationReplyAction.lookup((int)deviceEvtNotificationCo🔵
 462                     if (foundHandle!=null)                                                               
 463                         deviceEvtNotificationControl.handle = foundHandle;                               
 464                 }                                                                                        
 465                 evaluateGBDeviceEvent(deviceEvtNotificationControl);                                     
 466             } break;                                                                                     
 467             case "act": {                                                                                
 468                 BangleJSActivitySample sample = new BangleJSActivitySample();                            
 469                 sample.setTimestamp((int) (GregorianCalendar.getInstance().getTimeInMillis() / 1000L));  
 470                 int hrm = 0;                                                                             
 471                 int steps = 0;                                                                           
 472                 if (json.has("hrm")) hrm = json.getInt("hrm");                                           
 473                 if (json.has("stp")) steps = json.getInt("stp");                                         
 474                 int activity = BangleJSSampleProvider.TYPE_ACTIVITY;                                     
 475                 /*if (json.has("act")) {                                                                 
 476                     String actName = "TYPE_" + json.getString("act").toUpperCase();                      
 477                     try {                                                                                
 478                         Field f = ActivityKind.class.getField(actName);                                  
 479                         try {                                                                            
 480                             activity = f.getInt(null);                                                   
 481                         } catch (IllegalAccessException e) {                                             
 482                             LOG.info("JSON activity '"+actName+"' not readable");                        
 483                         }                                                                                
 484                     } catch (NoSuchFieldException e) {                                                   
 485                         LOG.info("JSON activity '"+actName+"' not found");                               
 486                     }                                                                                    
 487                 }*/                                                                                      
 488                 sample.setRawKind(activity);                                                             
 489                 sample.setHeartRate(hrm);                                                                
 490                 sample.setSteps(steps);                                                                  
 491                 try (DBHandler dbHandler = GBApplication.acquireDB()) {                                  
 492                     Long userId = getUser(dbHandler.getDaoSession()).getId();                            
 493                     Long deviceId = DBHelper.getDevice(getDevice(), dbHandler.getDaoSession()).getId();  
 494                     BangleJSSampleProvider provider = new BangleJSSampleProvider(getDevice(), dbHandler.g🔵
 495                     sample.setDeviceId(deviceId);                                                        
 496                     sample.setUserId(userId);                                                            
 497                     provider.addGBActivitySample(sample);                                                
 498                 } catch (Exception ex) {                                                                 
 499                     LOG.warn("Error saving activity: " + ex.getLocalizedMessage());                      
 500                 }                                                                                        
 501                 // push realtime data                                                                    
 502                 if (realtimeHRM || realtimeStep) {                                                       
 503                     Intent intent = new Intent(DeviceService.ACTION_REALTIME_SAMPLES)                    
 504                             .putExtra(DeviceService.EXTRA_REALTIME_SAMPLE, sample);                      
 505                     LocalBroadcastManager.getInstance(getContext()).sendBroadcast(intent);               
 506                 }                                                                                        
 507             } break;                                                                                     
 508             case "http": {                                                                               
 509                 Prefs devicePrefs = new Prefs(GBApplication.getDeviceSpecificSharedPrefs(gbDevice.getAddr🔵
 510                 String _id=null;                                                                         
 511                 try {                                                                                    
 512                     _id = json.getString("id");                                                          
 513                 } catch (JSONException e) {                                                              
 514                 }                                                                                        
 515                 final String id = _id;                                                                   
 516                                                                                                          
 517                                                                                                          
 518                 if (BuildConfig.INTERNET_ACCESS && devicePrefs.getBoolean(PREF_DEVICE_INTERNET_ACCESS, fa🔵
 519                     RequestQueue queue = Volley.newRequestQueue(getContext());                           
 520                     String url = json.getString("url");                                                  
 521                                                                                                          
 522                     String _xmlPath = "";                                                                
 523                     try {                                                                                
 524                         _xmlPath = json.getString("xpath");                                              
 525                     } catch (JSONException e) {                                                          
 526                     }                                                                                    
 527                     final String xmlPath = _xmlPath;                                                     
 528                     // Request a string response from the provided URL.                                  
 529                     StringRequest stringRequest = new StringRequest(Request.Method.GET, url,             
 530                             new Response.Listener<String>() {                                            
 531                                 @Override                                                                
 532                                 public void onResponse(String response) {                                
 533                                     JSONObject o = new JSONObject();                                     
 534                                     if (xmlPath.length() != 0) {                                         
 535                                         try {                                                            
 536                                             InputSource inputXML = new InputSource(new StringReader(respo🔵
 537                                             XPath xPath = XPathFactory.newInstance().newXPath();         
 538                                             response = xPath.evaluate(xmlPath, inputXML);                
 539                                         } catch (Exception error) {                                      
 540                                             uartTxJSONError("http", error.toString(),id);                
 541                                             return;                                                      
 542                                         }                                                                
 543                                     }                                                                    
 544                                     try {                                                                
 545                                         o.put("t", "http");                                              
 546                                         if( id!=null)                                                    
 547                                             o.put("id", id);                                             
 548                                         o.put("resp", response);                                         
 549                                     } catch (JSONException e) {                                          
 550                                         GB.toast(getContext(), "HTTP: " + e.getLocalizedMessage(), Toast.🔵
 551                                     }                                                                    
 552                                     uartTxJSON("http", o);                                               
 553                                 }                                                                        
 554                             }, new Response.ErrorListener() {                                            
 555                         @Override                                                                        
 556                         public void onErrorResponse(VolleyError error) {                                 
 557                             JSONObject o = new JSONObject();                                             
 558                             uartTxJSONError("http", error.toString(),id);                                
 559                         }                                                                                
 560                     });                                                                                  
 561                     queue.add(stringRequest);                                                            
 562                 } else {                                                                                 
 563                     if (BuildConfig.INTERNET_ACCESS)                                                     
 564                         uartTxJSONError("http", "Internet access not enabled, check Gadgetbridge Device S🔵
 565                     else                                                                                 
 566                         uartTxJSONError("http", "Internet access not enabled in this Gadgetbridge build",🔵
 567                 }                                                                                        
 568             } break;                                                                                     
 569             case "intent": {                                                                             
 570                 Prefs devicePrefs = new Prefs(GBApplication.getDeviceSpecificSharedPrefs(gbDevice.getAddr🔵
 571                 if (devicePrefs.getBoolean(PREF_DEVICE_INTENTS, false)) {                                
 572                     String action = json.getString("action");                                            
 573                     JSONObject extra = json.getJSONObject("extra");                                      
 574                     Intent in = new Intent();                                                            
 575                     in.setAction(action);                                                                
 576                     if (extra != null) {                                                                 
 577                         Iterator<String> iter = extra.keys();                                            
 578                         while (iter.hasNext()) {                                                         
 579                             String key = iter.next();                                                    
 580                             in.putExtra(key, extra.getString(key));                                      
 581                         }                                                                                
 582                     }                                                                                    
 583                     LOG.info("Sending intent " + action);                                                
 584                     this.getContext().getApplicationContext().sendBroadcast(in);                         
 585                 } else {                                                                                 
 586                     uartTxJSONError("intent", "Android Intents not enabled, check Gadgetbridge Device Set🔵
 587                 }                                                                                        
 588             }                                                                                            
 589             default : {                                                                                  
 590                 LOG.info("UART RX JSON packet type '"+packetType+"' not understood.");                   
 591             }                                                                                            
 592         }                                                                                                
 593     }                                                                                                    
 594                                                                                                          
 595     @Override                                                                                            
 596     public boolean onCharacteristicChanged(BluetoothGatt gatt,                                           
 597                                            BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic) {                 
 598         if (super.onCharacteristicChanged(gatt, characteristic)) {                                       
 599             return true;                                                                                 
 600         }                                                                                                
 601         if (BangleJSConstants.UUID_CHARACTERISTIC_NORDIC_UART_RX.equals(characteristic.getUuid())) {     
 602             byte[] chars = characteristic.getValue();                                                    
 603             // check to see if we get more data - if so, increase out MTU for sending                    
 604             if (allowHighMTU && chars.length > mtuSize)                                                  
 605                 mtuSize = chars.length;                                                                  
 606             String packetStr = new String(chars);                                                        
 607             LOG.info("RX: " + packetStr);                                                                
 608             // logging                                                                                   
 609             receiveHistory += packetStr;                                                                 
 610             if (receiveHistory.length() > MAX_RECEIVE_HISTORY_CHARS)                                     
 611                 receiveHistory = receiveHistory.substring(receiveHistory.length() - MAX_RECEIVE_HISTORY_C🔵
 612             // split into input lines                                                                    
 613             receivedLine += packetStr;                                                                   
 614             while (receivedLine.contains("\n")) {                                                        
 615                 int p = receivedLine.indexOf("\n");                                                      
 616                 String line =  receivedLine.substring(0,p-1);                                            
 617                 receivedLine = receivedLine.substring(p+1);                                              
 618                 handleUartRxLine(line);                                                                  
 619             }                                                                                            
 620             // Send an intent with new data                                                              
 621             Intent intent = new Intent(BangleJSDeviceSupport.BANGLEJS_COMMAND_RX);                       
 622             intent.putExtra("DATA", packetStr);                                                          
 623             intent.putExtra("SEQ", bangleCommandSeq++);                                                  
 624             LocalBroadcastManager.getInstance(getContext()).sendBroadcast(intent);                       
 625         }                                                                                                
 626         return false;                                                                                    
 627     }                                                                                                    
 628                                                                                                          
 629                                                                                                          
 630     void transmitTime(TransactionBuilder builder) {                                                      
 631       long ts = System.currentTimeMillis();                                                              
 632       float tz = SimpleTimeZone.getDefault().getOffset(ts) / (1000 * 60 * 60.0f);                        
 633       // set time                                                                                        
 634       String cmd = "\u0010setTime("+(ts/1000)+");";                                                      
 635       // set timezone                                                                                    
 636       cmd += "E.setTimeZone("+tz+");";                                                                   
 637       // write timezone to settings                                                                      
 638       cmd += "(s=>{s&&(s.timezone="+tz+")&&require('Storage').write('setting.json',s);})(require('Storage🔵
 639       uartTx(builder, cmd+"\n");                                                                         
 640     }                                                                                                    
 641                                                                                                          
 642     @Override                                                                                            
 643     public boolean useAutoConnect() {                                                                    
 644         return true;                                                                                     
 645     }                                                                                                    
 646                                                                                                          
 647     private String renderUnicodeWordAsImage(String word) {                                               
 648         // check for emoji                                                                               
 649         boolean hasEmoji = false;                                                                        
 650         if (EmojiUtils.getAllEmojis()==null)                                                             
 651             EmojiManager.initEmojiData(GBApplication.getContext());                                      
 652         for(Emoji emoji : EmojiUtils.getAllEmojis())                                                     
 653             if (word.contains(emoji.getEmoji())) hasEmoji = true;                                        
 654         // if we had emoji, ensure we create 3 bit color (not 1 bit B&W)                                 
 655         return "\0"+bitmapToEspruinoString(textToBitmap(word), hasEmoji ? BangleJSBitmapStyle.RGB_3BPP : 🔵
 656     }                                                                                                    
 657                                                                                                          
 658     public String renderUnicodeAsImage(String txt) {                                                     
 659         if (txt==null) return null;                                                                      
 660         /* If we're not doing conversion, pass this right back (we use the EmojiConverter                
 661         As we would have done if BangleJSCoordinator.supportsUnicodeEmojis had reported false */         
 662         Prefs devicePrefs = new Prefs(GBApplication.getDeviceSpecificSharedPrefs(gbDevice.getAddress()));
 663         if (!devicePrefs.getBoolean(PREF_BANGLEJS_TEXT_BITMAP, false))                                   
 664             return EmojiConverter.convertUnicodeEmojiToAscii(txt, GBApplication.getContext());           
 665          // Otherwise split up and check each word                                                       
 666         String word = "", result = "";                                                                   
 667         boolean needsTranslate = false;                                                                  
 668         for (int i=0;i<txt.length();i++) {                                                               
 669             char ch = txt.charAt(i);                                                                     
 670             if (" -_/:.,?!'\"&*()".indexOf(ch)>=0) {                                                     
 671                 // word split                                                                            
 672                 if (needsTranslate) { // convert word                                                    
 673                     result += renderUnicodeWordAsImage(word)+ch;                                         
 674                 } else { // or just copy across                                                          
 675                     result += word+ch;                                                                   
 676                 }                                                                                        
 677                 word = "";                                                                               
 678                 needsTranslate = false;                                                                  
 679             } else {                                                                                     
 680                 // TODO: better check?                                                                   
 681                 if (ch<0 || ch>255) needsTranslate = true;                                               
 682                 word += ch;                                                                              
 683             }                                                                                            
 684         }                                                                                                
 685         if (needsTranslate) { // convert word                                                            
 686             result += renderUnicodeWordAsImage(word);                                                    
 687         } else { // or just copy across                                                                  
 688             result += word;                                                                              
 689         }                                                                                                
 690         return result;                                                                                   
 691     }                                                                                                    
 692                                                                                                          
 693     @Override                                                                                            
 694     public void onNotification(NotificationSpec notificationSpec) {                                      
 695         for (int i=0;i<notificationSpec.attachedActions.size();i++) {                                    
 696             NotificationSpec.Action action = notificationSpec.attachedActions.get(i);                    
 697             if (action.type==NotificationSpec.Action.TYPE_WEARABLE_REPLY)                                
 698                 mNotificationReplyAction.add(notificationSpec.getId(), new Long(((long)notificationSpec.g🔵
 699         }                                                                                                
 700         try {                                                                                            
 701             JSONObject o = new JSONObject();                                                             
 702             o.put("t", "notify");                                                                        
 703             o.put("id", notificationSpec.getId());                                                       
 704             o.put("src", notificationSpec.sourceName);                                                   
 705             o.put("title", renderUnicodeAsImage(notificationSpec.title));                                
 706             o.put("subject", renderUnicodeAsImage(notificationSpec.subject));                            
 707             o.put("body", renderUnicodeAsImage(notificationSpec.body));                                  
 708             o.put("sender", renderUnicodeAsImage(notificationSpec.sender));                              
 709             o.put("tel", notificationSpec.phoneNumber);                                                  
 710             uartTxJSON("onNotification", o);                                                             
 711         } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                      
 712             LOG.info("JSONException: " + e.getLocalizedMessage());                                       
 713         }                                                                                                
 714     }                                                                                                    
 715                                                                                                          
 716     @Override                                                                                            
 717     public void onDeleteNotification(int id) {                                                           
 718         try {                                                                                            
 719             JSONObject o = new JSONObject();                                                             
 720             o.put("t", "notify-");                                                                       
 721             o.put("id", id);                                                                             
 722             uartTxJSON("onDeleteNotification", o);                                                       
 723         } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                      
 724             LOG.info("JSONException: " + e.getLocalizedMessage());                                       
 725         }                                                                                                
 726     }                                                                                                    
 727                                                                                                          
 728     @Override                                                                                            
 729     public void onSetTime() {                                                                            
 730         try {                                                                                            
 731             TransactionBuilder builder = performInitialized("setTime");                                  
 732             transmitTime(builder);                                                                       
 733             builder.queue(getQueue());                                                                   
 734         } catch (Exception e) {                                                                          
 735             GB.toast(getContext(), "Error setting time: " + e.getLocalizedMessage(), Toast.LENGTH_LONG, G🔵
 736         }                                                                                                
 737     }                                                                                                    
 738                                                                                                          
 739     @Override                                                                                            
 740     public void onSetAlarms(ArrayList<? extends Alarm> alarms) {                                         
 741         try {                                                                                            
 742             JSONObject o = new JSONObject();                                                             
 743             o.put("t", "alarm");                                                                         
 744             JSONArray jsonalarms = new JSONArray();                                                      
 745             o.put("d", jsonalarms);                                                                      
 746                                                                                                          
 747             for (Alarm alarm : alarms) {                                                                 
 748                 if (!alarm.getEnabled()) continue;                                                       
 749                 JSONObject jsonalarm = new JSONObject();                                                 
 750                 jsonalarms.put(jsonalarm);                                                               
 751                                                                                                          
 752                 Calendar calendar = AlarmUtils.toCalendar(alarm);                                        
 753                                                                                                          
 754                 jsonalarm.put("h", alarm.getHour());                                                     
 755                 jsonalarm.put("m", alarm.getMinute());                                                   
 756                 jsonalarm.put("rep", alarm.getRepetition());                                             
 757             }                                                                                            
 758             uartTxJSON("onSetAlarms", o);                                                                
 759         } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                      
 760             LOG.info("JSONException: " + e.getLocalizedMessage());                                       
 761         }                                                                                                
 762     }                                                                                                    
 763                                                                                                          
 764     @Override                                                                                            
 765     public void onSetCallState(CallSpec callSpec) {                                                      
 766         try {                                                                                            
 767             JSONObject o = new JSONObject();                                                             
 768             o.put("t", "call");                                                                          
 769             String cmdName = "";                                                                         
 770             try {                                                                                        
 771                 Field fields[] = callSpec.getClass().getDeclaredFields();                                
 772                 for (Field field : fields)                                                               
 773                     if (field.getName().startsWith("CALL_") && field.getInt(callSpec) == callSpec.command🔵
 774                         cmdName = field.getName().substring(5).toLowerCase();                            
 775             } catch (IllegalAccessException e) {}                                                        
 776             o.put("cmd", cmdName);                                                                       
 777             o.put("name", renderUnicodeAsImage(callSpec.name));                                          
 778             o.put("number", callSpec.number);                                                            
 779             uartTxJSON("onSetCallState", o);                                                             
 780         } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                      
 781             LOG.info("JSONException: " + e.getLocalizedMessage());                                       
 782         }                                                                                                
 783 }                                                                                                        
 784                                                                                                          
 785     @Override                                                                                            
 786     public void onSetCannedMessages(CannedMessagesSpec cannedMessagesSpec) {                             
 787                                                                                                          
 788     }                                                                                                    
 789                                                                                                          
 790     @Override                                                                                            
 791     public void onSetMusicState(MusicStateSpec stateSpec) {                                              
 792         try {                                                                                            
 793             JSONObject o = new JSONObject();                                                             
 794             o.put("t", "musicstate");                                                                    
 795             int musicState = stateSpec.state;                                                            
 796             String[] musicStates = {"play", "pause", "stop", ""};                                        
 797             if (musicState<0) musicState=3;                                                              
 798             if (musicState>=musicStates.length) musicState = musicStates.length-1;                       
 799             o.put("state", musicStates[musicState]);                                                     
 800             o.put("position", stateSpec.position);                                                       
 801             o.put("shuffle", stateSpec.shuffle);                                                         
 802             o.put("repeat", stateSpec.repeat);                                                           
 803             uartTxJSON("onSetMusicState", o);                                                            
 804         } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                      
 805             LOG.info("JSONException: " + e.getLocalizedMessage());                                       
 806         }                                                                                                
 807     }                                                                                                    
 808                                                                                                          
 809     @Override                                                                                            
 810     public void onSetMusicInfo(MusicSpec musicSpec) {                                                    
 811         try {                                                                                            
 812             JSONObject o = new JSONObject();                                                             
 813             o.put("t", "musicinfo");                                                                     
 814             o.put("artist", renderUnicodeAsImage(musicSpec.artist));                                     
 815             o.put("album", renderUnicodeAsImage(musicSpec.album));                                       
 816             o.put("track", renderUnicodeAsImage(musicSpec.track));                                       
 817             o.put("dur", musicSpec.duration);                                                            
 818             o.put("c", musicSpec.trackCount);                                                            
 819             o.put("n", musicSpec.trackNr);                                                               
 820             uartTxJSON("onSetMusicInfo", o);                                                             
 821         } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                      
 822             LOG.info("JSONException: " + e.getLocalizedMessage());                                       
 823         }                                                                                                
 824     }                                                                                                    
 825                                                                                                          
 826     private void transmitActivityStatus() {                                                              
 827         try {                                                                                            
 828             JSONObject o = new JSONObject();                                                             
 829             o.put("t", "act");                                                                           
 830             o.put("hrm", realtimeHRM);                                                                   
 831             o.put("stp", realtimeStep);                                                                  
 832             o.put("int", realtimeHRMInterval);                                                           
 833             uartTxJSON("onEnableRealtimeSteps", o);                                                      
 834         } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                      
 835             LOG.info("JSONException: " + e.getLocalizedMessage());                                       
 836         }                                                                                                
 837     }                                                                                                    
 838                                                                                                          
 839     @Override                                                                                            
 840     public void onEnableRealtimeSteps(boolean enable) {                                                  
 841         if (enable == realtimeHRM) return;                                                               
 842         realtimeStep = enable;                                                                           
 843         transmitActivityStatus();                                                                        
 844     }
