 875                                                                                                          
 876     @Override                                                                                            
 877     public void onFetchRecordedData(int dataTypes) {                                                     
 878         if (dataTypes == RecordedDataTypes.TYPE_DEBUGLOGS) {                                             
 879             File dir;                                                                                    
 880             try {                                                                                        
 881                 dir = FileUtils.getExternalFilesDir();                                                   
 882             } catch (IOException e) {                                                                    
 883                 return;                                                                                  
 884             }                                                                                            
 885             SimpleDateFormat dateFormat = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyyMMdd-HHmmss", Locale.US);            
 886             String filename = "banglejs_debug_" + dateFormat.format(new Date()) + ".log";                
 887             File outputFile = new File(dir, filename );                                                  
 888             LOG.warn("Writing log to "+outputFile.toString());                                           
 889             try {                                                                                        
 890                 BufferedWriter writer = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(outputFile));                  
 891                 writer.write(receiveHistory);                                                            
 892                 writer.close();                                                                          
 893                 receiveHistory = "";                                                                     
 894                 GB.toast(getContext(), "Log written to "+filename, Toast.LENGTH_LONG, GB.INFO);          
 895             } catch (IOException e) {                                                                    
 896                 LOG.warn("Could not write to file", e);                                                  
 897                 return;                                                                                  
 898             }                                                                                            
 899         }                                                                                                
 900     }

 904                                                                                                          
 905     }

 913     public void onEnableRealtimeHeartRateMeasurement(boolean enable) {                                   
 914         if (enable == realtimeHRM) return;                                                               
 915         realtimeHRM = enable;                                                                            
 916         transmitActivityStatus();                                                                        
 917     }

 926         } catch (JSONException e) {

 928         }                                                                                                
 929     }

 956         transmitActivityStatus();                                                                        
 957     }

 959     @Override                                                                                            
 960     public void onAddCalendarEvent(CalendarEventSpec calendarEventSpec) {                                
 961                                                                                                          
 962     }                                                                                                    
 963                                                                                                          
 964     @Override                                                                                            
 965     public void onDeleteCalendarEvent(byte type, long id) {                                              
 966                                                                                                          
 967     }                                                                                                    
 968                                                                                                          
 969     @Override                                                                                            
 970     public void onSendConfiguration(String config) {                                                     
 971                                                                                                          
 972     }                                                                                                    
 973                                                                                                          
 974     @Override                                                                                            
 975     public void onReadConfiguration(String config) {                                                     
 976                                                                                                          
 977     }                                                                                                    
 978                                                                                                          
 979     @Override                                                                                            
 980     public void onTestNewFunction() {                                                                    
 981                                                                                                          
 982     }                                                                                                    
 983                                                                                                          
 984     @Override                                                                                            
 985     public void onSendWeather(WeatherSpec weatherSpec) {                                                 
 986         try {                                                                                            
 987             JSONObject o = new JSONObject();                                                             
 988             o.put("t", "weather");                                                                       
 989             o.put("temp", weatherSpec.currentTemp);                                                      
 990             o.put("hum", weatherSpec.currentHumidity);                                                   
 991             o.put("code", weatherSpec.currentConditionCode);                                             
 992             o.put("txt", weatherSpec.currentCondition);                                                  
 993             o.put("wind", weatherSpec.windSpeed);                                                        
 994             o.put("wdir", weatherSpec.windDirection);                                                    
 995             o.put("loc", weatherSpec.location);                                                          
 996             uartTxJSON("onSendWeather", o);                                                              
 997         } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                      
 998             LOG.info("JSONException: " + e.getLocalizedMessage());                                       
 999         }                                                                                                
1000     }                                                                                                    
1001                                                                                                          
1002     public Bitmap textToBitmap(String text) {                                                            
1003         Paint paint = new Paint(0); // Paint.ANTI_ALIAS_FLAG not wanted as 1bpp                          
1004         paint.setTextSize(18);                                                                           
1005         paint.setColor(0xFFFFFFFF);                                                                      
1006         paint.setTextAlign(Paint.Align.LEFT);                                                            
1007         float baseline = -paint.ascent(); // ascent() is negative                                        
1008         int width = (int) (paint.measureText(text) + 0.5f); // round                                     
1009         int height = (int) (baseline + paint.descent() + 0.5f);                                          
1010         Bitmap image = Bitmap.createBitmap(width, height, Bitmap.Config.ARGB_8888);                      
1011         Canvas canvas = new Canvas(image);                                                               
1012         canvas.drawText(text, 0, baseline, paint);                                                       
1013         return image;                                                                                    
1014     }                                                                                                    
1015                                                                                                          
1016     public enum BangleJSBitmapStyle {                                                                    
1017         MONOCHROME,                                                                                      
1018         RGB_3BPP                                                                                         
1019     };                                                                                                   
1020                                                                                                          
1021     /** Used for writing single bits to an array */                                                      
1022     public static class BitWriter {                                                                      
1023         int n;                                                                                           
1024         byte[] bits;                                                                                     
1025         int currentByte, bitIdx;                                                                         
1026                                                                                                          
1027         public BitWriter(byte[] array, int offset) {                                                     
1028             bits = array;                                                                                
1029             n = offset;                                                                                  
1030         }                                                                                                
1031                                                                                                          
1032         public void push(boolean v) {                                                                    
1033             currentByte = (currentByte << 1) | (v?1:0);                                                  
1034             bitIdx++;                                                                                    
1035             if (bitIdx == 8) {                                                                           
1036                 bits[n++] = (byte)currentByte;                                                           
1037                 bitIdx = 0;                                                                              
1038                 currentByte = 0;                                                                         
1039             }                                                                                            
1040         }                                                                                                
1041                                                                                                          
1042         public void finish() {                                                                           
1043             if (bitIdx > 0) bits[n++] = (byte)currentByte;                                               
1044         }                                                                                                
1045     }                                                                                                    
1046                                                                                                          
1047     /** Convert an Android bitmap to a base64 string for use in Espruino.                                
1048      * Currently only 1bpp, no scaling */                                                                
1049     public static byte[] bitmapToEspruinoArray(Bitmap bitmap, BangleJSBitmapStyle style) {               
1050         int width = bitmap.getWidth();                                                                   
1051         int height = bitmap.getHeight();                                                                 
1052         int bpp = (style==BangleJSBitmapStyle.RGB_3BPP) ? 3 : 1;                                         
1053         byte pixels[] = new byte[width * height];                                                        
1054         final byte PIXELCOL_TRANSPARENT = -1;                                                            
1055         final int ditherMatrix[] = {1*16,5*16,7*16,3*16}; // for bayer dithering                         
1056         // if doing 3bpp, check image to see if it's transparent                                         
1057         boolean allowTransparency = (style != BangleJSBitmapStyle.MONOCHROME);                           
1058         boolean isTransparent = false;                                                                   
1059         byte transparentColorIndex = 0;                                                                  
1060         /* Work out what colour index each pixel should be and write to pixels.                          
1061          Also figure out if we're transparent at all, and how often each color is used */                
1062         int colUsage[] = new int[8];                                                                     
1063         int n = 0;                                                                                       
1064         for (int y = 0; y < height; y++) {                                                               
1065             for (int x = 0; x < width; x++) {                                                            
1066                 int pixel = bitmap.getPixel(x, y);                                                       
1067                 int r = pixel & 255;                                                                     
1068                 int g = (pixel >> 8) & 255;                                                              
1069                 int b = (pixel >> 16) & 255;                                                             
1070                 int a = (pixel >> 24) & 255;                                                             
1071                 boolean pixelTransparent = allowTransparency && (a < 128);                               
1072                 if (pixelTransparent) {                                                                  
1073                     isTransparent = true;                                                                
1074                     r = g = b = 0;                                                                       
1075                 }                                                                                        
1076                 // do dithering here                                                                     
1077                 int ditherAmt = ditherMatrix[(x&1) + (y&1)*2];                                           
1078                 r += ditherAmt;                                                                          
1079                 g += ditherAmt;                                                                          
1080                 b += ditherAmt;                                                                          
1081                 int col = 0;                                                                             
1082                 if (style == BangleJSBitmapStyle.MONOCHROME)                                             
1083                     col = ((r+g+b) >= 768)?1:0;                                                          
1084                 else if (style == BangleJSBitmapStyle.RGB_3BPP)                                          
1085                     col = ((r>=256)?1:0) | ((g>=256)?2:0) | ((b>=256)?4:0);                              
1086                 if (!pixelTransparent) colUsage[col]++; // if not transparent, record usage              
1087                 // save colour, mark transparent separately                                              
1088                 pixels[n++] = (byte)(pixelTransparent ? PIXELCOL_TRANSPARENT : col);                     
1089             }                                                                                            
1090         }                                                                                                
1091         // if we're transparent, find the least-used color, and use that for transparency                
1092         if (isTransparent) {                                                                             
1093             // find least used                                                                           
1094             int minColUsage = -1;                                                                        
1095             for (int c=0;c<8;c++) {                                                                      
1096                 if (minColUsage<0 || colUsage[c]<minColUsage) {                                          
1097                     minColUsage = colUsage[c];                                                           
1098                     transparentColorIndex = (byte)c;                                                     
1099                 }                                                                                        
1100             }                                                                                            
1101             // rewrite any transparent pixels as the correct color for transparency                      
1102             for (n=0;n<pixels.length;n++)                                                                
1103                 if (pixels[n]==PIXELCOL_TRANSPARENT)                                                     
1104                     pixels[n] = transparentColorIndex;                                                   
1105         }                                                                                                
1106         // Write the header                                                                              
1107         int headerLen = isTransparent ? 4 : 3;                                                           
1108         byte bmp[] = new byte[(((height * width * bpp) + 7) >> 3) + headerLen];                          
1109         bmp[0] = (byte)width;                                                                            
1110         bmp[1] = (byte)height;                                                                           
1111         bmp[2] = (byte)(bpp + (isTransparent?128:0));                                                    
1112         if (isTransparent) bmp[3] = transparentColorIndex;                                               
1113         // Now write the image out bit by bit                                                            
1114         BitWriter bits = new BitWriter(bmp, headerLen);                                                  
1115         n = 0;                                                                                           
1116         for (int y = 0; y < height; y++) {                                                               
1117             for (int x = 0; x < width; x++) {                                                            
1118                 int pixel = pixels[n++];                                                                 
1119                 for (int b=bpp-1;b>=0;b--)                                                               
1120                     bits.push(((pixel>>b)&1) != 0);                                                      
1121             }                                                                                            
1122         }                                                                                                
1123         return bmp;                                                                                      
1124     }                                                                                                    
1125                                                                                                          
1126     /** Convert an Android bitmap to a base64 string for use in Espruino.                                
1127      * Currently only 1bpp, no scaling */                                                                
1128     public static String bitmapToEspruinoString(Bitmap bitmap, BangleJSBitmapStyle style) {              
1129         return new String(bitmapToEspruinoArray(bitmap, style), StandardCharsets.ISO_8859_1);            
1130     }                                                                                                    
1131                                                                                                          
1132     /** Convert an Android bitmap to a base64 string for use in Espruino.                                
1133      * Currently only 1bpp, no scaling */                                                                
1134     public static String bitmapToEspruinoBase64(Bitmap bitmap, BangleJSBitmapStyle style) {              
1135         return Base64.encodeToString(bitmapToEspruinoArray(bitmap, style), Base64.DEFAULT).replaceAll("\n🔵
1136     }                                                                                                    
1137                                                                                                          
1138     /** Convert a drawable to a bitmap, for use with bitmapToEspruino */                                 
1139     public static Bitmap drawableToBitmap(Drawable drawable) {                                           
1140         final int maxWidth = 32;                                                                         
1141         final int maxHeight = 32;                                                                        
1142         /* Return bitmap directly but only if it's small enough. It could be                             
1143         we have a bitmap but it's just too big to send direct to the bangle */                           
1144         if (drawable instanceof BitmapDrawable) {                                                        
1145             BitmapDrawable bitmapDrawable = (BitmapDrawable) drawable;                                   
1146             Bitmap bmp = bitmapDrawable.getBitmap();                                                     
1147             if (bmp != null && bmp.getWidth()<=maxWidth && bmp.getHeight()<=maxHeight)                   
1148                 return bmp;                                                                              
1149         }                                                                                                
1150         /* Otherwise render this to a bitmap ourselves.. work out size */                                
1151         int w = maxWidth;                                                                                
1152         int h = maxHeight;                                                                               
1153         if (drawable.getIntrinsicWidth() > 0 && drawable.getIntrinsicHeight() > 0) {                     
1154             w = drawable.getIntrinsicWidth();                                                            
1155             h = drawable.getIntrinsicHeight();                                                           
1156             // don't allocate anything too big, but keep the ratio                                       
1157             if (w>maxWidth) {                                                                            
1158                 h = h * maxWidth / w;                                                                    
1159                 w = maxWidth;                                                                            
1160             }                                                                                            
1161             if (h>maxHeight) {                                                                           
1162                 w = w * maxHeight / h;                                                                   
1163                 h = maxHeight;                                                                           
1164             }                                                                                            
1165         }                                                                                                
1166         /* render */                                                                                     
1167         Bitmap bitmap = Bitmap.createBitmap(w, h, Bitmap.Config.ARGB_8888); // Single color bitmap will b🔵
1168         Canvas canvas = new Canvas(bitmap);                                                              
1169         drawable.setBounds(0, 0, canvas.getWidth(), canvas.getHeight());                                 
1170         drawable.draw(canvas);                                                                           
1171         return bitmap;                                                                                   
1172     }                                                                                                    
1173 }

 100 import nodomain.freeyourgadget.gadgetbridge.model.RecordedDataTypes;                                     
 101 import nodomain.freeyourgadget.gadgetbridge.model.WeatherSpec;                                           
 102 import nodomain.freeyourgadget.gadgetbridge.service.btle.AbstractBTLEDeviceSupport;                      
 103 import nodomain.freeyourgadget.gadgetbridge.service.btle.TransactionBuilder;                             
 104 import nodomain.freeyourgadget.gadgetbridge.service.devices.qhybrid.requests.misfit.PlayNotificationReque🔵
 105 import nodomain.freeyourgadget.gadgetbridge.util.AlarmUtils;                                             
 106 import nodomain.freeyourgadget.gadgetbridge.util.EmojiConverter;                                         
 107 import nodomain.freeyourgadget.gadgetbridge.util.FileUtils;                                              
 108 import nodomain.freeyourgadget.gadgetbridge.util.GB;                                                     
 109 import nodomain.freeyourgadget.gadgetbridge.util.LimitedQueue;                                           
 110 import nodomain.freeyourgadget.gadgetbridge.util.Prefs;                                                  
 111                                                                                                          
 112 import static nodomain.freeyourgadget.gadgetbridge.activities.devicesettings.DeviceSettingsPreferenceCons🔵
 113 import static nodomain.freeyourgadget.gadgetbridge.activities.devicesettings.DeviceSettingsPreferenceCons🔵
 114 import static nodomain.freeyourgadget.gadgetbridge.activities.devicesettings.DeviceSettingsPreferenceCons🔵
 115 import static nodomain.freeyourgadget.gadgetbridge.activities.devicesettings.DeviceSettingsPreferenceCons🔵
 116 import static nodomain.freeyourgadget.gadgetbridge.database.DBHelper.*;                                  
 117                                                                                                          
 118 import javax.xml.xpath.XPath;                                                                            
 119 import javax.xml.xpath.XPathFactory;                                                                     
 120                                                                                                          
 121 public class BangleJSDeviceSupport extends AbstractBTLEDeviceSupport {                                   
 122     private static final Logger LOG = LoggerFactory.getLogger(BangleJSDeviceSupport.class);              
 123                                                                                                          
 124     private BluetoothGattCharacteristic rxCharacteristic = null;                                         
 125     private BluetoothGattCharacteristic txCharacteristic = null;                                         
 126     private boolean allowHighMTU = false;                                                                
 127     private int mtuSize = 20;                                                                            
 128     int bangleCommandSeq = 0; // to attempt to stop duplicate packets when sending Local Intents         
 129                                                                                                          
 130     /// Current line of data received from Bangle.js                                                     
 131     private String receivedLine = "";                                                                    
 132     /// All characters received from Bangle.js for debug purposes (limited to MAX_RECEIVE_HISTORY_CHARS).🔵
 133     private String receiveHistory = "";                                                                  
 134     private boolean realtimeHRM = false;                                                                 
 135     private boolean realtimeStep = false;                                                                
 136     private int realtimeHRMInterval = 30*60;                                                             
 137                                                                                                          
 138     private final LimitedQueue/*Long*/ mNotificationReplyAction = new LimitedQueue(16);                  
 139                                                                                                          
 140     /// Maximum amount of characters to store in receiveHistory                                          
 141     public static final int MAX_RECEIVE_HISTORY_CHARS = 100000;                                          
 142     // Local Intents - for app manager communication                                                     
 143     public static final String BANGLEJS_COMMAND_TX = "banglejs_command_tx";                              
 144     public static final String BANGLEJS_COMMAND_RX = "banglejs_command_rx";                              
 145     // Global Intents                                                                                    
 146     private static final String BANGLE_ACTION_UART_TX = "com.banglejs.uart.tx";                          
 147                                                                                                          
 148     public BangleJSDeviceSupport() {                                                                     
 149         super(LOG);                                                                                      
 150         addSupportedService(BangleJSConstants.UUID_SERVICE_NORDIC_UART);                                 
 151                                                                                                          
 152         registerLocalIntents();                                                                          
 153         registerGlobalIntents();                                                                         
 154     }                                                                                                    
 155                                                                                                          
 156     private void registerLocalIntents() {                                                                
 157         IntentFilter commandFilter = new IntentFilter();                                                 
 158         commandFilter.addAction(GBDevice.ACTION_DEVICE_CHANGED);                                         
 159         commandFilter.addAction(BANGLEJS_COMMAND_TX);                                                    
 160         BroadcastReceiver commandReceiver = new BroadcastReceiver() {                                    
 161             @Override                                                                                    
 162             public void onReceive(Context context, Intent intent) {                                      
 163                 switch (intent.getAction()) {                                                            
 164                     case BANGLEJS_COMMAND_TX: {                                                          
 165                         String data = String.valueOf(intent.getExtras().get("DATA"));                    
 166                         try {                                                                            
 167                             TransactionBuilder builder = performInitialized("TX");                       
 168                             uartTx(builder, data);                                                       
 169                             builder.queue(getQueue());                                                   
 170                         } catch (IOException e) {                                                        
 171                             GB.toast(getContext(), "Error in TX: " + e.getLocalizedMessage(), Toast.LENGT🔵
 172                         }                                                                                
 173                         break;                                                                           
 174                     }                                                                                    
 175                     case GBDevice.ACTION_DEVICE_CHANGED: {                                               
 176                         LOG.info("ACTION_DEVICE_CHANGED " + gbDevice.getStateString());                  
 177                         receiveHistory += "\n================================================\nACTION_DEV🔵
 178                     }                                                                                    
 179                 }                                                                                        
 180             }                                                                                            
 181         };                                                                                               
 182         LocalBroadcastManager.getInstance(GBApplication.getContext()).registerReceiver(commandReceiver, c🔵
 183     }                                                                                                    
 184                                                                                                          
 185     private void registerGlobalIntents() {                                                               
 186         IntentFilter commandFilter = new IntentFilter();                                                 
 187         commandFilter.addAction(BANGLE_ACTION_UART_TX);                                                  
 188         BroadcastReceiver commandReceiver = new BroadcastReceiver() {                                    
 189             @Override                                                                                    
 190             public void onReceive(Context context, Intent intent) {                                      
 191                 switch (intent.getAction()) {                                                            
 192                     case BANGLE_ACTION_UART_TX: {                                                        
 193                         /* In Tasker:                                                                    
 194                           Action: com.banglejs.uart.tx                                                   
 195                           Cat: None                                                                      
 196                           Extra: line:Terminal.println(%avariable)                                       
 197                           Target: Broadcast Receiver                                                     
 198                                                                                                          
 199                           Variable: Number, Configure on Import, NOT structured, Value set, Nothing Expor🔵
 200                          */                                                                              
 201                         Prefs devicePrefs = new Prefs(GBApplication.getDeviceSpecificSharedPrefs(gbDevice🔵
 202                         if (!devicePrefs.getBoolean(PREF_DEVICE_INTENTS, false)) return;                 
 203                         String data = intent.getStringExtra("line");                                     
 204                         if (data==null) {                                                                
 205                             GB.toast(getContext(), "UART TX Intent, but no 'line' supplied", Toast.LENGTH🔵
 206                             return;                                                                      
 207                         }                                                                                
 208                         if (!data.endsWith("\n")) data += "\n";                                          
 209                         try {                                                                            
 210                             TransactionBuilder builder = performInitialized("TX");                       
 211                             uartTx(builder, data);                                                       
 212                             builder.queue(getQueue());                                                   
 213                         } catch (IOException e) {                                                        
 214                             GB.toast(getContext(), "Error in TX: " + e.getLocalizedMessage(), Toast.LENGT🔵
 215                         }                                                                                
 216                         break;                                                                           
 217                     }                                                                                    
 218                 }                                                                                        
 219             }                                                                                            
 220         };                                                                                               
 221         GBApplication.getContext().registerReceiver(commandReceiver, commandFilter);                     
 222     }                                                                                                    
 223                                                                                                          
 224     @Override                                                                                            
 225     protected TransactionBuilder initializeDevice(TransactionBuilder builder) {                          
 226         LOG.info("Initializing");                                                                        
 227                                                                                                          
 228         gbDevice.setState(GBDevice.State.INITIALIZING);                                                  
 229         gbDevice.sendDeviceUpdateIntent(getContext());                                                   
 230         gbDevice.setBatteryThresholdPercent((short) 30);                                                 
 231                                                                                                          
 232         rxCharacteristic = getCharacteristic(BangleJSConstants.UUID_CHARACTERISTIC_NORDIC_UART_RX);      
 233         txCharacteristic = getCharacteristic(BangleJSConstants.UUID_CHARACTERISTIC_NORDIC_UART_TX);      
 234         builder.setGattCallback(this);                                                                   
 235         builder.notify(rxCharacteristic, true);                                                          
 236                                                                                                          
 237         Prefs devicePrefs = new Prefs(GBApplication.getDeviceSpecificSharedPrefs(gbDevice.getAddress()));
 238         allowHighMTU = devicePrefs.getBoolean(PREF_ALLOW_HIGH_MTU, false);                               
 239                                                                                                          
 240         uartTx(builder, " \u0003"); // clear active line                                                 
 241                                                                                                          
 242         Prefs prefs = GBApplication.getPrefs();                                                          
 243         if (prefs.getBoolean("datetime_synconconnect", true))                                            
 244           transmitTime(builder);                                                                         
 245         //sendSettings(builder);                                                                         
 246                                                                                                          
 247         // get version                                                                                   
 248                                                                                                          
 249         gbDevice.setState(GBDevice.State.INITIALIZED);                                                   
 250         gbDevice.sendDeviceUpdateIntent(getContext());                                                   
 251                                                                                                          
 252         getDevice().setFirmwareVersion("N/A");                                                           
 253         getDevice().setFirmwareVersion2("N/A");                                                          
 254                                                                                                          
 255         LOG.info("Initialization Done");                                                                 
 256                                                                                                          
 257         return builder;                                                                                  
 258     }                                                                                                    
 259                                                                                                          
 260     /// Write a string of data, and chunk it up                                                          
 261     private void uartTx(TransactionBuilder builder, String str) {                                        
 262         byte[] bytes = str.getBytes(StandardCharsets.ISO_8859_1);                                        
 263         LOG.info("UART TX: " + str);                                                                     
 264         // FIXME: somehow this is still giving us UTF8 data when we put images in strings. Maybe JSON.str🔵
 265         for (int i=0;i<bytes.length;i+=mtuSize) {                                                        
 266             int l = bytes.length-i;                                                                      
 267             if (l>mtuSize) l=mtuSize;                                                                    
 268             byte[] packet = new byte[l];                                                                 
 269             System.arraycopy(bytes, i, packet, 0, l);                                                    
 270             builder.write(txCharacteristic, packet);                                                     
 271         }                                                                                                
 272     }                                                                                                    
 273                                                                                                          
 274     /// Converts an object to a JSON string. see jsonToString                                            
 275     private String jsonToStringInternal(Object v) {                                                      
 276         if (v instanceof String) {                                                                       
 277             /* Convert a string, escaping chars we can't send over out UART connection */                
 278             String s = (String)v;                                                                        
 279             String json = "\"";                                                                          
 280             for (int i=0;i<s.length();i++) {                                                             
 281                 int ch = (int)s.charAt(i);                                                               
 282                 if (ch<8) json += "\\"+ch;                                                               
 283                 else if (ch==8) json += "\\b";                                                           
 284                 else if (ch==9) json += "\\t";                                                           
 285                 else if (ch==10) json += "\\n";                                                          
 286                 else if (ch==11) json += "\\v";                                                          
 287                 else if (ch==12) json += "\\f";                                                          
 288                 else if (ch==34) json += "\\\""; // quote                                                
 289                 else if (ch==92) json += "\\\\"; // slash                                                
 290                 else if (ch<32 || ch==26 || ch==27 || ch==127 || ch==173) json += "\\x"+Integer.toHexStri🔵
 291                 else json += s.charAt(i);                                                                
 292             }                                                                                            
 293             return json + "\"";                                                                          
 294         } else if (v instanceof JSONArray) {                                                             
 295             JSONArray a = (JSONArray)v;                                                                  
 296             String json = "[";                                                                           
 297             for (int i=0;i<a.length();i++) {                                                             
 298                 if (i>0) json += ",";                                                                    
 299                 Object o = null;                                                                         
 300                 try {                                                                                    
 301                     o = a.get(i);                                                                        
 302                 } catch (JSONException e) {                                                              
 303                     LOG.warn("jsonToString array error: " + e.getLocalizedMessage());                    
 304                 }                                                                                        
 305                 json += jsonToStringInternal(o);                                                         
 306             }                                                                                            
 307             return json+"]";                                                                             
 308         } else if (v instanceof JSONObject) {                                                            
 309             JSONObject obj = (JSONObject)v;                                                              
 310             String json = "{";                                                                           
 311             Iterator<String> iter = obj.keys();                                                          
 312             while (iter.hasNext()) {                                                                     
 313                 String key = iter.next();                                                                
 314                 Object o = null;                                                                         
 315                 try {                                                                                    
 316                     o = obj.get(key);                                                                    
 317                 } catch (JSONException e) {                                                              
 318                     LOG.warn("jsonToString object error: " + e.getLocalizedMessage());                   
 319                 }                                                                                        
 320                 json += key+":"+jsonToStringInternal(o);                                                 
 321                 if (iter.hasNext()) json+=",";                                                           
 322             }                                                                                            
 323             return json+"}";                                                                             
 324         } // else int/double/null                                                                        
 325         return v.toString();                                                                             
 326     }                                                                                                    
 327                                                                                                          
 328     /// Convert a JSON object to a JSON String (NOT 100% JSON compliant)                                 
 329     public String jsonToString(JSONObject jsonObj) {                                                     
 330         /* jsonObj.toString() works but breaks char codes>128 (encodes as UTF8?) and also uses           
 331         \u0000 when just \0 would do (and so on).                                                        
 332                                                                                                          
 333         So we do it manually, which can be more compact anyway.                                          
 334         This is JSON-ish, so not exactly as per JSON1 spec but good enough for Espruino.                 
 335         */                                                                                               
 336         return jsonToStringInternal(jsonObj);                                                            
 337     }                                                                                                    
 338                                                                                                          
 339     /// Write a JSON object of data                                                                      
 340     private void uartTxJSON(String taskName, JSONObject json) {                                          
 341         try {                                                                                            
 342             TransactionBuilder builder = performInitialized(taskName);                                   
 343             uartTx(builder, "\u0010GB("+jsonToString(json)+")\n");                                       
 344             builder.queue(getQueue());                                                                   
 345         } catch (IOException e) {                                                                        
 346             GB.toast(getContext(), "Error in "+taskName+": " + e.getLocalizedMessage(), Toast.LENGTH_LONG🔵
 347         }                                                                                                
 348     }                                                                                                    
 349                                                                                                          
 350     /// Write JSON object of the form {t:taskName, err:message}                                          
 351                                                                                                          
 352     private void uartTxJSONError(String taskName, String message) {                                      
 353         uartTxJSONError(taskName,message,null);                                                          
 354     }                                                                                                    
 355                                                                                                          
 356     private void uartTxJSONError(String taskName, String message,String id) {                            
 357         JSONObject o = new JSONObject();                                                                 
 358         try {                                                                                            
 359             o.put("t", taskName);                                                                        
 360             if( id!=null)                                                                                
 361                 o.put("id", id);                                                                         
 362             o.put("err", message);                                                                       
 363         } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                      
 364             GB.toast(getContext(), "uartTxJSONError: " + e.getLocalizedMessage(), Toast.LENGTH_LONG, GB.E🔵
 365         }                                                                                                
 366         uartTxJSON(taskName, o);                                                                         
 367     }                                                                                                    
 368                                                                                                          
 369                                                                                                          
 370                                                                                                          
 371     private void handleUartRxLine(String line) {                                                         
 372         LOG.info("UART RX LINE: " + line);                                                               
 373         if (line.length()==0) return;                                                                    
 374         if (">Uncaught ReferenceError: \"GB\" is not defined".equals(line))                              
 375           GB.toast(getContext(), "Gadgetbridge plugin not installed on Bangle.js", Toast.LENGTH_LONG, GB.🔵
 376         else if (line.charAt(0)=='{') {                                                                  
 377             // JSON - we hope!                                                                           
 378             try {                                                                                        
 379                 JSONObject json = new JSONObject(line);                                                  
 380                 LOG.info("UART RX JSON parsed successfully");                                            
 381                 handleUartRxJSON(json);                                                                  
 382             } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                  
 383                 LOG.info("UART RX JSON parse failure: "+ e.getLocalizedMessage());                       
 384                 GB.toast(getContext(), "Malformed JSON from Bangle.js: " + e.getLocalizedMessage(), Toast🔵
 385             }                                                                                            
 386         } else {                                                                                         
 387             LOG.info("UART RX line started with "+(int)line.charAt(0)+" - ignoring");                    
 388         }                                                                                                
 389     }                                                                                                    
 390                                                                                                          
 391     private void handleUartRxJSON(JSONObject json) throws JSONException {                                
 392         String packetType = json.getString("t");                                                         
 393         switch (packetType) {                                                                            
 394             case "info":                                                                                 
 395                 GB.toast(getContext(), "Bangle.js: " + json.getString("msg"), Toast.LENGTH_LONG, GB.INFO)🔵
 396                 break;                                                                                   
 397             case "warn":                                                                                 
 398                 GB.toast(getContext(), "Bangle.js: " + json.getString("msg"), Toast.LENGTH_LONG, GB.WARN)🔵
 399                 break;                                                                                   
 400             case "error":                                                                                
 401                 GB.toast(getContext(), "Bangle.js: " + json.getString("msg"), Toast.LENGTH_LONG, GB.ERROR🔵
 402                 break;                                                                                   
 403             case "ver": {                                                                                
 404                 if (json.has("fw1"))                                                                     
 405                     getDevice().setFirmwareVersion(json.getString("fw1"));                               
 406                 if (json.has("fw2"))                                                                     
 407                     getDevice().setFirmwareVersion2(json.getString("fw2"));                              
 408             } break;                                                                                     
 409             case "status": {                                                                             
 410                 GBDeviceEventBatteryInfo batteryInfo = new GBDeviceEventBatteryInfo();                   
 411                 if (json.has("bat")) {                                                                   
 412                     int b = json.getInt("bat");                                                          
 413                     if (b < 0) b = 0;                                                                    
 414                     if (b > 100) b = 100;                                                                
 415                     batteryInfo.level = b;                                                               
 416                     batteryInfo.state = BatteryState.BATTERY_NORMAL;                                     
 417                 }                                                                                        
 418                 if (json.has("chg") && json.getInt("chg") == 1) {                                        
 419                     batteryInfo.state = BatteryState.BATTERY_CHARGING;                                   
 420                 }                                                                                        
 421                 if (json.has("volt"))                                                                    
 422                     batteryInfo.voltage = (float) json.getDouble("volt");                                
 423                 handleGBDeviceEvent(batteryInfo);                                                        
 424             } break;                                                                                     
 425             case "findPhone": {                                                                          
 426                 boolean start = json.has("n") && json.getBoolean("n");                                   
 427                 GBDeviceEventFindPhone deviceEventFindPhone = new GBDeviceEventFindPhone();              
 428                 deviceEventFindPhone.event = start ? GBDeviceEventFindPhone.Event.START : GBDeviceEventFi🔵
 429                 evaluateGBDeviceEvent(deviceEventFindPhone);                                             
 430             } break;                                                                                     
 431             case "music": {                                                                              
 432                 GBDeviceEventMusicControl deviceEventMusicControl = new GBDeviceEventMusicControl();     
 433                 deviceEventMusicControl.event = GBDeviceEventMusicControl.Event.valueOf(json.getString("n🔵
 434                 evaluateGBDeviceEvent(deviceEventMusicControl);                                          
 435             } break;                                                                                     
 436             case "call": {                                                                               
 437                 GBDeviceEventCallControl deviceEventCallControl = new GBDeviceEventCallControl();        
 438                 deviceEventCallControl.event = GBDeviceEventCallControl.Event.valueOf(json.getString("n")🔵
 439                 evaluateGBDeviceEvent(deviceEventCallControl);                                           
 440             } break;                                                                                     
 441             case "notify" : {                                                                            
 442                 GBDeviceEventNotificationControl deviceEvtNotificationControl = new GBDeviceEventNotifica🔵
 443                 // .title appears unused                                                                 
 444                 deviceEvtNotificationControl.event = GBDeviceEventNotificationControl.Event.valueOf(json.🔵
 445                 if (json.has("id"))                                                                      
 446                     deviceEvtNotificationControl.handle = json.getInt("id");                             
 447                 if (json.has("tel"))                                                                     
 448                     deviceEvtNotificationControl.phoneNumber = json.getString("tel");                    
 449                 if (json.has("msg"))                                                                     
 450                     deviceEvtNotificationControl.reply = json.getString("msg");                          
 451                 /* REPLY responses don't use the ID from the event (MUTE/etc seem to), but instead       
 452                 * they use a handle that was provided in an action list on the onNotification.. event  */
 453                 if (deviceEvtNotificationControl.event == GBDeviceEventNotificationControl.Event.REPLY) {
 454                     Long foundHandle = (Long)mNotificationReplyAction.lookup((int)deviceEvtNotificationCo🔵
 455                     if (foundHandle!=null)                                                               
 456                         deviceEvtNotificationControl.handle = foundHandle;                               
 457                 }                                                                                        
 458                 evaluateGBDeviceEvent(deviceEvtNotificationControl);                                     
 459             } break;                                                                                     
 460             case "act": {                                                                                
 461                 BangleJSActivitySample sample = new BangleJSActivitySample();                            
 462                 sample.setTimestamp((int) (GregorianCalendar.getInstance().getTimeInMillis() / 1000L));  
 463                 int hrm = 0;                                                                             
 464                 int steps = 0;                                                                           
 465                 if (json.has("hrm")) hrm = json.getInt("hrm");                                           
 466                 if (json.has("stp")) steps = json.getInt("stp");                                         
 467                 int activity = BangleJSSampleProvider.TYPE_ACTIVITY;                                     
 468                 /*if (json.has("act")) {                                                                 
 469                     String actName = "TYPE_" + json.getString("act").toUpperCase();                      
 470                     try {                                                                                
 471                         Field f = ActivityKind.class.getField(actName);                                  
 472                         try {                                                                            
 473                             activity = f.getInt(null);                                                   
 474                         } catch (IllegalAccessException e) {                                             
 475                             LOG.info("JSON activity '"+actName+"' not readable");                        
 476                         }                                                                                
 477                     } catch (NoSuchFieldException e) {                                                   
 478                         LOG.info("JSON activity '"+actName+"' not found");                               
 479                     }                                                                                    
 480                 }*/                                                                                      
 481                 sample.setRawKind(activity);                                                             
 482                 sample.setHeartRate(hrm);                                                                
 483                 sample.setSteps(steps);                                                                  
 484                 try (DBHandler dbHandler = GBApplication.acquireDB()) {                                  
 485                     Long userId = getUser(dbHandler.getDaoSession()).getId();                            
 486                     Long deviceId = DBHelper.getDevice(getDevice(), dbHandler.getDaoSession()).getId();  
 487                     BangleJSSampleProvider provider = new BangleJSSampleProvider(getDevice(), dbHandler.g🔵
 488                     sample.setDeviceId(deviceId);                                                        
 489                     sample.setUserId(userId);                                                            
 490                     provider.addGBActivitySample(sample);                                                
 491                 } catch (Exception ex) {                                                                 
 492                     LOG.warn("Error saving activity: " + ex.getLocalizedMessage());                      
 493                 }                                                                                        
 494                 // push realtime data                                                                    
 495                 if (realtimeHRM || realtimeStep) {                                                       
 496                     Intent intent = new Intent(DeviceService.ACTION_REALTIME_SAMPLES)                    
 497                             .putExtra(DeviceService.EXTRA_REALTIME_SAMPLE, sample);                      
 498                     LocalBroadcastManager.getInstance(getContext()).sendBroadcast(intent);               
 499                 }                                                                                        
 500             } break;                                                                                     
 501             case "http": {                                                                               
 502                 Prefs devicePrefs = new Prefs(GBApplication.getDeviceSpecificSharedPrefs(gbDevice.getAddr🔵
 503                 String _id=null;                                                                         
 504                 try {                                                                                    
 505                     _id = json.getString("id");                                                          
 506                 } catch (JSONException e) {                                                              
 507                 }                                                                                        
 508                 final String id = _id;                                                                   
 509                                                                                                          
 510                                                                                                          
 511                 if (BuildConfig.INTERNET_ACCESS && devicePrefs.getBoolean(PREF_DEVICE_INTERNET_ACCESS, fa🔵
 512                     RequestQueue queue = Volley.newRequestQueue(getContext());                           
 513                     String url = json.getString("url");                                                  
 514                                                                                                          
 515                     String _xmlPath = "";                                                                
 516                     try {                                                                                
 517                         _xmlPath = json.getString("xpath");                                              
 518                     } catch (JSONException e) {                                                          
 519                     }                                                                                    
 520                     final String xmlPath = _xmlPath;                                                     
 521                     // Request a string response from the provided URL.                                  
 522                     StringRequest stringRequest = new StringRequest(Request.Method.GET, url,             
 523                             new Response.Listener<String>() {                                            
 524                                 @Override                                                                
 525                                 public void onResponse(String response) {                                
 526                                     JSONObject o = new JSONObject();                                     
 527                                     if (xmlPath.length() != 0) {                                         
 528                                         try {                                                            
 529                                             InputSource inputXML = new InputSource(new StringReader(respo🔵
 530                                             XPath xPath = XPathFactory.newInstance().newXPath();         
 531                                             response = xPath.evaluate(xmlPath, inputXML);                
 532                                         } catch (Exception error) {                                      
 533                                             uartTxJSONError("http", error.toString(),id);                
 534                                             return;                                                      
 535                                         }                                                                
 536                                     }                                                                    
 537                                     try {                                                                
 538                                         o.put("t", "http");                                              
 539                                         if( id!=null)                                                    
 540                                             o.put("id", id);                                             
 541                                         o.put("resp", response);                                         
 542                                     } catch (JSONException e) {                                          
 543                                         GB.toast(getContext(), "HTTP: " + e.getLocalizedMessage(), Toast.🔵
 544                                     }                                                                    
 545                                     uartTxJSON("http", o);                                               
 546                                 }                                                                        
 547                             }, new Response.ErrorListener() {                                            
 548                         @Override                                                                        
 549                         public void onErrorResponse(VolleyError error) {                                 
 550                             JSONObject o = new JSONObject();                                             
 551                             uartTxJSONError("http", error.toString(),id);                                
 552                         }                                                                                
 553                     });                                                                                  
 554                     queue.add(stringRequest);                                                            
 555                 } else {                                                                                 
 556                     if (BuildConfig.INTERNET_ACCESS)                                                     
 557                         uartTxJSONError("http", "Internet access not enabled, check Gadgetbridge Device S🔵
 558                     else                                                                                 
 559                         uartTxJSONError("http", "Internet access not enabled in this Gadgetbridge build",🔵
 560                 }                                                                                        
 561             } break;                                                                                     
 562             case "intent": {                                                                             
 563                 Prefs devicePrefs = new Prefs(GBApplication.getDeviceSpecificSharedPrefs(gbDevice.getAddr🔵
 564                 if (devicePrefs.getBoolean(PREF_DEVICE_INTENTS, false)) {                                
 565                     String action = json.getString("action");
