 566                     JSONObject extra = json.getJSONObject("extra");                                      
 567                     Intent in = new Intent();                                                            
 568                     in.setAction(action);                                                                
 569                     if (extra != null) {                                                                 
 570                         Iterator<String> iter = extra.keys();                                            
 571                         while (iter.hasNext()) {                                                         
 572                             String key = iter.next();                                                    
 573                             in.putExtra(key, extra.getString(key));                                      
 574                         }                                                                                
 575                     }                                                                                    
 576                     LOG.info("Sending intent " + action);                                                
 577                     this.getContext().getApplicationContext().sendBroadcast(in);                         
 578                 } else {                                                                                 
 579                     uartTxJSONError("intent", "Android Intents not enabled, check Gadgetbridge Device Set🔵
 580                 }                                                                                        
 581             }                                                                                            
 582             default : {                                                                                  
 583                 LOG.info("UART RX JSON packet type '"+packetType+"' not understood.");                   
 584             }                                                                                            
 585         }                                                                                                
 586     }                                                                                                    
 587                                                                                                          
 588     @Override                                                                                            
 589     public boolean onCharacteristicChanged(BluetoothGatt gatt,                                           
 590                                            BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic) {                 
 591         if (super.onCharacteristicChanged(gatt, characteristic)) {                                       
 592             return true;                                                                                 
 593         }                                                                                                
 594         if (BangleJSConstants.UUID_CHARACTERISTIC_NORDIC_UART_RX.equals(characteristic.getUuid())) {     
 595             byte[] chars = characteristic.getValue();                                                    
 596             // check to see if we get more data - if so, increase out MTU for sending                    
 597             if (allowHighMTU && chars.length > mtuSize)                                                  
 598                 mtuSize = chars.length;                                                                  
 599             String packetStr = new String(chars);                                                        
 600             LOG.info("RX: " + packetStr);                                                                
 601             // logging                                                                                   
 602             receiveHistory += packetStr;                                                                 
 603             if (receiveHistory.length() > MAX_RECEIVE_HISTORY_CHARS)                                     
 604                 receiveHistory = receiveHistory.substring(receiveHistory.length() - MAX_RECEIVE_HISTORY_C🔵
 605             // split into input lines                                                                    
 606             receivedLine += packetStr;                                                                   
 607             while (receivedLine.contains("\n")) {                                                        
 608                 int p = receivedLine.indexOf("\n");                                                      
 609                 String line =  receivedLine.substring(0,p-1);                                            
 610                 receivedLine = receivedLine.substring(p+1);                                              
 611                 handleUartRxLine(line);                                                                  
 612             }                                                                                            
 613             // Send an intent with new data                                                              
 614             Intent intent = new Intent(BangleJSDeviceSupport.BANGLEJS_COMMAND_RX);                       
 615             intent.putExtra("DATA", packetStr);                                                          
 616             intent.putExtra("SEQ", bangleCommandSeq++);                                                  
 617             LocalBroadcastManager.getInstance(getContext()).sendBroadcast(intent);                       
 618         }                                                                                                
 619         return false;                                                                                    
 620     }                                                                                                    
 621                                                                                                          
 622                                                                                                          
 623     void transmitTime(TransactionBuilder builder) {                                                      
 624       long ts = System.currentTimeMillis();                                                              
 625       float tz = SimpleTimeZone.getDefault().getOffset(ts) / (1000 * 60 * 60.0f);                        
 626       // set time                                                                                        
 627       String cmd = "\u0010setTime("+(ts/1000)+");";                                                      
 628       // set timezone                                                                                    
 629       cmd += "E.setTimeZone("+tz+");";                                                                   
 630       // write timezone to settings                                                                      
 631       cmd += "(s=>{s&&(s.timezone="+tz+")&&require('Storage').write('setting.json',s);})(require('Storage🔵
 632       uartTx(builder, cmd+"\n");                                                                         
 633     }                                                                                                    
 634                                                                                                          
 635     @Override                                                                                            
 636     public boolean useAutoConnect() {                                                                    
 637         return true;                                                                                     
 638     }                                                                                                    
 639                                                                                                          
 640     private String renderUnicodeWordAsImage(String word) {                                               
 641         // check for emoji                                                                               
 642         boolean hasEmoji = false;                                                                        
 643         if (EmojiUtils.getAllEmojis()==null)                                                             
 644             EmojiManager.initEmojiData(GBApplication.getContext());                                      
 645         for(Emoji emoji : EmojiUtils.getAllEmojis())                                                     
 646             if (word.contains(emoji.getEmoji())) hasEmoji = true;                                        
 647         // if we had emoji, ensure we create 3 bit color (not 1 bit B&W)                                 
 648         return "\0"+bitmapToEspruinoString(textToBitmap(word), hasEmoji ? BangleJSBitmapStyle.RGB_3BPP : 🔵
 649     }                                                                                                    
 650                                                                                                          
 651     public String renderUnicodeAsImage(String txt) {                                                     
 652         if (txt==null) return null;                                                                      
 653         /* If we're not doing conversion, pass this right back (we use the EmojiConverter                
 654         As we would have done if BangleJSCoordinator.supportsUnicodeEmojis had reported false */         
 655         Prefs devicePrefs = new Prefs(GBApplication.getDeviceSpecificSharedPrefs(gbDevice.getAddress()));
 656         if (!devicePrefs.getBoolean(PREF_BANGLEJS_TEXT_BITMAP, false))                                   
 657             return EmojiConverter.convertUnicodeEmojiToAscii(txt, GBApplication.getContext());           
 658         // Otherwise split up and check each word                                                        
 659         String word = "", result = "";                                                                   
 660         boolean needsTranslate = false;                                                                  
 661         for (int i=0;i<txt.length();i++) {                                                               
 662             char ch = txt.charAt(i);                                                                     
 663             if (" -_/:.,?!'\"&*()".indexOf(ch)>=0) {                                                     
 664                 // word split                                                                            
 665                 if (needsTranslate) { // convert word                                                    
 666                     result += renderUnicodeWordAsImage(word)+ch;                                         
 667                 } else { // or just copy across                                                          
 668                     result += word+ch;                                                                   
 669                 }                                                                                        
 670                 word = "";                                                                               
 671                 needsTranslate = false;                                                                  
 672             } else {                                                                                     
 673                 // TODO: better check?                                                                   
 674                 if (ch<0 || ch>255) needsTranslate = true;                                               
 675                 word += ch;                                                                              
 676             }                                                                                            
 677         }                                                                                                
 678         if (needsTranslate) { // convert word                                                            
 679             result += renderUnicodeWordAsImage(word);                                                    
 680         } else { // or just copy across                                                                  
 681             result += word;                                                                              
 682         }                                                                                                
 683         return result;                                                                                   
 684     }                                                                                                    
 685                                                                                                          
 686     @Override                                                                                            
 687     public void onNotification(NotificationSpec notificationSpec) {                                      
 688         for (int i=0;i<notificationSpec.attachedActions.size();i++) {                                    
 689             NotificationSpec.Action action = notificationSpec.attachedActions.get(i);                    
 690             if (action.type==NotificationSpec.Action.TYPE_WEARABLE_REPLY)                                
 691                 mNotificationReplyAction.add(notificationSpec.getId(), new Long(((long)notificationSpec.g🔵
 692         }                                                                                                
 693         try {                                                                                            
 694             JSONObject o = new JSONObject();                                                             
 695             o.put("t", "notify");                                                                        
 696             o.put("id", notificationSpec.getId());                                                       
 697             o.put("src", notificationSpec.sourceName);                                                   
 698             o.put("title", renderUnicodeAsImage(notificationSpec.title));                                
 699             o.put("subject", renderUnicodeAsImage(notificationSpec.subject));                            
 700             o.put("body", renderUnicodeAsImage(notificationSpec.body));                                  
 701             o.put("sender", renderUnicodeAsImage(notificationSpec.sender));                              
 702             o.put("tel", notificationSpec.phoneNumber);                                                  
 703             uartTxJSON("onNotification", o);                                                             
 704         } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                      
 705             LOG.info("JSONException: " + e.getLocalizedMessage());                                       
 706         }                                                                                                
 707     }                                                                                                    
 708                                                                                                          
 709     @Override                                                                                            
 710     public void onDeleteNotification(int id) {                                                           
 711         try {                                                                                            
 712             JSONObject o = new JSONObject();                                                             
 713             o.put("t", "notify-");                                                                       
 714             o.put("id", id);                                                                             
 715             uartTxJSON("onDeleteNotification", o);                                                       
 716         } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                      
 717             LOG.info("JSONException: " + e.getLocalizedMessage());                                       
 718         }                                                                                                
 719     }                                                                                                    
 720                                                                                                          
 721     @Override                                                                                            
 722     public void onSetTime() {                                                                            
 723         try {                                                                                            
 724             TransactionBuilder builder = performInitialized("setTime");                                  
 725             transmitTime(builder);                                                                       
 726             builder.queue(getQueue());                                                                   
 727         } catch (Exception e) {                                                                          
 728             GB.toast(getContext(), "Error setting time: " + e.getLocalizedMessage(), Toast.LENGTH_LONG, G🔵
 729         }                                                                                                
 730     }                                                                                                    
 731                                                                                                          
 732     @Override                                                                                            
 733     public void onSetAlarms(ArrayList<? extends Alarm> alarms) {                                         
 734         try {                                                                                            
 735             JSONObject o = new JSONObject();                                                             
 736             o.put("t", "alarm");                                                                         
 737             JSONArray jsonalarms = new JSONArray();                                                      
 738             o.put("d", jsonalarms);                                                                      
 739                                                                                                          
 740             for (Alarm alarm : alarms) {                                                                 
 741                 if (!alarm.getEnabled()) continue;                                                       
 742                 JSONObject jsonalarm = new JSONObject();                                                 
 743                 jsonalarms.put(jsonalarm);                                                               
 744                                                                                                          
 745                 Calendar calendar = AlarmUtils.toCalendar(alarm);                                        
 746                                                                                                          
 747                 jsonalarm.put("h", alarm.getHour());                                                     
 748                 jsonalarm.put("m", alarm.getMinute());                                                   
 749                 jsonalarm.put("rep", alarm.getRepetition());                                             
 750             }                                                                                            
 751             uartTxJSON("onSetAlarms", o);                                                                
 752         } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                      
 753             LOG.info("JSONException: " + e.getLocalizedMessage());                                       
 754         }                                                                                                
 755     }                                                                                                    
 756                                                                                                          
 757     @Override                                                                                            
 758     public void onSetCallState(CallSpec callSpec) {                                                      
 759         try {                                                                                            
 760             JSONObject o = new JSONObject();                                                             
 761             o.put("t", "call");                                                                          
 762             String cmdName = "";                                                                         
 763             try {                                                                                        
 764                 Field fields[] = callSpec.getClass().getDeclaredFields();                                
 765                 for (Field field : fields)                                                               
 766                     if (field.getName().startsWith("CALL_") && field.getInt(callSpec) == callSpec.command🔵
 767                         cmdName = field.getName().substring(5).toLowerCase();                            
 768             } catch (IllegalAccessException e) {}                                                        
 769             o.put("cmd", cmdName);                                                                       
 770             o.put("name", renderUnicodeAsImage(callSpec.name));                                          
 771             o.put("number", callSpec.number);                                                            
 772             uartTxJSON("onSetCallState", o);                                                             
 773         } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                      
 774             LOG.info("JSONException: " + e.getLocalizedMessage());                                       
 775         }                                                                                                
 776 }                                                                                                        
 777                                                                                                          
 778     @Override                                                                                            
 779     public void onSetCannedMessages(CannedMessagesSpec cannedMessagesSpec) {                             
 780                                                                                                          
 781     }                                                                                                    
 782                                                                                                          
 783     @Override                                                                                            
 784     public void onSetMusicState(MusicStateSpec stateSpec) {                                              
 785         try {                                                                                            
 786             JSONObject o = new JSONObject();                                                             
 787             o.put("t", "musicstate");                                                                    
 788             int musicState = stateSpec.state;                                                            
 789             String[] musicStates = {"play", "pause", "stop", ""};                                        
 790             if (musicState<0) musicState=3;                                                              
 791             if (musicState>=musicStates.length) musicState = musicStates.length-1;                       
 792             o.put("state", musicStates[musicState]);                                                     
 793             o.put("position", stateSpec.position);                                                       
 794             o.put("shuffle", stateSpec.shuffle);                                                         
 795             o.put("repeat", stateSpec.repeat);                                                           
 796             uartTxJSON("onSetMusicState", o);                                                            
 797         } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                      
 798             LOG.info("JSONException: " + e.getLocalizedMessage());                                       
 799         }                                                                                                
 800     }                                                                                                    
 801                                                                                                          
 802     @Override                                                                                            
 803     public void onSetMusicInfo(MusicSpec musicSpec) {                                                    
 804         try {                                                                                            
 805             JSONObject o = new JSONObject();                                                             
 806             o.put("t", "musicinfo");                                                                     
 807             o.put("artist", renderUnicodeAsImage(musicSpec.artist));                                     
 808             o.put("album", renderUnicodeAsImage(musicSpec.album));                                       
 809             o.put("track", renderUnicodeAsImage(musicSpec.track));                                       
 810             o.put("dur", musicSpec.duration);                                                            
 811             o.put("c", musicSpec.trackCount);                                                            
 812             o.put("n", musicSpec.trackNr);                                                               
 813             uartTxJSON("onSetMusicInfo", o);                                                             
 814         } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                      
 815             LOG.info("JSONException: " + e.getLocalizedMessage());                                       
 816         }                                                                                                
 817     }                                                                                                    
 818                                                                                                          
 819     private void transmitActivityStatus() {                                                              
 820         try {                                                                                            
 821             JSONObject o = new JSONObject();                                                             
 822             o.put("t", "act");                                                                           
 823             o.put("hrm", realtimeHRM);                                                                   
 824             o.put("stp", realtimeStep);                                                                  
 825             o.put("int", realtimeHRMInterval);                                                           
 826             uartTxJSON("onEnableRealtimeSteps", o);                                                      
 827         } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                      
 828             LOG.info("JSONException: " + e.getLocalizedMessage());                                       
 829         }                                                                                                
 830     }                                                                                                    
 831                                                                                                          
 832     @Override                                                                                            
 833     public void onEnableRealtimeSteps(boolean enable) {                                                  
 834         if (enable == realtimeHRM) return;                                                               
 835         realtimeStep = enable;                                                                           
 836         transmitActivityStatus();                                                                        
 837     }

 868                                                                                                          
 869     @Override                                                                                            
 870     public void onFetchRecordedData(int dataTypes) {                                                     
 871         if (dataTypes == RecordedDataTypes.TYPE_DEBUGLOGS) {                                             
 872             File dir;                                                                                    
 873             try {                                                                                        
 874                 dir = FileUtils.getExternalFilesDir();                                                   
 875             } catch (IOException e) {                                                                    
 876                 return;                                                                                  
 877             }                                                                                            
 878             SimpleDateFormat dateFormat = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyyMMdd-HHmmss", Locale.US);            
 879             String filename = "banglejs_debug_" + dateFormat.format(new Date()) + ".log";                
 880             File outputFile = new File(dir, filename );                                                  
 881             LOG.warn("Writing log to "+outputFile.toString());                                           
 882             try {                                                                                        
 883                 BufferedWriter writer = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(outputFile));                  
 884                 writer.write(receiveHistory);                                                            
 885                 writer.close();                                                                          
 886                 receiveHistory = "";                                                                     
 887                 GB.toast(getContext(), "Log written to "+filename, Toast.LENGTH_LONG, GB.INFO);          
 888             } catch (IOException e) {                                                                    
 889                 LOG.warn("Could not write to file", e);                                                  
 890                 return;                                                                                  
 891             }                                                                                            
 892         }                                                                                                
 893     }                                                                                                    
 894

 898     }

 910     }

 977     @Override                                                                                            
 978     public void onSendWeather(WeatherSpec weatherSpec) {                                                 
 979         try {                                                                                            
 980             JSONObject o = new JSONObject();                                                             
 981             o.put("t", "weather");                                                                       
 982             o.put("temp", weatherSpec.currentTemp);                                                      
 983             o.put("hum", weatherSpec.currentHumidity);                                                   
 984             o.put("code", weatherSpec.currentConditionCode);                                             
 985             o.put("txt", weatherSpec.currentCondition);                                                  
 986             o.put("wind", weatherSpec.windSpeed);                                                        
 987             o.put("wdir", weatherSpec.windDirection);                                                    
 988             o.put("loc", weatherSpec.location);                                                          
 989             uartTxJSON("onSendWeather", o);                                                              
 990         } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                      
 991             LOG.info("JSONException: " + e.getLocalizedMessage());                                       
 992         }                                                                                                
 993     }                                                                                                    
 994                                                                                                          
 995     public Bitmap textToBitmap(String text) {                                                            
 996         Paint paint = new Paint(0); // Paint.ANTI_ALIAS_FLAG not wanted as 1bpp                          
 997         paint.setTextSize(18);                                                                           
 998         paint.setColor(0xFFFFFFFF);                                                                      
 999         paint.setTextAlign(Paint.Align.LEFT);                                                            
1000         float baseline = -paint.ascent(); // ascent() is negative                                        
1001         int width = (int) (paint.measureText(text) + 0.5f); // round                                     
1002         int height = (int) (baseline + paint.descent() + 0.5f);                                          
1003         Bitmap image = Bitmap.createBitmap(width, height, Bitmap.Config.ARGB_8888);                      
1004         Canvas canvas = new Canvas(image);                                                               
1005         canvas.drawText(text, 0, baseline, paint);                                                       
1006         return image;                                                                                    
1007     }                                                                                                    
1008                                                                                                          
1009     public enum BangleJSBitmapStyle {                                                                    
1010         MONOCHROME,                                                                                      
1011         RGB_3BPP                                                                                         
1012     };;                                                                                                  
1013                                                                                                          
1014     /** Used for writing single bits to an array */                                                      
1015     public static class BitWriter {                                                                      
1016         int n;                                                                                           
1017         byte[] bits;                                                                                     
1018         int currentByte, bitIdx;                                                                         
1019                                                                                                          
1020         public BitWriter(byte[] array, int offset) {                                                     
1021             bits = array;                                                                                
1022             n = offset;                                                                                  
1023         }                                                                                                
1024                                                                                                          
1025         public void push(boolean v) {                                                                    
1026             currentByte = (currentByte << 1) | (v?1:0);                                                  
1027             bitIdx++;                                                                                    
1028             if (bitIdx == 8) {                                                                           
1029                 bits[n++] = (byte)currentByte;                                                           
1030                 bitIdx = 0;                                                                              
1031                 currentByte = 0;                                                                         
1032             }                                                                                            
1033         }                                                                                                
1034                                                                                                          
1035         public void finish() {                                                                           
1036             if (bitIdx > 0) bits[n++] = (byte)currentByte;                                               
1037         }                                                                                                
1038     }                                                                                                    
1039                                                                                                          
1040     /** Convert an Android bitmap to a base64 string for use in Espruino.                                
1041      * Currently only 1bpp, no scaling */                                                                
1042     public static byte[] bitmapToEspruinoArray(Bitmap bitmap, BangleJSBitmapStyle style) {               
1043         int width = bitmap.getWidth();                                                                   
1044         int height = bitmap.getHeight();                                                                 
1045         int bpp = (style==BangleJSBitmapStyle.RGB_3BPP) ? 3 : 1;                                         
1046         byte pixels[] = new byte[width * height];                                                        
1047         final byte PIXELCOL_TRANSPARENT = -1;                                                            
1048         final int ditherMatrix[] = {1*16,5*16,7*16,3*16}; // for bayer dithering                         
1049         // if doing 3bpp, check image to see if it's transparent                                         
1050         boolean allowTransparency = (style != BangleJSBitmapStyle.MONOCHROME);                           
1051         boolean isTransparent = false;                                                                   
1052         byte transparentColorIndex = 0;                                                                  
1053         /* Work out what colour index each pixel should be and write to pixels.                          
1054          Also figure out if we're transparent at all, and how often each color is used */                
1055         int colUsage[] = new int[8];                                                                     
1056         int n = 0;                                                                                       
1057         for (int y = 0; y < height; y++) {                                                               
1058             for (int x = 0; x < width; x++) {                                                            
1059                 int pixel = bitmap.getPixel(x, y);                                                       
1060                 int r = pixel & 255;                                                                     
1061                 int g = (pixel >> 8) & 255;                                                              
1062                 int b = (pixel >> 16) & 255;                                                             
1063                 int a = (pixel >> 24) & 255;                                                             
1064                 boolean pixelTransparent = allowTransparency && (a < 128);                               
1065                 if (pixelTransparent) {                                                                  
1066                     isTransparent = true;                                                                
1067                     r = g = b = 0;                                                                       
1068                 }                                                                                        
1069                 // do dithering here                                                                     
1070                 int ditherAmt = ditherMatrix[(x&1) + (y&1)*2];                                           
1071                 r += ditherAmt;                                                                          
1072                 g += ditherAmt;                                                                          
1073                 b += ditherAmt;                                                                          
1074                 int col = 0;                                                                             
1075                 if (style == BangleJSBitmapStyle.MONOCHROME)                                             
1076                     col = ((r+g+b) >= 768)?1:0;                                                          
1077                 else if (style == BangleJSBitmapStyle.RGB_3BPP)                                          
1078                     col = ((r>=256)?1:0) | ((g>=256)?2:0) | ((b>=256)?4:0);                              
1079                 if (!pixelTransparent) colUsage[col]++; // if not transparent, record usage              
1080                 // save colour, mark transparent separately                                              
1081                 pixels[n++] = (byte)(pixelTransparent ? PIXELCOL_TRANSPARENT : col);                     
1082             }                                                                                            
1083         }                                                                                                
1084         // if we're transparent, find the least-used color, and use that for transparency                
1085         if (isTransparent) {                                                                             
1086             // find least used                                                                           
1087             int minColUsage = -1;                                                                        
1088             for (int c=0;c<8;c++) {                                                                      
1089                 if (minColUsage<0 || colUsage[c]<minColUsage) {                                          
1090                     minColUsage = colUsage[c];                                                           
1091                     transparentColorIndex = (byte)c;                                                     
1092                 }                                                                                        
1093             }                                                                                            
1094             // rewrite any transparent pixels as the correct color for transparency                      
1095             for (n=0;n<pixels.length;n++)                                                                
1096                 if (pixels[n]==PIXELCOL_TRANSPARENT)                                                     
1097                     pixels[n] = transparentColorIndex;                                                   
1098         }                                                                                                
1099         // Write the header                                                                              
1100         int headerLen = isTransparent ? 4 : 3;                                                           
1101         byte bmp[] = new byte[(((height * width * bpp) + 7) >> 3) + headerLen];                          
1102         bmp[0] = (byte)width;                                                                            
1103         bmp[1] = (byte)height;                                                                           
1104         bmp[2] = (byte)(bpp + (isTransparent?128:0));                                                    
1105         if (isTransparent) bmp[3] = transparentColorIndex;                                               
1106         // Now write the image out bit by bit                                                            
1107         BitWriter bits = new BitWriter(bmp, headerLen);                                                  
1108         n = 0;                                                                                           
1109         for (int y = 0; y < height; y++) {                                                               
1110             for (int x = 0; x < width; x++) {                                                            
1111                 int pixel = pixels[n++];                                                                 
1112                 for (int b=bpp-1;b>=0;b--)                                                               
1113                     bits.push(((pixel>>b)&1) != 0);                                                      
1114             }                                                                                            
1115         }                                                                                                
1116         return bmp;                                                                                      
1117     }                                                                                                    
1118                                                                                                          
1119     /** Convert an Android bitmap to a base64 string for use in Espruino.                                
1120      * Currently only 1bpp, no scaling */                                                                
1121     public static String bitmapToEspruinoString(Bitmap bitmap, BangleJSBitmapStyle style) {              
1122         return new String(bitmapToEspruinoArray(bitmap, style), StandardCharsets.ISO_8859_1);            
1123     }                                                                                                    
1124                                                                                                          
1125     /** Convert an Android bitmap to a base64 string for use in Espruino.                                
1126      * Currently only 1bpp, no scaling */                                                                
1127     public static String bitmapToEspruinoBase64(Bitmap bitmap, BangleJSBitmapStyle style) {              
1128         return Base64.encodeToString(bitmapToEspruinoArray(bitmap, style), Base64.DEFAULT).replaceAll("\n🔵
1129     }                                                                                                    
1130                                                                                                          
1131     /** Convert a drawable to a bitmap, for use with bitmapToEspruino */                                 
1132     public static Bitmap drawableToBitmap(Drawable drawable) {                                           
1133         final int maxWidth = 32;                                                                         
1134         final int maxHeight = 32;                                                                        
1135         /* Return bitmap directly but only if it's small enough. It could be                             
1136         we have a bitmap but it's just too big to send direct to the bangle */                           
1137         if (drawable instanceof BitmapDrawable) {                                                        
1138             BitmapDrawable bitmapDrawable = (BitmapDrawable) drawable;                                   
1139             Bitmap bmp = bitmapDrawable.getBitmap();                                                     
1140             if (bmp != null && bmp.getWidth()<=maxWidth && bmp.getHeight()<=maxHeight)                   
1141                 return bmp;                                                                              
1142         }                                                                                                
1143         /* Otherwise render this to a bitmap ourselves.. work out size */                                
1144         int w = maxWidth;                                                                                
1145         int h = maxHeight;                                                                               
1146         if (drawable.getIntrinsicWidth() > 0 && drawable.getIntrinsicHeight() > 0) {                     
1147             w = drawable.getIntrinsicWidth();                                                            
1148             h = drawable.getIntrinsicHeight();                                                           
1149             // don't allocate anything too big, but keep the ratio                                       
1150             if (w>maxWidth) {                                                                            
1151                 h = h * maxWidth / w;                                                                    
1152                 w = maxWidth;                                                                            
1153             }                                                                                            
1154             if (h>maxHeight) {                                                                           
1155                 w = w * maxHeight / h;                                                                   
1156                 h = maxHeight;                                                                           
1157             }                                                                                            
1158         }                                                                                                
1159         /* render */                                                                                     
1160         Bitmap bitmap = Bitmap.createBitmap(w, h, Bitmap.Config.ARGB_8888); // Single color bitmap will b🔵
1161         Canvas canvas = new Canvas(bitmap);                                                              
1162         drawable.setBounds(0, 0, canvas.getWidth(), canvas.getHeight());                                 
1163         drawable.draw(canvas);                                                                           
1164         return bitmap;                                                                                   
1165     }                                                                                                    
1166 }

 114                                                                                                          
 115 public class BangleJSDeviceSupport extends AbstractBTLEDeviceSupport {                                   
 116     private static final Logger LOG = LoggerFactory.getLogger(BangleJSDeviceSupport.class);              
 117                                                                                                          
 118     private BluetoothGattCharacteristic rxCharacteristic = null;                                         
 119                                                                                                          
 120     private BluetoothGattCharacteristic txCharacteristic = null;                                         
 121                                                                                                          
 122     private boolean allowHighMTU = false;                                                                
 123                                                                                                          
 124     private int mtuSize = 20;                                                                            
 125                                                                                                          
 126     // to attempt to stop duplicate packets when sending Local Intents                                   
 127     int bangleCommandSeq = 0;                                                                            
 128                                                                                                          
 129     // / Current line of data received from Bangle.js                                                    
 130     private String receivedLine = "";                                                                    
 131                                                                                                          
 132     /// All characters received from Bangle.js for debug purposes (limited to MAX_RECEIVE_HISTORY_CHARS).🔵
 133     private String receiveHistory = "";                                                                  
 134                                                                                                          
 135     private boolean realtimeHRM = false;                                                                 
 136                                                                                                          
 137     private boolean realtimeStep = false;                                                                
 138                                                                                                          
 139     private int realtimeHRMInterval = 30*60;                                                             
 140                                                                                                          
 141     /* Long */                                                                                           
 142     private final LimitedQueue mNotificationReplyAction = new LimitedQueue(16);                          
 143                                                                                                          
 144     /// Maximum amount of characters to store in receiveHistory                                          
 145     public static final int MAX_RECEIVE_HISTORY_CHARS = 100000;                                          
 146                                                                                                          
 147     // Local Intents - for app manager communication                                                     
 148     // Local Intents - for app manager communication                                                     
 149     public static final String BANGLEJS_COMMAND_TX = "banglejs_command_tx";                              
 150                                                                                                          
 151     public static final String BANGLEJS_COMMAND_RX = "banglejs_command_rx";                              
 152                                                                                                          
 153     // Global Intents                                                                                    
 154     // Global Intents                                                                                    
 155     private static final String BANGLE_ACTION_UART_TX = "com.banglejs.uart.tx";                          
 156                                                                                                          
 157     public BangleJSDeviceSupport() {                                                                     
 158         super(LOG);                                                                                      
 159         addSupportedService(BangleJSConstants.UUID_SERVICE_NORDIC_UART);                                 
 160         registerLocalIntents();                                                                          
 161         registerGlobalIntents();                                                                         
 162     }                                                                                                    
 163                                                                                                          
 164     private void registerLocalIntents() {                                                                
 165         IntentFilter commandFilter = new IntentFilter();                                                 
 166         commandFilter.addAction(GBDevice.ACTION_DEVICE_CHANGED);                                         
 167         commandFilter.addAction(BANGLEJS_COMMAND_TX);                                                    
 168         BroadcastReceiver commandReceiver = new BroadcastReceiver() {                                    
 169             @Override                                                                                    
 170             public void onReceive(Context context, Intent intent) {                                      
 171                 switch (intent.getAction()) {                                                            
 172                     case BANGLEJS_COMMAND_TX :                                                           
 173                         {                                                                                
 174                             String data = String.valueOf(intent.getExtras().get("DATA"));                
 175                             try {                                                                        
 176                                 TransactionBuilder builder = performInitialized("TX");                   
 177                                 uartTx(builder, data);                                                   
 178                                 builder.queue(getQueue());                                               
 179                             } catch (IOException e) {                                                    
 180                                 GB.toast(getContext(), "Error in TX: " + e.getLocalizedMessage(), Toast.L🔵
 181                             }                                                                            
 182                             break;                                                                       
 183                         }                                                                                
 184                     case GBDevice.ACTION_DEVICE_CHANGED :                                                
 185                         {                                                                                
 186                             LOG.info("ACTION_DEVICE_CHANGED " + gbDevice.getStateString());              
 187                             receiveHistory += ((("\n||||||| BASE                                         
 188 /*d94z9sk0k4hf9j3ijd - note the base isn't actually empty, spork simply doesn't generate a base - gd930kw🔵
 189 =======                                                                                                  
 190 ||||||| BASE                                                                                             
 191 /*d94z9sk0k4hf9j3ijd - note the base isn't actually empty, spork simply doesn't generate a base - gd930kw🔵
 192 =======                                                                                                  
 193 ||||||| BASE                                                                                             
 194 /*d94z9sk0k4hf9j3ijd - note the base isn't actually empty, spork simply doesn't generate a base - gd930kw🔵
 195 =======                                                                                                  
 196 ||||||| BASE                                                                                             
 197 /*d94z9sk0k4hf9j3ijd - note the base isn't actually empty, spork simply doesn't generate a base - gd930kw🔵
 198 =======                                                                                                  
 199 ||||||| BASE                                                                                             
 200 /*d94z9sk0k4hf9j3ijd - note the base isn't actually empty, spork simply doesn't generate a base - gd930kw🔵
 201 =======                                                                                                  
 202 ||||||| BASE                                                                                             
 203 /*d94z9sk0k4hf9j3ijd - note the base isn't actually empty, spork simply doesn't generate a base - gd930kw🔵
 204 =======                                                                                                  
 205 ======\nACTION_DEVICE_CHANGED " + gbDevice.getStateString()) + " ") + new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-mm-dd hh🔵
 206 /*d94z9sk0k4hf9j3ijd - note the base isn't actually empty, spork simply doesn't generate a base - gd930kw🔵
 207 =======                                                                                                  
 208 ||||||| BASE                                                                                             
 209 /*d94z9sk0k4hf9j3ijd - note the base isn't actually empty, spork simply doesn't generate a base - gd930kw🔵
 210 =======                                                                                                  
 211 ||||||| BASE                                                                                             
 212 /*d94z9sk0k4hf9j3ijd - note the base isn't actually empty, spork simply doesn't generate a base - gd930kw🔵
 213 =======                                                                                                  
 214 ||||||| BASE                                                                                             
 215 /*d94z9sk0k4hf9j3ijd - note the base isn't actually empty, spork simply doesn't generate a base - gd930kw🔵
 216 =======                                                                                                  
 217 ||||||| BASE                                                                                             
 218 /*d94z9sk0k4hf9j3ijd - note the base isn't actually empty, spork simply doesn't generate a base - gd930kw🔵
 219 =======                                                                                                  
 220 ||||||| BASE                                                                                             
 221 /*d94z9sk0k4hf9j3ijd - note the base isn't actually empty, spork simply doesn't generate a base - gd930kw🔵
 222 =======                                                                                                  
 223 ======\n";                                                                                               
 224                         }                                                                                
 225                 }                                                                                        
 226             }                                                                                            
 227         };                                                                                               
 228         LocalBroadcastManager.getInstance(GBApplication.getContext()).registerReceiver(commandReceiver, c🔵
 229     }                                                                                                    
 230                                                                                                          
 231     private void registerGlobalIntents() {                                                               
 232         IntentFilter commandFilter = new IntentFilter();                                                 
 233         commandFilter.addAction(BANGLE_ACTION_UART_TX);                                                  
 234         BroadcastReceiver commandReceiver = new BroadcastReceiver() {                                    
 235             @Override                                                                                    
 236             public void onReceive(Context context, Intent intent) {                                      
 237                 switch (intent.getAction()) {                                                            
 238                     case BANGLE_ACTION_UART_TX: {                                                        
 239                         /* In Tasker:                                                                    
 240                           Action: com.banglejs.uart.tx                                                   
 241                           Cat: None                                                                      
 242                           Extra: line:Terminal.println(%avariable)                                       
 243                           Target: Broadcast Receiver                                                     
 244                                                                                                          
 245                           Variable: Number, Configure on Import, NOT structured, Value set, Nothing Expor🔵
 246                          */                                                                              
 247                         Prefs devicePrefs = new Prefs(GBApplication.getDeviceSpecificSharedPrefs(gbDevice🔵
 248                         if (!devicePrefs.getBoolean(PREF_DEVICE_INTENTS, false)) return;                 
 249                         String data = intent.getStringExtra("line");                                     
 250                         if (data==null) {                                                                
 251                             GB.toast(getContext(), "UART TX Intent, but no 'line' supplied", Toast.LENGTH🔵
 252                             return;                                                                      
 253                         }                                                                                
 254                         if (!data.endsWith("\n")) data += "\n";                                          
 255                         try {                                                                            
 256                             TransactionBuilder builder = performInitialized("TX");                       
 257                             uartTx(builder, data);                                                       
 258                             builder.queue(getQueue());                                                   
 259                         } catch (IOException e) {                                                        
 260                             GB.toast(getContext(), "Error in TX: " + e.getLocalizedMessage(), Toast.LENGT🔵
 261                         }                                                                                
 262                         break;                                                                           
 263                     }                                                                                    
 264                 }                                                                                        
 265             }                                                                                            
 266         };                                                                                               
 267         GBApplication.getContext().registerReceiver(commandReceiver, commandFilter);                     
 268     }                                                                                                    
 269                                                                                                          
 270     @Override                                                                                            
 271     protected TransactionBuilder initializeDevice(TransactionBuilder builder) {                          
 272         LOG.info("Initializing");                                                                        
 273                                                                                                          
 274         gbDevice.setState(GBDevice.State.INITIALIZING);                                                  
 275         gbDevice.sendDeviceUpdateIntent(getContext());                                                   
 276         gbDevice.setBatteryThresholdPercent((short) 30);                                                 
 277                                                                                                          
 278         rxCharacteristic = getCharacteristic(BangleJSConstants.UUID_CHARACTERISTIC_NORDIC_UART_RX);      
 279         txCharacteristic = getCharacteristic(BangleJSConstants.UUID_CHARACTERISTIC_NORDIC_UART_TX);      
 280         builder.setGattCallback(this);                                                                   
 281         builder.notify(rxCharacteristic, true);                                                          
 282                                                                                                          
 283         Prefs devicePrefs = new Prefs(GBApplication.getDeviceSpecificSharedPrefs(gbDevice.getAddress()));
 284         allowHighMTU = devicePrefs.getBoolean(PREF_ALLOW_HIGH_MTU, false);                               
 285                                                                                                          
 286         uartTx(builder, " \u0003"); // clear active line                                                 
 287                                                                                                          
 288         Prefs prefs = GBApplication.getPrefs();                                                          
 289         if (prefs.getBoolean("datetime_synconconnect", true))                                            
 290           transmitTime(builder);                                                                         
 291         //sendSettings(builder);                                                                         
 292                                                                                                          
 293         // get version                                                                                   
 294                                                                                                          
 295         gbDevice.setState(GBDevice.State.INITIALIZED);                                                   
 296         gbDevice.sendDeviceUpdateIntent(getContext());                                                   
 297                                                                                                          
 298         getDevice().setFirmwareVersion("N/A");                                                           
 299         getDevice().setFirmwareVersion2("N/A");                                                          
 300                                                                                                          
 301         LOG.info("Initialization Done");                                                                 
 302                                                                                                          
 303         return builder;                                                                                  
 304     }                                                                                                    
 305                                                                                                          
 306     /// Write a string of data, and chunk it up                                                          
 307     private void uartTx(TransactionBuilder builder, String str) {                                        
 308         byte[] bytes = str.getBytes(StandardCharsets.ISO_8859_1);                                        
 309         LOG.info("UART TX: " + str);                                                                     
 310         // FIXME: somehow this is still giving us UTF8 data when we put images in strings. Maybe JSON.str🔵
 311         for (int i = 0; i < bytes.length; i += mtuSize) {                                                
 312             int l = bytes.length - i;                                                                    
 313             if (l > mtuSize) {                                                                           
 314                 l = mtuSize;                                                                             
 315             }                                                                                            
 316             byte[] packet = new byte[l];                                                                 
 317             System.arraycopy(bytes, i, packet, 0, l);                                                    
 318             builder.write(txCharacteristic, packet);                                                     
 319         }                                                                                                
 320     }                                                                                                    
 321                                                                                                          
 322     // / Converts an object to a JSON string. see jsonToString                                           
 323     private String jsonToStringInternal(Object v) {                                                      
 324         // else int/double/null                                                                          
 325         if (v instanceof String) {                                                                       
 326             /* Convert a string, escaping chars we can't send over out UART connection */                
 327             String s = ((String) (v));                                                                   
 328             String json = "\"";                                                                          
 329             for (int i = 0; i < s.length(); i++) {                                                       
 330                 int ch = ((int) (s.charAt(i)));                                                          
 331                 if (ch < 8) {                                                                            
 332                     json += "\\" + ch;                                                                   
 333                 } else if (ch == 8) {                                                                    
 334                     json += "\\b";                                                                       
 335                 } else if (ch == 9) {                                                                    
 336                     json += "\\t";                                                                       
 337                 } else if (ch == 10) {                                                                   
 338                     json += "\\n";                                                                       
 339                 } else if (ch == 11) {                                                                   
 340                     json += "\\v";                                                                       
 341                 } else if (ch == 12) {
