 342                     json += "\\f";                                                                       
 343                 } else if (ch == 34) {                                                                   
 344                     json += "\\\"";                                                                      
 345                 } else if (ch == 92) {                                                                   
 346                     json += "\\\\";                                                                      
 347                 } else if (((((ch < 32) || (ch == 26)) || (ch == 27)) || (ch == 127)) || (ch == 173)) {  
 348                     json += "\\x" + Integer.toHexString((ch & 255) | 256).substring(1);                  
 349                 } else {                                                                                 
 350                     json += s.charAt(i);                                                                 
 351                 }                                                                                        
 352             }                                                                                            
 353             return json + "\"";                                                                          
 354         } else if (v instanceof JSONArray) {                                                             
 355             JSONArray a = ((JSONArray) (v));                                                             
 356             String json = "[";                                                                           
 357             for (int i = 0; i < a.length(); i++) {                                                       
 358                 if (i > 0) {                                                                             
 359                     json += ",";                                                                         
 360                 }                                                                                        
 361                 Object o = null;                                                                         
 362                 try {                                                                                    
 363                     o = a.get(i);                                                                        
 364                 } catch (JSONException e) {                                                              
 365                     LOG.warn("jsonToString array error: " + e.getLocalizedMessage());                    
 366                 }                                                                                        
 367                 json += jsonToStringInternal(o);                                                         
 368             }                                                                                            
 369             return json + "]";                                                                           
 370         } else if (v instanceof JSONObject) {                                                            
 371             JSONObject obj = ((JSONObject) (v));                                                         
 372             String json = "{";                                                                           
 373             Iterator<String> iter = obj.keys();                                                          
 374             while (iter.hasNext()) {                                                                     
 375                 String key = iter.next();                                                                
 376                 Object o = null;                                                                         
 377                 try {                                                                                    
 378                     o = obj.get(key);                                                                    
 379                 } catch (JSONException e) {                                                              
 380                     LOG.warn("jsonToString object error: " + e.getLocalizedMessage());                   
 381                 }                                                                                        
 382                 json += (key + ":") + jsonToStringInternal(o);                                           
 383                 if (iter.hasNext()) {                                                                    
 384                     json += ",";                                                                         
 385                 }                                                                                        
 386             }                                                                                            
 387             return json + "}";                                                                           
 388         }                                                                                                
 389         return v.toString();                                                                             
 390     }                                                                                                    
 391                                                                                                          
 392     /// Convert a JSON object to a JSON String (NOT 100% JSON compliant)                                 
 393     public String jsonToString(JSONObject jsonObj) {                                                     
 394         /* jsonObj.toString() works but breaks char codes>128 (encodes as UTF8?) and also uses           
 395         \u0000 when just \0 would do (and so on).                                                        
 396                                                                                                          
 397         So we do it manually, which can be more compact anyway.                                          
 398         This is JSON-ish, so not exactly as per JSON1 spec but good enough for Espruino.                 
 399          */                                                                                              
 400         return jsonToStringInternal(jsonObj);                                                            
 401     }                                                                                                    
 402                                                                                                          
 403     /// Write a JSON object of data                                                                      
 404     private void uartTxJSON(String taskName, JSONObject json) {                                          
 405         try {                                                                                            
 406             TransactionBuilder builder = performInitialized(taskName);                                   
 407             uartTx(builder, "\u0010GB("+jsonToString(json)+")\n");                                       
 408             builder.queue(getQueue());                                                                   
 409         } catch (IOException e) {                                                                        
 410             GB.toast(getContext(), "Error in "+taskName+": " + e.getLocalizedMessage(), Toast.LENGTH_LONG🔵
 411         }                                                                                                
 412     }                                                                                                    
 413                                                                                                          
 414     /// Write JSON object of the form {t:taskName, err:message}                                          
 415                                                                                                          
 416     private void uartTxJSONError(String taskName, String message) {                                      
 417         uartTxJSONError(taskName,message,null);                                                          
 418     }                                                                                                    
 419                                                                                                          
 420     private void uartTxJSONError(String taskName, String message,String id) {                            
 421         JSONObject o = new JSONObject();                                                                 
 422         try {                                                                                            
 423             o.put("t", taskName);                                                                        
 424             if( id!=null)                                                                                
 425                 o.put("id", id);                                                                         
 426             o.put("err", message);                                                                       
 427         } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                      
 428             GB.toast(getContext(), "uartTxJSONError: " + e.getLocalizedMessage(), Toast.LENGTH_LONG, GB.E🔵
 429         }                                                                                                
 430         uartTxJSON(taskName, o);                                                                         
 431     }                                                                                                    
 432                                                                                                          
 433     private void handleUartRxLine(String line) {                                                         
 434         LOG.info("UART RX LINE: " + line);                                                               
 435         if (line.length() == 0) {                                                                        
 436             return;                                                                                      
 437         }                                                                                                
 438         if (">Uncaught ReferenceError: \"GB\" is not defined".equals(line)) {                            
 439             GB.toast(getContext(), "Gadgetbridge plugin not installed on Bangle.js", Toast.LENGTH_LONG, G🔵
 440         } else if (line.charAt(0) == '{') {                                                              
 441             // JSON - we hope!                                                                           
 442             try {                                                                                        
 443                 JSONObject json = new JSONObject(line);                                                  
 444                 LOG.info("UART RX JSON parsed successfully");                                            
 445                 handleUartRxJSON(json);                                                                  
 446             } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                  
 447                 LOG.info("UART RX JSON parse failure: " + e.getLocalizedMessage());                      
 448                 GB.toast(getContext(), "Malformed JSON from Bangle.js: " + e.getLocalizedMessage(), Toast🔵
 449             }                                                                                            
 450         } else {                                                                                         
 451             LOG.info(("UART RX line started with " + ((int) (line.charAt(0)))) + " - ignoring");         
 452         }                                                                                                
 453     }                                                                                                    
 454                                                                                                          
 455     private void handleUartRxJSON(JSONObject json) throws JSONException {                                
 456         String packetType = json.getString("t");                                                         
 457         switch (packetType) {                                                                            
 458             case "info" :                                                                                
 459                 GB.toast(getContext(), "Bangle.js: " + json.getString("msg"), Toast.LENGTH_LONG, GB.INFO)🔵
 460                 break;                                                                                   
 461             case "warn" :                                                                                
 462                 GB.toast(getContext(), "Bangle.js: " + json.getString("msg"), Toast.LENGTH_LONG, GB.WARN)🔵
 463                 break;                                                                                   
 464             case "error" :                                                                               
 465                 GB.toast(getContext(), "Bangle.js: " + json.getString("msg"), Toast.LENGTH_LONG, GB.ERROR🔵
 466                 break;                                                                                   
 467             case "ver" :                                                                                 
 468                 {                                                                                        
 469                     if (json.has("fw1")) {                                                               
 470                         getDevice().setFirmwareVersion(json.getString("fw1"));                           
 471                     }                                                                                    
 472                     if (json.has("fw2")) {                                                               
 473                         getDevice().setFirmwareVersion2(json.getString("fw2"));                          
 474                     }                                                                                    
 475                 }                                                                                        
 476                 break;                                                                                   
 477             case "status" :                                                                              
 478                 {                                                                                        
 479                     GBDeviceEventBatteryInfo batteryInfo = new GBDeviceEventBatteryInfo();               
 480                     if (json.has("bat")) {                                                               
 481                         int b = json.getInt("bat");                                                      
 482                         if (b < 0) {                                                                     
 483                             b = 0;                                                                       
 484                         }                                                                                
 485                         if (b > 100) {                                                                   
 486                             b = 100;                                                                     
 487                         }                                                                                
 488                         batteryInfo.level = b;                                                           
 489                         batteryInfo.state = BatteryState.BATTERY_NORMAL;                                 
 490                     }                                                                                    
 491                     if (json.has("chg") && (json.getInt("chg") == 1)) {                                  
 492                         batteryInfo.state = BatteryState.BATTERY_CHARGING;                               
 493                     }                                                                                    
 494                     if (json.has("volt")) {                                                              
 495                         batteryInfo.voltage = ((float) (json.getDouble("volt")));                        
 496                     }                                                                                    
 497                     handleGBDeviceEvent(batteryInfo);                                                    
 498                 }                                                                                        
 499                 break;                                                                                   
 500             case "findPhone" :                                                                           
 501                 {                                                                                        
 502                     boolean start = json.has("n") && json.getBoolean("n");                               
 503                     GBDeviceEventFindPhone deviceEventFindPhone = new GBDeviceEventFindPhone();          
 504                     deviceEventFindPhone.event = (start) ? GBDeviceEventFindPhone.Event.START : GBDeviceE🔵
 505                     evaluateGBDeviceEvent(deviceEventFindPhone);                                         
 506                 }                                                                                        
 507                 break;                                                                                   
 508             case "music" :                                                                               
 509                 {                                                                                        
 510                     GBDeviceEventMusicControl deviceEventMusicControl = new GBDeviceEventMusicControl(); 
 511                     deviceEventMusicControl.event = GBDeviceEventMusicControl.Event.valueOf(json.getStrin🔵
 512                     evaluateGBDeviceEvent(deviceEventMusicControl);                                      
 513                 }                                                                                        
 514                 break;                                                                                   
 515             case "call" :                                                                                
 516                 {                                                                                        
 517                     GBDeviceEventCallControl deviceEventCallControl = new GBDeviceEventCallControl();    
 518                     deviceEventCallControl.event = GBDeviceEventCallControl.Event.valueOf(json.getString(🔵
 519                     evaluateGBDeviceEvent(deviceEventCallControl);                                       
 520                 }                                                                                        
 521                 break;                                                                                   
 522             case "notify" :                                                                              
 523                 {                                                                                        
 524                     GBDeviceEventNotificationControl deviceEvtNotificationControl = new GBDeviceEventNoti🔵
 525                     // .title appears unused                                                             
 526                     deviceEvtNotificationControl.event = GBDeviceEventNotificationControl.Event.valueOf(j🔵
 527                     if (json.has("id")) {                                                                
 528                         deviceEvtNotificationControl.handle = json.getInt("id");                         
 529                     }                                                                                    
 530                     if (json.has("tel")) {                                                               
 531                         deviceEvtNotificationControl.phoneNumber = json.getString("tel");                
 532                     }                                                                                    
 533                     if (json.has("msg")) {                                                               
 534                         deviceEvtNotificationControl.reply = json.getString("msg");                      
 535                     }                                                                                    
 536                 /* REPLY responses don't use the ID from the event (MUTE/etc seem to), but instead       
 537                 * they use a handle that was provided in an action list on the onNotification.. event  */
 538                     if (deviceEvtNotificationControl.event == GBDeviceEventNotificationControl.Event.REPL🔵
 539                         Long foundHandle = ((Long) (mNotificationReplyAction.lookup(((int) (deviceEvtNoti🔵
 540                         if (foundHandle != null) {                                                       
 541                             deviceEvtNotificationControl.handle = foundHandle;                           
 542                         }                                                                                
 543                     }                                                                                    
 544                     evaluateGBDeviceEvent(deviceEvtNotificationControl);                                 
 545                 }                                                                                        
 546                 break;                                                                                   
 547             case "act" :                                                                                 
 548                 {                                                                                        
 549                     BangleJSActivitySample sample = new BangleJSActivitySample();                        
 550                     sample.setTimestamp(((int) (GregorianCalendar.getInstance().getTimeInMillis() / 1000L🔵
 551                     int hrm = 0;                                                                         
 552                     int steps = 0;                                                                       
 553                     if (json.has("hrm")) {                                                               
 554                         hrm = json.getInt("hrm");                                                        
 555                     }                                                                                    
 556                     if (json.has("stp")) {                                                               
 557                         steps = json.getInt("stp");                                                      
 558                     }                                                                                    
 559                     int activity = BangleJSSampleProvider.TYPE_ACTIVITY;                                 
 560                     /* if (json.has("act")) {                                                            
 561                     String actName = "TYPE_" + json.getString("act").toUpperCase();                      
 562                     try {                                                                                
 563                     Field f = ActivityKind.class.getField(actName);                                      
 564                     try {                                                                                
 565                     activity = f.getInt(null);                                                           
 566                     } catch (IllegalAccessException e) {                                                 
 567                     LOG.info("JSON activity '"+actName+"' not readable");                                
 568                     }                                                                                    
 569                     } catch (NoSuchFieldException e) {                                                   
 570                     LOG.info("JSON activity '"+actName+"' not found");                                   
 571                     }                                                                                    
 572                     }                                                                                    
 573                      */                                                                                  
 574                     sample.setRawKind(activity);                                                         
 575                     sample.setHeartRate(hrm);                                                            
 576                     sample.setSteps(steps);                                                              
 577                     try (final DBHandler dbHandler = GBApplication.acquireDB()) {                        
 578                         Long userId = getUser(dbHandler.getDaoSession()).getId();                        
 579                         Long deviceId = DBHelper.getDevice(getDevice(), dbHandler.getDaoSession()).getId(🔵
 580                         BangleJSSampleProvider provider = new BangleJSSampleProvider(getDevice(), dbHandl🔵
 581                         sample.setDeviceId(deviceId);                                                    
 582                         sample.setUserId(userId);                                                        
 583                         provider.addGBActivitySample(sample);                                            
 584                     } catch (java.lang.Exception ex) {                                                   
 585                         LOG.warn("Error saving activity: " + ex.getLocalizedMessage());                  
 586                     }                                                                                    
 587                     // push realtime data                                                                
 588                     if (realtimeHRM || realtimeStep) {                                                   
 589                         Intent intent = new Intent(DeviceService.ACTION_REALTIME_SAMPLES).putExtra(Device🔵
 590                         LocalBroadcastManager.getInstance(getContext()).sendBroadcast(intent);           
 591                     }                                                                                    
 592                 }                                                                                        
 593                 break;                                                                                   
 594             case "http" :                                                                                
 595                 {                                                                                        
 596                     Prefs devicePrefs = new Prefs(GBApplication.getDeviceSpecificSharedPrefs(gbDevice.get🔵
 597                     String _id = null;                                                                   
 598                     try {                                                                                
 599                         _id = json.getString("id");                                                      
 600                     } catch (JSONException e) {                                                          
 601                     }                                                                                    
 602                     final String id = _id;                                                               
 603                     if (BuildConfig.INTERNET_ACCESS && devicePrefs.getBoolean(PREF_DEVICE_INTERNET_ACCESS🔵
 604                         RequestQueue queue = Volley.newRequestQueue(getContext());                       
 605                         String url = json.getString("url");                                              
 606                         String _xmlPath = "";                                                            
 607                         try {                                                                            
 608                             _xmlPath = json.getString("xpath");                                          
 609                         } catch (JSONException e) {                                                      
 610                         }                                                                                
 611                         final String xmlPath = _xmlPath;                                                 
 612                         // Request a string response from the provided URL.                              
 613                         StringRequest stringRequest = new StringRequest(Request.Method.GET, url, new Resp🔵
 614                             @Override                                                                    
 615                             public void onResponse(String response) {                                    
 616                                 JSONObject o = new JSONObject();                                         
 617                                 if (xmlPath.length() != 0) {                                             
 618                                     try {                                                                
 619                                         InputSource inputXML = new InputSource(new StringReader(response)🔵
 620                                         XPath xPath = XPathFactory.newInstance().newXPath();             
 621                                         response = xPath.evaluate(xmlPath, inputXML);                    
 622                                     } catch ( error) {                                                   
 623                                         uartTxJSONError("http", error.toString(), id);                   
 624                                         return;                                                          
 625                                     }                                                                    
 626                                 }                                                                        
 627                                 try {                                                                    
 628                                     o.put("t", "http");                                                  
 629                                     if (id != null) {                                                    
 630                                         o.put("id", id);                                                 
 631                                     }                                                                    
 632                                     o.put("resp", response);                                             
 633                                 } catch ( e) {                                                           
 634                                     GB.toast(getContext(), "HTTP: " + e.getLocalizedMessage(), Toast.LENG🔵
 635                                 }                                                                        
 636                                 uartTxJSON("http", o);                                                   
 637                             }                                                                            
 638                         }, new Response.ErrorListener() {                                                
 639                             @Override                                                                    
 640                             public void onErrorResponse(VolleyError error) {                             
 641                                 JSONObject o = new JSONObject();                                         
 642                                 uartTxJSONError("http", error.toString(), id);                           
 643                             }                                                                            
 644                         });                                                                              
 645                         queue.add(stringRequest);                                                        
 646                     } else if (BuildConfig.INTERNET_ACCESS) {                                            
 647                         uartTxJSONError("http", "Internet access not enabled, check Gadgetbridge Device S🔵
 648                     } else {                                                                             
 649                         uartTxJSONError("http", "Internet access not enabled in this Gadgetbridge build",🔵
 650                     }                                                                                    
 651                 }                                                                                        
 652                 break;                                                                                   
 653             case "intent" :                                                                              
 654                 {                                                                                        
 655                     Prefs devicePrefs = new Prefs(GBApplication.getDeviceSpecificSharedPrefs(gbDevice.get🔵
 656                     if (devicePrefs.getBoolean(PREF_DEVICE_INTENTS, false)) {                            
 657                         String action = json.getString("action");                                        
 658                         JSONObject extra = json.getJSONObject("extra");                                  
 659                         Intent in = new Intent();                                                        
 660                         in.setAction(action);                                                            
 661                         if (extra != null) {                                                             
 662                             Iterator<String> iter = extra.keys();                                        
 663                             while (iter.hasNext()) {                                                     
 664                                 String key = iter.next();                                                
 665                                 in.putExtra(key, extra.getString(key));                                  
 666                             }                                                                            
 667                         }                                                                                
 668                         LOG.info("Sending intent " + action);                                            
 669                         this.getContext().getApplicationContext().sendBroadcast(in);                     
 670                     } else {                                                                             
 671                         uartTxJSONError("intent", "Android Intents not enabled, check Gadgetbridge Device🔵
 672                     }                                                                                    
 673                 }                                                                                        
 674             default :                                                                                    
 675                 {                                                                                        
 676                     LOG.info(("UART RX JSON packet type '" + packetType) + "' not understood.");         
 677                 }                                                                                        
 678         }                                                                                                
 679     }                                                                                                    
 680                                                                                                          
 681     @Override                                                                                            
 682     public boolean onCharacteristicChanged(BluetoothGatt gatt, BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic🔵
 683         if (super.onCharacteristicChanged(gatt, characteristic)) {                                       
 684             return true;                                                                                 
 685         }                                                                                                
 686         if (BangleJSConstants.UUID_CHARACTERISTIC_NORDIC_UART_RX.equals(characteristic.getUuid())) {     
 687             byte[] chars = characteristic.getValue();                                                    
 688             // check to see if we get more data - if so, increase out MTU for sending                    
 689             if (allowHighMTU && (chars.length > mtuSize)) {                                              
 690                 mtuSize = chars.length;                                                                  
 691             }                                                                                            
 692             String packetStr = new String(chars);                                                        
 693             LOG.info("RX: " + packetStr);                                                                
 694             // logging                                                                                   
 695             receiveHistory += packetStr;                                                                 
 696             if (receiveHistory.length() > MAX_RECEIVE_HISTORY_CHARS) {                                   
 697                 receiveHistory = receiveHistory.substring(receiveHistory.length() - MAX_RECEIVE_HISTORY_C🔵
 698             }                                                                                            
 699             // split into input lines                                                                    
 700             receivedLine += packetStr;                                                                   
 701             while (receivedLine.contains("\n")) {                                                        
 702                 int p = receivedLine.indexOf("\n");                                                      
 703                 String line = receivedLine.substring(0, p - 1);                                          
 704                 receivedLine = receivedLine.substring(p + 1);                                            
 705                 handleUartRxLine(line);                                                                  
 706             }                                                                                            
 707             // Send an intent with new data                                                              
 708             Intent intent = new Intent(BangleJSDeviceSupport.BANGLEJS_COMMAND_RX);                       
 709             intent.putExtra("DATA", packetStr);                                                          
 710             intent.putExtra("SEQ", bangleCommandSeq++);                                                  
 711             LocalBroadcastManager.getInstance(getContext()).sendBroadcast(intent);                       
 712         }                                                                                                
 713         return false;                                                                                    
 714     }                                                                                                    
 715                                                                                                          
 716     void transmitTime(TransactionBuilder builder) {                                                      
 717       long ts = System.currentTimeMillis();                                                              
 718       float tz = SimpleTimeZone.getDefault().getOffset(ts) / (1000 * 60 * 60.0f);                        
 719       // set time                                                                                        
 720       String cmd = "\u0010setTime("+(ts/1000)+");";                                                      
 721       // set timezone                                                                                    
 722       cmd += "E.setTimeZone("+tz+");";                                                                   
 723       // write timezone to settings                                                                      
 724       cmd += "(s=>{s&&(s.timezone="+tz+")&&require('Storage').write('setting.json',s);})(require('Storage🔵
 725       uartTx(builder, cmd+"\n");                                                                         
 726     }                                                                                                    
 727                                                                                                          
 728     @Override                                                                                            
 729     public boolean useAutoConnect() {                                                                    
 730         return true;                                                                                     
 731     }                                                                                                    
 732                                                                                                          
 733     private String renderUnicodeWordAsImage(String word) {                                               
 734         // check for emoji                                                                               
 735         boolean hasEmoji = false;                                                                        
 736         if (EmojiUtils.getAllEmojis() == null) {                                                         
 737             EmojiManager.initEmojiData(GBApplication.getContext());                                      
 738         }                                                                                                
 739         for (Emoji emoji : EmojiUtils.getAllEmojis()) {                                                  
 740             if (word.contains(emoji.getEmoji())) {                                                       
 741                 hasEmoji = true;                                                                         
 742             }                                                                                            
 743         }                                                                                                
 744         // if we had emoji, ensure we create 3 bit color (not 1 bit B&W)                                 
 745         return "\u0000" + bitmapToEspruinoString(textToBitmap(word), hasEmoji ? BangleJSBitmapStyle.RGB_3🔵
 746     }                                                                                                    
 747                                                                                                          
 748     public String renderUnicodeAsImage(String txt) {                                                     
 749         if (txt == null) {                                                                               
 750             return null;                                                                                 
 751         }                                                                                                
 752         /* If we're not doing conversion, pass this right back (we use the EmojiConverter                
 753         As we would have done if BangleJSCoordinator.supportsUnicodeEmojis had reported false            
 754          */                                                                                              
 755         Prefs devicePrefs = new Prefs(GBApplication.getDeviceSpecificSharedPrefs(gbDevice.getAddress()));
 756         if (!devicePrefs.getBoolean(PREF_BANGLEJS_TEXT_BITMAP, false)) {                                 
 757             return EmojiConverter.convertUnicodeEmojiToAscii(txt, GBApplication.getContext());           
 758         }                                                                                                
 759         // Otherwise split up and check each word                                                        
 760         String word = "";                                                                                
 761         String result = "";                                                                              
 762         boolean needsTranslate = false;                                                                  
 763         for (int i = 0; i < txt.length(); i++) {                                                         
 764             char ch = txt.charAt(i);                                                                     
 765             if (" -_/:.,?!\'\"&*()".indexOf(ch) >= 0) {                                                  
 766                 // word split                                                                            
 767                 if (needsTranslate) {                                                                    
 768                 // convert word                                                                          
 769                     result += renderUnicodeWordAsImage(word) + ch;                                       
 770                 } else {                                                                                 
 771                 // or just copy across                                                                   
 772                     result += word + ch;                                                                 
 773                 }                                                                                        
 774                 word = "";                                                                               
 775                 needsTranslate = false;                                                                  
 776             } else {                                                                                     
 777                 // TODO: better check?                                                                   
 778                 if ((ch < 0) || (ch > 255)) {                                                            
 779                     needsTranslate = true;                                                               
 780                 }                                                                                        
 781                 word += ch;                                                                              
 782             }                                                                                            
 783         }                                                                                                
 784         if (needsTranslate) {                                                                            
 785             // convert word                                                                              
 786             result += renderUnicodeWordAsImage(word);                                                    
 787         } else {                                                                                         
 788         // or just copy across                                                                           
 789             result += word;                                                                              
 790         }                                                                                                
 791         return result;                                                                                   
 792     }                                                                                                    
 793                                                                                                          
 794     @Override                                                                                            
 795     public void onNotification(NotificationSpec notificationSpec) {                                      
 796         for (int i = 0; i < notificationSpec.attachedActions.size(); i++) {                              
 797             NotificationSpec.Action action = notificationSpec.attachedActions.get(i);                    
 798             // wow. This should be easier!                                                               
 799             if (action.type == NotificationSpec.Action.TYPE_WEARABLE_REPLY) {                            
 800                 mNotificationReplyAction.add(notificationSpec.getId(), new Long(((((long) (notificationSp🔵
 801             }                                                                                            
 802         }                                                                                                
 803         try {                                                                                            
 804             JSONObject o = new JSONObject();                                                             
 805             o.put("t", "notify");                                                                        
 806             o.put("id", notificationSpec.getId());                                                       
 807             o.put("src", notificationSpec.sourceName);                                                   
 808             o.put("title", renderUnicodeAsImage(notificationSpec.title));                                
 809             o.put("subject", renderUnicodeAsImage(notificationSpec.subject));                            
 810             o.put("body", renderUnicodeAsImage(notificationSpec.body));                                  
 811             o.put("sender", renderUnicodeAsImage(notificationSpec.sender));                              
 812             o.put("tel", notificationSpec.phoneNumber);                                                  
 813             uartTxJSON("onNotification", o);                                                             
 814         } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                      
 815             LOG.info("JSONException: " + e.getLocalizedMessage());                                       
 816         }                                                                                                
 817     }                                                                                                    
 818                                                                                                          
 819     @Override                                                                                            
 820     public void onDeleteNotification(int id) {                                                           
 821         try {                                                                                            
 822             JSONObject o = new JSONObject();                                                             
 823             o.put("t", "notify-");                                                                       
 824             o.put("id", id);                                                                             
 825             uartTxJSON("onDeleteNotification", o);                                                       
 826         } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                      
 827             LOG.info("JSONException: " + e.getLocalizedMessage());                                       
 828         }                                                                                                
 829     }                                                                                                    
 830                                                                                                          
 831     @Override                                                                                            
 832     public void onSetTime() {                                                                            
 833         try {                                                                                            
 834             TransactionBuilder builder = performInitialized("setTime");                                  
 835             transmitTime(builder);                                                                       
 836             builder.queue(getQueue());                                                                   
 837         } catch (Exception e) {                                                                          
 838             GB.toast(getContext(), "Error setting time: " + e.getLocalizedMessage(), Toast.LENGTH_LONG, G🔵
 839         }                                                                                                
 840     }                                                                                                    
 841                                                                                                          
 842     @Override                                                                                            
 843     public void onSetAlarms(ArrayList<? extends Alarm> alarms) {                                         
 844         try {                                                                                            
 845             JSONObject o = new JSONObject();                                                             
 846             o.put("t", "alarm");                                                                         
 847             JSONArray jsonalarms = new JSONArray();                                                      
 848             o.put("d", jsonalarms);                                                                      
 849                                                                                                          
 850             for (Alarm alarm : alarms) {                                                                 
 851                 if (!alarm.getEnabled()) continue;                                                       
 852                 JSONObject jsonalarm = new JSONObject();                                                 
 853                 jsonalarms.put(jsonalarm);                                                               
 854                                                                                                          
 855                 Calendar calendar = AlarmUtils.toCalendar(alarm);                                        
 856                                                                                                          
 857                 jsonalarm.put("h", alarm.getHour());                                                     
 858                 jsonalarm.put("m", alarm.getMinute());                                                   
 859                 jsonalarm.put("rep", alarm.getRepetition());                                             
 860             }                                                                                            
 861             uartTxJSON("onSetAlarms", o);                                                                
 862         } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                      
 863             LOG.info("JSONException: " + e.getLocalizedMessage());                                       
 864         }                                                                                                
 865     }                                                                                                    
 866                                                                                                          
 867     @Override                                                                                            
 868     public void onSetCallState(CallSpec callSpec) {                                                      
 869         try {                                                                                            
 870             JSONObject o = new JSONObject();                                                             
 871             o.put("t", "call");                                                                          
 872             String cmdName = "";                                                                         
 873             try {                                                                                        
 874                 Field fields[] = callSpec.getClass().getDeclaredFields();                                
 875                 for (Field field : fields)                                                               
 876                     if (field.getName().startsWith("CALL_") && field.getInt(callSpec) == callSpec.command🔵
 877                         cmdName = field.getName().substring(5).toLowerCase();                            
 878             } catch (IllegalAccessException e) {}                                                        
 879             o.put("cmd", cmdName);                                                                       
 880             o.put("name", renderUnicodeAsImage(callSpec.name));                                          
 881             o.put("number", callSpec.number);                                                            
 882             uartTxJSON("onSetCallState", o);                                                             
 883         } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                      
 884             LOG.info("JSONException: " + e.getLocalizedMessage());                                       
 885         }                                                                                                
 886     }                                                                                                    
 887                                                                                                          
 888     @Override                                                                                            
 889     public void onSetCannedMessages(CannedMessagesSpec cannedMessagesSpec) {                             
 890                                                                                                          
 891     }                                                                                                    
 892                                                                                                          
 893     @Override                                                                                            
 894     public void onSetMusicState(MusicStateSpec stateSpec) {                                              
 895         try {                                                                                            
 896             JSONObject o = new JSONObject();                                                             
 897             o.put("t", "musicstate");                                                                    
 898             int musicState = stateSpec.state;                                                            
 899             String[] musicStates = {"play", "pause", "stop", ""};                                        
 900             if (musicState<0) musicState=3;                                                              
 901             if (musicState>=musicStates.length) musicState = musicStates.length-1;                       
 902             o.put("state", musicStates[musicState]);                                                     
 903             o.put("position", stateSpec.position);                                                       
 904             o.put("shuffle", stateSpec.shuffle);                                                         
 905             o.put("repeat", stateSpec.repeat);                                                           
 906             uartTxJSON("onSetMusicState", o);                                                            
 907         } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                      
 908             LOG.info("JSONException: " + e.getLocalizedMessage());                                       
 909         }                                                                                                
 910     }                                                                                                    
 911                                                                                                          
 912     @Override                                                                                            
 913     public void onSetMusicInfo(MusicSpec musicSpec) {                                                    
 914         try {                                                                                            
 915             JSONObject o = new JSONObject();                                                             
 916             o.put("t", "musicinfo");                                                                     
 917             o.put("artist", renderUnicodeAsImage(musicSpec.artist));                                     
 918             o.put("album", renderUnicodeAsImage(musicSpec.album));                                       
 919             o.put("track", renderUnicodeAsImage(musicSpec.track));                                       
 920             o.put("dur", musicSpec.duration);                                                            
 921             o.put("c", musicSpec.trackCount);                                                            
 922             o.put("n", musicSpec.trackNr);                                                               
 923             uartTxJSON("onSetMusicInfo", o);                                                             
 924         } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                      
 925             LOG.info("JSONException: " + e.getLocalizedMessage());                                       
 926         }                                                                                                
 927     }                                                                                                    
 928                                                                                                          
 929     private void transmitActivityStatus() {                                                              
 930         try {                                                                                            
 931             JSONObject o = new JSONObject();                                                             
 932             o.put("t", "act");                                                                           
 933             o.put("hrm", realtimeHRM);                                                                   
 934             o.put("stp", realtimeStep);                                                                  
 935             o.put("int", realtimeHRMInterval);                                                           
 936             uartTxJSON("onEnableRealtimeSteps", o);                                                      
 937         } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                      
 938             LOG.info("JSONException: " + e.getLocalizedMessage());                                       
 939         }                                                                                                
 940     }                                                                                                    
 941                                                                                                          
 942     @Override                                                                                            
 943     public void onEnableRealtimeSteps(boolean enable) {                                                  
 944         if (enable == realtimeHRM) return;                                                               
 945         realtimeStep = enable;                                                                           
 946         transmitActivityStatus();                                                                        
 947     }

 978                                                                                                          
 979     @Override                                                                                            
 980     public void onFetchRecordedData(int dataTypes) {                                                     
 981         if (dataTypes == RecordedDataTypes.TYPE_DEBUGLOGS) {                                             
 982             File dir;                                                                                    
 983             try {                                                                                        
 984                 dir = FileUtils.getExternalFilesDir();                                                   
 985             } catch (IOException e) {                                                                    
 986                 return;                                                                                  
 987             }                                                                                            
 988             SimpleDateFormat dateFormat = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyyMMdd-HHmmss", Locale.US);            
 989             String filename = ("banglejs_debug_" + dateFormat.format(new Date())) + ".log";              
 990             File outputFile = new File(dir, filename);                                                   
 991             LOG.warn("Writing log to " + outputFile.toString());                                         
 992             try {                                                                                        
 993                 BufferedWriter writer = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(outputFile));                  
 994                 writer.write(receiveHistory);                                                            
 995                 writer.close();                                                                          
 996                 receiveHistory = "";                                                                     
 997                 GB.toast(getContext(), "Log written to " + filename, Toast.LENGTH_LONG, GB.INFO);        
 998             } catch (IOException e) {                                                                    
 999                 LOG.warn("Could not write to file", e);                                                  
1000                 return;                                                                                  
1001             }                                                                                            
1002         }                                                                                                
1003     }                                                                                                    
1004

1006     public void onReset(int flags) {                                                                     
1007                                                                                                          
1008     }

1011     public void onHeartRateTest() {                                                                      
1012                                                                                                          
1013     }                                                                                                    
1014                                                                                                          
1015     @Override                                                                                            
1016     public void onEnableRealtimeHeartRateMeasurement(boolean enable) {                                   
1017         if (enable == realtimeHRM) return;                                                               
1018         realtimeHRM = enable;                                                                            
1019         transmitActivityStatus();                                                                        
1020     }

1022     @Override                                                                                            
1023     public void onFindDevice(boolean start) {                                                            
1024         try {                                                                                            
1025             JSONObject o = new JSONObject();                                                             
1026             o.put("t", "find");                                                                          
1027             o.put("n", start);                                                                           
1028             uartTxJSON("onFindDevice", o);                                                               
1029         } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                      
1030             LOG.info("JSONException: " + e.getLocalizedMessage());                                       
1031         }                                                                                                
1032     }                                                                                                    
1033                                                                                                          
1034     @Override                                                                                            
1035     public void onSetConstantVibration(int integer) {                                                    
1036         try {                                                                                            
1037             JSONObject o = new JSONObject();                                                             
1038             o.put("t", "vibrate");                                                                       
1039             o.put("n", integer);                                                                         
1040             uartTxJSON("onSetConstantVibration", o);                                                     
1041         } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                      
1042             LOG.info("JSONException: " + e.getLocalizedMessage());                                       
1043         }                                                                                                
1044     }                                                                                                    
1045                                                                                                          
1046     @Override                                                                                            
1047     public void onScreenshotReq() {                                                                      
1048                                                                                                          
1049     }                                                                                                    
1050                                                                                                          
1051     @Override                                                                                            
1052     public void onEnableHeartRateSleepSupport(boolean enable) {                                          
1053                                                                                                          
1054     }                                                                                                    
1055

1058         realtimeHRMInterval = seconds;                                                                   
1059         transmitActivityStatus();                                                                        
1060     }
