1087     @Override                                                                                            
1088     public void onSendWeather(WeatherSpec weatherSpec) {                                                 
1089         try {                                                                                            
1090             JSONObject o = new JSONObject();                                                             
1091             o.put("t", "weather");                                                                       
1092             o.put("temp", weatherSpec.currentTemp);                                                      
1093             o.put("hum", weatherSpec.currentHumidity);                                                   
1094             o.put("code", weatherSpec.currentConditionCode);                                             
1095             o.put("txt", weatherSpec.currentCondition);                                                  
1096             o.put("wind", weatherSpec.windSpeed);                                                        
1097             o.put("wdir", weatherSpec.windDirection);                                                    
1098             o.put("loc", weatherSpec.location);                                                          
1099             uartTxJSON("onSendWeather", o);                                                              
1100         } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                      
1101             LOG.info("JSONException: " + e.getLocalizedMessage());                                       
1102         }                                                                                                
1103     }                                                                                                    
1104                                                                                                          
1105     public Bitmap textToBitmap(String text) {                                                            
1106         Paint paint = new Paint(0); // Paint.ANTI_ALIAS_FLAG not wanted as 1bpp                          
1107         paint.setTextSize(18);                                                                           
1108         paint.setColor(0xFFFFFFFF);                                                                      
1109         paint.setTextAlign(Paint.Align.LEFT);                                                            
1110         float baseline = -paint.ascent(); // ascent() is negative                                        
1111         int width = (int) (paint.measureText(text) + 0.5f); // round                                     
1112         int height = (int) (baseline + paint.descent() + 0.5f);                                          
1113         Bitmap image = Bitmap.createBitmap(width, height, Bitmap.Config.ARGB_8888);                      
1114         Canvas canvas = new Canvas(image);                                                               
1115         canvas.drawText(text, 0, baseline, paint);                                                       
1116         return image;                                                                                    
1117     }                                                                                                    
1118                                                                                                          
1119     public enum BangleJSBitmapStyle {                                                                    
1120                                                                                                          
1121         MONOCHROME,                                                                                      
1122         RGB_3BPP;}                                                                                       
1123                                                                                                          
1124     /** Used for writing single bits to an array */                                                      
1125     public static class BitWriter {                                                                      
1126         int n;                                                                                           
1127                                                                                                          
1128         byte[] bits;                                                                                     
1129                                                                                                          
1130         int currentByte;                                                                                 
1131                                                                                                          
1132         int bitIdx;                                                                                      
1133                                                                                                          
1134         public BitWriter(byte[] array, int offset) {                                                     
1135             bits = array;                                                                                
1136             n = offset;                                                                                  
1137         }                                                                                                
1138                                                                                                          
1139         public void push(boolean v) {                                                                    
1140             currentByte = (currentByte << 1) | (v ? 1 : 0);                                              
1141             bitIdx++;                                                                                    
1142             if (bitIdx == 8) {                                                                           
1143                 bits[n++] = ((byte) (currentByte));                                                      
1144                 bitIdx = 0;                                                                              
1145                 currentByte = 0;                                                                         
1146             }                                                                                            
1147         }                                                                                                
1148                                                                                                          
1149         public void finish() {                                                                           
1150             if (bitIdx > 0) {                                                                            
1151                 bits[n++] = ((byte) (currentByte));                                                      
1152             }                                                                                            
1153         }                                                                                                
1154     }                                                                                                    
1155                                                                                                          
1156     /** Convert an Android bitmap to a base64 string for use in Espruino.                                
1157      * Currently only 1bpp, no scaling */                                                                
1158     public static byte[] bitmapToEspruinoArray(Bitmap bitmap, BangleJSBitmapStyle style) {               
1159         int width = bitmap.getWidth();                                                                   
1160         int height = bitmap.getHeight();                                                                 
1161         int bpp = (style == BangleJSBitmapStyle.RGB_3BPP) ? 3 : 1;                                       
1162         byte[] pixels = new byte[width * height];                                                        
1163         final byte PIXELCOL_TRANSPARENT = -1;                                                            
1164         // for bayer dithering                                                                           
1165         final int[] ditherMatrix = new int[]{ 1 * 16, 5 * 16, 7 * 16, 3 * 16 };                          
1166         // if doing 3bpp, check image to see if it's transparent                                         
1167         boolean allowTransparency = style != BangleJSBitmapStyle.MONOCHROME;                             
1168         boolean isTransparent = false;                                                                   
1169         byte transparentColorIndex = 0;                                                                  
1170         /* Work out what colour index each pixel should be and write to pixels.                          
1171          Also figure out if we're transparent at all, and how often each color is used */                
1172         int[] colUsage = new int[8];                                                                     
1173         int n = 0;                                                                                       
1174         for (int y = 0; y < height; y++) {                                                               
1175             for (int x = 0; x < width; x++) {                                                            
1176                 int pixel = bitmap.getPixel(x, y);                                                       
1177                 int r = pixel & 255;                                                                     
1178                 int g = (pixel >> 8) & 255;                                                              
1179                 int b = (pixel >> 16) & 255;                                                             
1180                 int a = (pixel >> 24) & 255;                                                             
1181                 boolean pixelTransparent = allowTransparency && (a < 128);                               
1182                 if (pixelTransparent) {                                                                  
1183                     isTransparent = true;                                                                
1184                     r = g = b = 0;                                                                       
1185                 }                                                                                        
1186                 // do dithering here                                                                     
1187                 int ditherAmt = ditherMatrix[(x & 1) + ((y & 1) * 2)];                                   
1188                 r += ditherAmt;                                                                          
1189                 g += ditherAmt;                                                                          
1190                 b += ditherAmt;                                                                          
1191                 int col = 0;                                                                             
1192                 if (style == BangleJSBitmapStyle.MONOCHROME) {                                           
1193                     col = (((r + g) + b) >= 768) ? 1 : 0;                                                
1194                 } else if (style == BangleJSBitmapStyle.RGB_3BPP) {                                      
1195                     col = ((r >= 256 ? 1 : 0) | (g >= 256 ? 2 : 0)) | (b >= 256 ? 4 : 0);                
1196                 }                                                                                        
1197                 // if not transparent, record usage                                                      
1198                 if (!pixelTransparent) {                                                                 
1199                     colUsage[col]++;                                                                     
1200                 }                                                                                        
1201                 // save colour, mark transparent separately                                              
1202                 pixels[n++] = ((byte) ((pixelTransparent) ? PIXELCOL_TRANSPARENT : col));                
1203             }                                                                                            
1204         }                                                                                                
1205         // if we're transparent, find the least-used color, and use that for transparency                
1206         if (isTransparent) {                                                                             
1207             // find least used                                                                           
1208             int minColUsage = -1;                                                                        
1209             for (int c = 0; c < 8; c++) {                                                                
1210                 if ((minColUsage < 0) || (colUsage[c] < minColUsage)) {                                  
1211                     minColUsage = colUsage[c];                                                           
1212                     transparentColorIndex = ((byte) (c));                                                
1213                 }                                                                                        
1214             }                                                                                            
1215             // rewrite any transparent pixels as the correct color for transparency                      
1216             for (n = 0; n < pixels.length; n++) {                                                        
1217                 if (pixels[n] == PIXELCOL_TRANSPARENT) {                                                 
1218                     pixels[n] = transparentColorIndex;                                                   
1219                 }                                                                                        
1220             }                                                                                            
1221         }                                                                                                
1222         // Write the header                                                                              
1223         int headerLen = (isTransparent) ? 4 : 3;                                                         
1224         byte[] bmp = new byte[((((height * width) * bpp) + 7) >> 3) + headerLen];                        
1225         bmp[0] = ((byte) (width));                                                                       
1226         bmp[1] = ((byte) (height));                                                                      
1227         bmp[2] = ((byte) (bpp + (isTransparent ? 128 : 0)));                                             
1228         if (isTransparent) {                                                                             
1229             bmp[3] = transparentColorIndex;                                                              
1230         }                                                                                                
1231         // Now write the image out bit by bit                                                            
1232         BitWriter bits = new BitWriter(bmp, headerLen);                                                  
1233         n = 0;                                                                                           
1234         for (int y = 0; y < height; y++) {                                                               
1235             for (int x = 0; x < width; x++) {                                                            
1236                 int pixel = pixels[n++];                                                                 
1237                 for (int b = bpp - 1; b >= 0; b--) {                                                     
1238                     bits.push(((pixel >> b) & 1) != 0);                                                  
1239                 }                                                                                        
1240             }                                                                                            
1241         }                                                                                                
1242         return bmp;                                                                                      
1243     }                                                                                                    
1244                                                                                                          
1245     /** Convert an Android bitmap to a base64 string for use in Espruino.                                
1246      * Currently only 1bpp, no scaling */                                                                
1247     public static String bitmapToEspruinoString(Bitmap bitmap, BangleJSBitmapStyle style) {              
1248         return new String(bitmapToEspruinoArray(bitmap, style), StandardCharsets.ISO_8859_1);            
1249     }                                                                                                    
1250                                                                                                          
1251     /** Convert an Android bitmap to a base64 string for use in Espruino.                                
1252      * Currently only 1bpp, no scaling */                                                                
1253     public static String bitmapToEspruinoBase64(Bitmap bitmap, BangleJSBitmapStyle style) {              
1254         return Base64.encodeToString(bitmapToEspruinoArray(bitmap, style), Base64.DEFAULT).replaceAll("\n🔵
1255     }                                                                                                    
1256                                                                                                          
1257     /** Convert a drawable to a bitmap, for use with bitmapToEspruino */                                 
1258     public static Bitmap drawableToBitmap(Drawable drawable) {                                           
1259         final int maxWidth = 32;                                                                         
1260         final int maxHeight = 32;                                                                        
1261         /* Return bitmap directly but only if it's small enough. It could be                             
1262         we have a bitmap but it's just too big to send direct to the bangle */                           
1263         if (drawable instanceof BitmapDrawable) {                                                        
1264             BitmapDrawable bitmapDrawable = (BitmapDrawable) drawable;                                   
1265             Bitmap bmp = bitmapDrawable.getBitmap();                                                     
1266             if (bmp != null && bmp.getWidth()<=maxWidth && bmp.getHeight()<=maxHeight)                   
1267                 return bmp;                                                                              
1268         }                                                                                                
1269         /* Otherwise render this to a bitmap ourselves.. work out size */                                
1270         int w = maxWidth;                                                                                
1271         int h = maxHeight;                                                                               
1272         if (drawable.getIntrinsicWidth() > 0 && drawable.getIntrinsicHeight() > 0) {                     
1273             w = drawable.getIntrinsicWidth();                                                            
1274             h = drawable.getIntrinsicHeight();                                                           
1275             // don't allocate anything too big, but keep the ratio                                       
1276             if (w>maxWidth) {                                                                            
1277                 h = h * maxWidth / w;                                                                    
1278                 w = maxWidth;                                                                            
1279             }                                                                                            
1280             if (h>maxHeight) {                                                                           
1281                 w = w * maxHeight / h;                                                                   
1282                 h = maxHeight;                                                                           
1283             }                                                                                            
1284         }                                                                                                
1285         /* render */                                                                                     
1286         Bitmap bitmap = Bitmap.createBitmap(w, h, Bitmap.Config.ARGB_8888); // Single color bitmap will b🔵
1287         Canvas canvas = new Canvas(bitmap);                                                              
1288         drawable.setBounds(0, 0, canvas.getWidth(), canvas.getHeight());                                 
1289         drawable.draw(canvas);                                                                           
1290         return bitmap;                                                                                   
1291     }                                                                                                    
1292 }
ours vs. base theirs vs. base

 118  import javax.xml.xpath.XPath;

 120                                                                                                                    
 121  public class BangleJSDeviceSupport extends AbstractBTLEDeviceSupport {                                            
 122      private static final Logger LOG = LoggerFactory.getLogger(BangleJSDeviceSupport.class);                       
 123                                                                                                                    
 124      private BluetoothGattCharacteristic rxCharacteristic = null;                                                  
 125      private BluetoothGattCharacteristic txCharacteristic = null;                                                  
 126      private boolean allowHighMTU = false;                                                                         
 127      private int mtuSize = 20;                                                                                     
 128 -                                                                                                                  
 129 +    int bangleCommandSeq = 0; // to attempt to stop duplicate packets when sending Local Intents                  
 130 +                                                                                                                  
 131 +    /// Current line of data received from Bangle.js                                                              
 132      private String receivedLine = "";                                                                             
 133 +    /// All characters received from Bangle.js for debug purposes (limited to MAX_RECEIVE_HISTORY_CHARS). Can be d🔵
 134 +    private String receiveHistory = "";                                                                           
 135      private boolean realtimeHRM = false;                                                                          
 136      private boolean realtimeStep = false;                                                                         
 137      private int realtimeHRMInterval = 30*60;                                                                      





 138                                                                                                                    
 139 +    private final LimitedQueue/*Long*/ mNotificationReplyAction = new LimitedQueue(16);                           
 140 +                                                                                                                  
 141 +    /// Maximum amount of characters to store in receiveHistory                                                   
 142 +    public static final int MAX_RECEIVE_HISTORY_CHARS = 100000;                                                   
 143      // Local Intents - for app manager communication                                                              
 144      public static final String BANGLEJS_COMMAND_TX = "banglejs_command_tx";                                       
 145      public static final String BANGLEJS_COMMAND_RX = "banglejs_command_rx";                                       
 146      // Global Intents                                                                                             
 147      private static final String BANGLE_ACTION_UART_TX = "com.banglejs.uart.tx";                                   
 148                                                                                                                    
 149      public BangleJSDeviceSupport() {                                                                              
 150          super(LOG);                                                                                               
 151          addSupportedService(BangleJSConstants.UUID_SERVICE_NORDIC_UART);                                          
 152                                                                                                                    
 153          registerLocalIntents();                                                                                   
 154          registerGlobalIntents();                                                                                  
 155      }                                                                                                             
 156                                                                                                                    
 157      private void registerLocalIntents() {                                                                         
 158          IntentFilter commandFilter = new IntentFilter();                                                          
 159 +        commandFilter.addAction(GBDevice.ACTION_DEVICE_CHANGED);                                                  
 160          commandFilter.addAction(BANGLEJS_COMMAND_TX);                                                             
 161          BroadcastReceiver commandReceiver = new BroadcastReceiver() {                                             
 162              @Override                                                                                             
 163              public void onReceive(Context context, Intent intent) {                                               
 164                  switch (intent.getAction()) {                                                                     
 165                      case BANGLEJS_COMMAND_TX: {                                                                   
 166                          String data = String.valueOf(intent.getExtras().get("DATA"));                             
 167                          try {                                                                                     
 168                              TransactionBuilder builder = performInitialized("TX");                                
 169                              uartTx(builder, data);                                                                
 170                              builder.queue(getQueue());                                                            
 171                          } catch (IOException e) {                                                                 
 172                              GB.toast(getContext(), "Error in TX: " + e.getLocalizedMessage(), Toast.LENGTH_LONG, G🔵
 173                          }                                                                                         
 174                          break;                                                                                    
 175 +                    }                                                                                             
 176 +                    case GBDevice.ACTION_DEVICE_CHANGED: {                                                        
 177 +                        LOG.info("ACTION_DEVICE_CHANGED " + gbDevice.getStateString());                           
 178 +                        receiveHistory += "\n================================================\nACTION_DEVICE_CHANG🔵
 179                      }                                                                                             
 180                  }                                                                                                 
 181              }                                                                                                     
 182          };                                                                                                        
 183          LocalBroadcastManager.getInstance(GBApplication.getContext()).registerReceiver(commandReceiver, commandFil🔵
 184      }                                                                                                             
 185                                                                                                                    
 186      private void registerGlobalIntents() {                                                                        
 187          IntentFilter commandFilter = new IntentFilter();                                                          
 188          commandFilter.addAction(BANGLE_ACTION_UART_TX);                                                           
 189          BroadcastReceiver commandReceiver = new BroadcastReceiver() {                                             
 190              @Override                                                                                             
 191              public void onReceive(Context context, Intent intent) {                                               
 192                  switch (intent.getAction()) {                                                                     
 193                      case BANGLE_ACTION_UART_TX: {                                                                 
 194                          /* In Tasker:                                                                             
 195                            Action: com.banglejs.uart.tx                                                            
 196                            Cat: None                                                                               
 197                            Extra: line:Terminal.println(%avariable)                                                
 198                            Target: Broadcast Receiver                                                              
 199                                                                                                                    
 200                            Variable: Number, Configure on Import, NOT structured, Value set, Nothing Exported, NOT 🔵
 201                           */                                                                                       
 202                          Prefs devicePrefs = new Prefs(GBApplication.getDeviceSpecificSharedPrefs(gbDevice.getAddre🔵
 203                          if (!devicePrefs.getBoolean(PREF_DEVICE_INTENTS, false)) return;                          
 204                          String data = intent.getStringExtra("line");                                              
 205                          if (data==null) {                                                                         
 206                              GB.toast(getContext(), "UART TX Intent, but no 'line' supplied", Toast.LENGTH_LONG, GB🔵
 207                              return;                                                                               
 208                          }                                                                                         
 209                          if (!data.endsWith("\n")) data += "\n";                                                   
 210                          try {                                                                                     
 211                              TransactionBuilder builder = performInitialized("TX");                                
 212                              uartTx(builder, data);                                                                
 213                              builder.queue(getQueue());                                                            
 214                          } catch (IOException e) {                                                                 
 215                              GB.toast(getContext(), "Error in TX: " + e.getLocalizedMessage(), Toast.LENGTH_LONG, G🔵
 216                          }                                                                                         
 217                          break;                                                                                    
 218                      }                                                                                             
 219                  }                                                                                                 
 220              }                                                                                                     
 221          };                                                                                                        
 222          GBApplication.getContext().registerReceiver(commandReceiver, commandFilter);                              
 223      }                                                                                                             
 224                                                                                                                    
 225      @Override                                                                                                     
 226      protected TransactionBuilder initializeDevice(TransactionBuilder builder) {                                   
 227          LOG.info("Initializing");                                                                                 
 228                                                                                                                    
 229          gbDevice.setState(GBDevice.State.INITIALIZING);                                                           
 230          gbDevice.sendDeviceUpdateIntent(getContext());                                                            
 231          gbDevice.setBatteryThresholdPercent((short) 30);                                                          
 232                                                                                                                    
 233          rxCharacteristic = getCharacteristic(BangleJSConstants.UUID_CHARACTERISTIC_NORDIC_UART_RX);               
 234          txCharacteristic = getCharacteristic(BangleJSConstants.UUID_CHARACTERISTIC_NORDIC_UART_TX);               
 235          builder.setGattCallback(this);                                                                            
 236          builder.notify(rxCharacteristic, true);                                                                   
 237                                                                                                                    
 238          Prefs devicePrefs = new Prefs(GBApplication.getDeviceSpecificSharedPrefs(gbDevice.getAddress()));         
 239          allowHighMTU = devicePrefs.getBoolean(PREF_ALLOW_HIGH_MTU, false);                                        
 240                                                                                                                    
 241          uartTx(builder, " \u0003"); // clear active line                                                          
 242                                                                                                                    
 243          Prefs prefs = GBApplication.getPrefs();                                                                   
 244          if (prefs.getBoolean("datetime_synconconnect", true))                                                     
 245            transmitTime(builder);                                                                                  
 246          //sendSettings(builder);                                                                                  
 247                                                                                                                    
 248          // get version                                                                                            
 249                                                                                                                    
 250          gbDevice.setState(GBDevice.State.INITIALIZED);                                                            
 251          gbDevice.sendDeviceUpdateIntent(getContext());                                                            
 252                                                                                                                    
 253          getDevice().setFirmwareVersion("N/A");                                                                    
 254          getDevice().setFirmwareVersion2("N/A");                                                                   
 255                                                                                                                    
 256          LOG.info("Initialization Done");                                                                          
 257                                                                                                                    
 258          return builder;                                                                                           
 259      }                                                                                                             
 260                                                                                                                    
 261      /// Write a string of data, and chunk it up                                                                   
 262      private void uartTx(TransactionBuilder builder, String str) {                                                 
 263 +        byte[] bytes = str.getBytes(StandardCharsets.ISO_8859_1);                                                 
 264          LOG.info("UART TX: " + str);                                                                              
 265 -        byte[] bytes;                                                                                             
 266 -        bytes = str.getBytes(StandardCharsets.ISO_8859_1);                                                        
 267          // FIXME: somehow this is still giving us UTF8 data when we put images in strings. Maybe JSON.stringify is🔵
 268          for (int i=0;i<bytes.length;i+=mtuSize) {                                                                 
 269              int l = bytes.length-i;                                                                               
 270              if (l>mtuSize) l=mtuSize;                                                                             
 271              byte[] packet = new byte[l];                                                                          
 272              System.arraycopy(bytes, i, packet, 0, l);                                                             
 273              builder.write(txCharacteristic, packet);                                                              
 274          }                                                                                                         
 275      }

 277 -                                                                                                                  
 278 -    /// Write a string of data, and chunk it up                                                                   
 279 +    /// Converts an object to a JSON string. see jsonToString                                                     
 280 +    private String jsonToStringInternal(Object v) {                                                               
 281 +        if (v instanceof String) {                                                                                
 282 +            /* Convert a string, escaping chars we can't send over out UART connection */                         
 283 +            String s = (String)v;                                                                                 
 284 +            String json = "\"";                                                                                   
 285 +            for (int i=0;i<s.length();i++) {                                                                      
 286 +                int ch = (int)s.charAt(i);                                                                        
 287 +                if (ch<8) json += "\\"+ch;                                                                        
 288 +                else if (ch==8) json += "\\b";                                                                    
 289 +                else if (ch==9) json += "\\t";                                                                    
 290 +                else if (ch==10) json += "\\n";                                                                   
 291 +                else if (ch==11) json += "\\v";                                                                   
 292 +                else if (ch==12) json += "\\f";                                                                   
 293 +                else if (ch==34) json += "\\\""; // quote                                                         
 294 +                else if (ch==92) json += "\\\\"; // slash                                                         
 295 +                else if (ch<32 || ch==26 || ch==27 || ch==127 || ch==173) json += "\\x"+Integer.toHexString((ch&25🔵
 296 +                else json += s.charAt(i);                                                                         
 297 +            }                                                                                                     
 298 +            return json + "\"";                                                                                   
 299 +        } else if (v instanceof JSONArray) {                                                                      
 300 +            JSONArray a = (JSONArray)v;                                                                           
 301 +            String json = "[";                                                                                    
 302 +            for (int i=0;i<a.length();i++) {                                                                      
 303 +                if (i>0) json += ",";                                                                             
 304 +                Object o = null;                                                                                  
 305 +                try {                                                                                             
 306 +                    o = a.get(i);                                                                                 
 307 +                } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                       
 308 +                    LOG.warn("jsonToString array error: " + e.getLocalizedMessage());                             
 309 +                }                                                                                                 
 310 +                json += jsonToStringInternal(o);                                                                  
 311 +            }                                                                                                     
 312 +            return json+"]";                                                                                      
 313 +        } else if (v instanceof JSONObject) {                                                                     
 314 +            JSONObject obj = (JSONObject)v;                                                                       
 315 +            String json = "{";                                                                                    
 316 +            Iterator<String> iter = obj.keys();                                                                   
 317 +            while (iter.hasNext()) {                                                                              
 318 +                String key = iter.next();                                                                         
 319 +                Object o = null;                                                                                  
 320 +                try {                                                                                             
 321 +                    o = obj.get(key);                                                                             
 322 +                } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                       
 323 +                    LOG.warn("jsonToString object error: " + e.getLocalizedMessage());                            
 324 +                }                                                                                                 
 325 +                json += key+":"+jsonToStringInternal(o);                                                          
 326 +                if (iter.hasNext()) json+=",";                                                                    
 327 +            }                                                                                                     
 328 +            return json+"}";                                                                                      
 329 +        } // else int/double/null                                                                                 
 330 +        return v.toString();                                                                                      
 331 +    }                                                                                                             
 332 +                                                                                                                  
 333 +    /// Convert a JSON object to a JSON String (NOT 100% JSON compliant)                                          
 334      public String jsonToString(JSONObject jsonObj) {                                                              
 335 -        String json = jsonObj.toString();                                                                         
 336 -        // toString creates '\u0000' instead of '\0'                                                              
 337 -        // FIXME: there have got to be nicer ways of handling this - maybe we just make our own JSON.toString (see🔵
 338 -        json = json.replaceAll("\\\\u000([01234567])", "\\\\$1");                                                 
 339 -        json = json.replaceAll("\\\\u00([0123456789abcdef][0123456789abcdef])", "\\\\x$1");                       
 340 -        return json;                                                                                              
 341 -        /*String json = "{";                                                                                      
 342 -        Iterator<String> iter = jsonObj.keys();                                                                   
 343 -        while (iter.hasNext()) {                                                                                  
 344 -            String key = iter.next();                                                                             
 345 -            Object v = jsonObj.get(key);                                                                          
 346 -            if (v instanceof Integer) {                                                                           
 347 -                // ...                                                                                            
 348 -            } else // ..                                                                                          
 349 -            if (iter.hasNext()) json+=",";                                                                        
 350 -        }                                                                                                         
 351 -        return json+"}";*/                                                                                        
 352 +        /* jsonObj.toString() works but breaks char codes>128 (encodes as UTF8?) and also uses                    
 353 +        \u0000 when just \0 would do (and so on).                                                                 
 354 +                                                                                                                  
 355 +        So we do it manually, which can be more compact anyway.                                                   
 356 +        This is JSON-ish, so not exactly as per JSON1 spec but good enough for Espruino.                          
 357 +        */                                                                                                        
 358 +        return jsonToStringInternal(jsonObj);                                                                     
 359      }                                                                                                             
 360                                                                                                                    
 361      /// Write a JSON object of data                                                                               
 362      private void uartTxJSON(String taskName, JSONObject json) {                                                   
 363          try {                                                                                                     
 364              TransactionBuilder builder = performInitialized(taskName);                                            
 365              uartTx(builder, "\u0010GB("+jsonToString(json)+")\n");                                                
 366              builder.queue(getQueue());                                                                            
 367          } catch (IOException e) {                                                                                 
 368              GB.toast(getContext(), "Error in "+taskName+": " + e.getLocalizedMessage(), Toast.LENGTH_LONG, GB.ERRO🔵
 369          }                                                                                                         
 370      }                                                                                                             
 371                                                                                                                    
 372      /// Write JSON object of the form {t:taskName, err:message}                                                   
 373                                                                                                                    
 374      private void uartTxJSONError(String taskName, String message) {                                               
 375          uartTxJSONError(taskName,message,null);                                                                   
 376      }                                                                                                             
 377                                                                                                                    
 378      private void uartTxJSONError(String taskName, String message,String id) {                                     
 379          JSONObject o = new JSONObject();                                                                          
 380          try {                                                                                                     
 381              o.put("t", taskName);                                                                                 
 382              if( id!=null)                                                                                         
 383                  o.put("id", id);                                                                                  
 384              o.put("err", message);                                                                                
 385          } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                               
 386              GB.toast(getContext(), "uartTxJSONError: " + e.getLocalizedMessage(), Toast.LENGTH_LONG, GB.ERROR);   
 387          }                                                                                                         
 388          uartTxJSON(taskName, o);                                                                                  
 389      }
