 393      private void handleUartRxLine(String line) {                                                                  
 394          LOG.info("UART RX LINE: " + line);                                                                        
 395 -                                                                                                                  
 396 +        if (line.length()==0) return;                                                                             
 397          if (">Uncaught ReferenceError: \"GB\" is not defined".equals(line))                                       
 398            GB.toast(getContext(), "Gadgetbridge plugin not installed on Bangle.js", Toast.LENGTH_LONG, GB.ERROR);  
 399 -        else if (line.length() > 0 && line.charAt(0)=='{') {                                                      
 400 +        else if (line.charAt(0)=='{') {                                                                           
 401              // JSON - we hope!                                                                                    
 402              try {                                                                                                 
 403                  JSONObject json = new JSONObject(line);                                                           
 404                  LOG.info("UART RX JSON parsed successfully");                                                     
 405                  handleUartRxJSON(json);                                                                           
 406              } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                           
 407                  LOG.info("UART RX JSON parse failure: "+ e.getLocalizedMessage());                                
 408                  GB.toast(getContext(), "Malformed JSON from Bangle.js: " + e.getLocalizedMessage(), Toast.LENGTH_L🔵
 409              }                                                                                                     
 410          } else {                                                                                                  
 411              LOG.info("UART RX line started with "+(int)line.charAt(0)+" - ignoring");                             
 412          }                                                                                                         
 413      }                                                                                                             
 414                                                                                                                    
 415      private void handleUartRxJSON(JSONObject json) throws JSONException {                                         
 416          String packetType = json.getString("t");                                                                  
 417          switch (packetType) {                                                                                     
 418              case "info":                                                                                          
 419                  GB.toast(getContext(), "Bangle.js: " + json.getString("msg"), Toast.LENGTH_LONG, GB.INFO);        
 420                  break;                                                                                            
 421              case "warn":                                                                                          
 422                  GB.toast(getContext(), "Bangle.js: " + json.getString("msg"), Toast.LENGTH_LONG, GB.WARN);        
 423                  break;                                                                                            
 424              case "error":                                                                                         
 425                  GB.toast(getContext(), "Bangle.js: " + json.getString("msg"), Toast.LENGTH_LONG, GB.ERROR);       
 426                  break;                                                                                            
 427              case "ver": {                                                                                         
 428                  if (json.has("fw1"))                                                                              
 429                      getDevice().setFirmwareVersion(json.getString("fw1"));                                        
 430                  if (json.has("fw2"))                                                                              
 431                      getDevice().setFirmwareVersion2(json.getString("fw2"));                                       
 432              } break;                                                                                              
 433              case "status": {                                                                                      
 434                  GBDeviceEventBatteryInfo batteryInfo = new GBDeviceEventBatteryInfo();                            
 435                  if (json.has("bat")) {                                                                            
 436                      int b = json.getInt("bat");                                                                   
 437                      if (b < 0) b = 0;                                                                             
 438                      if (b > 100) b = 100;                                                                         
 439                      batteryInfo.level = b;                                                                        
 440                      batteryInfo.state = BatteryState.BATTERY_NORMAL;                                              
 441                  }                                                                                                 
 442                  if (json.has("chg") && json.getInt("chg") == 1) {                                                 
 443                      batteryInfo.state = BatteryState.BATTERY_CHARGING;                                            
 444                  }                                                                                                 
 445                  if (json.has("volt"))                                                                             
 446                      batteryInfo.voltage = (float) json.getDouble("volt");                                         
 447                  handleGBDeviceEvent(batteryInfo);                                                                 
 448              } break;                                                                                              
 449              case "findPhone": {                                                                                   
 450                  boolean start = json.has("n") && json.getBoolean("n");                                            
 451                  GBDeviceEventFindPhone deviceEventFindPhone = new GBDeviceEventFindPhone();                       
 452                  deviceEventFindPhone.event = start ? GBDeviceEventFindPhone.Event.START : GBDeviceEventFindPhone.E🔵
 453                  evaluateGBDeviceEvent(deviceEventFindPhone);                                                      
 454              } break;                                                                                              
 455              case "music": {                                                                                       
 456                  GBDeviceEventMusicControl deviceEventMusicControl = new GBDeviceEventMusicControl();              
 457                  deviceEventMusicControl.event = GBDeviceEventMusicControl.Event.valueOf(json.getString("n").toUppe🔵
 458                  evaluateGBDeviceEvent(deviceEventMusicControl);                                                   
 459              } break;                                                                                              
 460              case "call": {                                                                                        
 461                  GBDeviceEventCallControl deviceEventCallControl = new GBDeviceEventCallControl();                 
 462                  deviceEventCallControl.event = GBDeviceEventCallControl.Event.valueOf(json.getString("n").toUpperC🔵
 463                  evaluateGBDeviceEvent(deviceEventCallControl);                                                    
 464              } break;                                                                                              
 465              case "notify" : {                                                                                     
 466                  GBDeviceEventNotificationControl deviceEvtNotificationControl = new GBDeviceEventNotificationContr🔵
 467                  // .title appears unused                                                                          
 468                  deviceEvtNotificationControl.event = GBDeviceEventNotificationControl.Event.valueOf(json.getString🔵
 469                  if (json.has("id"))                                                                               
 470                      deviceEvtNotificationControl.handle = json.getInt("id");                                      
 471                  if (json.has("tel"))                                                                              
 472                      deviceEvtNotificationControl.phoneNumber = json.getString("tel");                             
 473                  if (json.has("msg"))                                                                              
 474                      deviceEvtNotificationControl.reply = json.getString("msg");                                   
 475 +                /* REPLY responses don't use the ID from the event (MUTE/etc seem to), but instead                
 476 +                * they use a handle that was provided in an action list on the onNotification.. event  */         
 477 +                if (deviceEvtNotificationControl.event == GBDeviceEventNotificationControl.Event.REPLY) {         
 478 +                    Long foundHandle = (Long)mNotificationReplyAction.lookup((int)deviceEvtNotificationControl.han🔵
 479 +                    if (foundHandle!=null)                                                                        
 480 +                        deviceEvtNotificationControl.handle = foundHandle;                                        
 481 +                }                                                                                                 
 482                  evaluateGBDeviceEvent(deviceEvtNotificationControl);                                              
 483              } break;                                                                                              
 484              case "act": {                                                                                         
 485                  BangleJSActivitySample sample = new BangleJSActivitySample();                                     
 486                  sample.setTimestamp((int) (GregorianCalendar.getInstance().getTimeInMillis() / 1000L));           
 487                  int hrm = 0;                                                                                      
 488                  int steps = 0;                                                                                    
 489                  if (json.has("hrm")) hrm = json.getInt("hrm");                                                    
 490                  if (json.has("stp")) steps = json.getInt("stp");                                                  
 491                  int activity = BangleJSSampleProvider.TYPE_ACTIVITY;                                              
 492                  /*if (json.has("act")) {                                                                          
 493                      String actName = "TYPE_" + json.getString("act").toUpperCase();                               
 494                      try {                                                                                         
 495                          Field f = ActivityKind.class.getField(actName);                                           
 496                          try {                                                                                     
 497                              activity = f.getInt(null);                                                            
 498                          } catch (IllegalAccessException e) {                                                      
 499                              LOG.info("JSON activity '"+actName+"' not readable");                                 
 500                          }                                                                                         
 501                      } catch (NoSuchFieldException e) {                                                            
 502                          LOG.info("JSON activity '"+actName+"' not found");                                        
 503                      }                                                                                             
 504                  }*/                                                                                               
 505                  sample.setRawKind(activity);                                                                      
 506                  sample.setHeartRate(hrm);                                                                         
 507                  sample.setSteps(steps);                                                                           
 508                  try (DBHandler dbHandler = GBApplication.acquireDB()) {                                           
 509                      Long userId = getUser(dbHandler.getDaoSession()).getId();                                     
 510                      Long deviceId = DBHelper.getDevice(getDevice(), dbHandler.getDaoSession()).getId();           
 511                      BangleJSSampleProvider provider = new BangleJSSampleProvider(getDevice(), dbHandler.getDaoSess🔵
 512                      sample.setDeviceId(deviceId);                                                                 
 513                      sample.setUserId(userId);                                                                     
 514                      provider.addGBActivitySample(sample);                                                         
 515                  } catch (Exception ex) {                                                                          
 516                      LOG.warn("Error saving activity: " + ex.getLocalizedMessage());                               
 517                  }                                                                                                 
 518                  // push realtime data                                                                             
 519                  if (realtimeHRM || realtimeStep) {                                                                
 520                      Intent intent = new Intent(DeviceService.ACTION_REALTIME_SAMPLES)                             
 521                              .putExtra(DeviceService.EXTRA_REALTIME_SAMPLE, sample);                               
 522                      LocalBroadcastManager.getInstance(getContext()).sendBroadcast(intent);                        
 523                  }                                                                                                 
 524              } break;                                                                                              
 525              case "http": {                                                                                        
 526                  Prefs devicePrefs = new Prefs(GBApplication.getDeviceSpecificSharedPrefs(gbDevice.getAddress())); 
 527                  String _id=null;                                                                                  
 528                  try {                                                                                             
 529                      _id = json.getString("id");                                                                   
 530                  } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                       
 531                  }                                                                                                 
 532                  final String id = _id;                                                                            
 533                                                                                                                    
 534                                                                                                                    
 535                  if (BuildConfig.INTERNET_ACCESS && devicePrefs.getBoolean(PREF_DEVICE_INTERNET_ACCESS, false)) {  
 536                      RequestQueue queue = Volley.newRequestQueue(getContext());                                    
 537                      String url = json.getString("url");                                                           
 538                                                                                                                    
 539                      String _xmlPath = "";                                                                         
 540                      try {                                                                                         
 541                          _xmlPath = json.getString("xpath");                                                       
 542                      } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                   
 543                      }                                                                                             
 544                      final String xmlPath = _xmlPath;                                                              
 545                      // Request a string response from the provided URL.                                           
 546                      StringRequest stringRequest = new StringRequest(Request.Method.GET, url,                      
 547                              new Response.Listener<String>() {                                                     
 548                                  @Override                                                                         
 549                                  public void onResponse(String response) {                                         
 550                                      JSONObject o = new JSONObject();                                              
 551                                      if (xmlPath.length() != 0) {                                                  
 552                                          try {                                                                     
 553                                              InputSource inputXML = new InputSource(new StringReader(response));   
 554                                              XPath xPath = XPathFactory.newInstance().newXPath();                  
 555                                              response = xPath.evaluate(xmlPath, inputXML);                         
 556                                          } catch (Exception error) {                                               
 557                                              uartTxJSONError("http", error.toString(),id);                         
 558                                              return;                                                               
 559                                          }                                                                         
 560                                      }                                                                             
 561                                      try {                                                                         
 562                                          o.put("t", "http");                                                       
 563                                          if( id!=null)                                                             
 564                                              o.put("id", id);                                                      
 565                                          o.put("resp", response);                                                  
 566                                      } catch (JSONException e) {                                                   
 567                                          GB.toast(getContext(), "HTTP: " + e.getLocalizedMessage(), Toast.LENGTH_LO🔵
 568                                      }                                                                             
 569                                      uartTxJSON("http", o);                                                        
 570                                  }                                                                                 
 571                              }, new Response.ErrorListener() {                                                     
 572                          @Override                                                                                 
 573                          public void onErrorResponse(VolleyError error) {                                          
 574                              JSONObject o = new JSONObject();                                                      
 575                              uartTxJSONError("http", error.toString(),id);                                         
 576                          }                                                                                         
 577                      });                                                                                           
 578                      queue.add(stringRequest);                                                                     
 579                  } else {                                                                                          
 580                      if (BuildConfig.INTERNET_ACCESS)                                                              
 581                          uartTxJSONError("http", "Internet access not enabled, check Gadgetbridge Device Settings",🔵
 582                      else                                                                                          
 583                          uartTxJSONError("http", "Internet access not enabled in this Gadgetbridge build",id);     
 584                  }                                                                                                 
 585              } break;                                                                                              
 586              case "intent": {                                                                                      
 587                  Prefs devicePrefs = new Prefs(GBApplication.getDeviceSpecificSharedPrefs(gbDevice.getAddress())); 
 588                  if (devicePrefs.getBoolean(PREF_DEVICE_INTENTS, false)) {                                         
 589                      String action = json.getString("action");                                                     
 590                      JSONObject extra = json.getJSONObject("extra");                                               
 591                      Intent in = new Intent();                                                                     
 592                      in.setAction(action);                                                                         
 593                      if (extra != null) {                                                                          
 594                          Iterator<String> iter = extra.keys();                                                     
 595                          while (iter.hasNext()) {                                                                  
 596                              String key = iter.next();                                                             
 597                              in.putExtra(key, extra.getString(key));                                               
 598                          }                                                                                         
 599                      }                                                                                             
 600                      LOG.info("Sending intent " + action);                                                         
 601                      this.getContext().getApplicationContext().sendBroadcast(in);                                  
 602                  } else {                                                                                          
 603                      uartTxJSONError("intent", "Android Intents not enabled, check Gadgetbridge Device Settings"); 
 604                  }                                                                                                 
 605              }                                                                                                     
 606              default : {                                                                                           
 607                  LOG.info("UART RX JSON packet type '"+packetType+"' not understood.");                            
 608              }                                                                                                     
 609          }                                                                                                         
 610      }                                                                                                             
 611                                                                                                                    
 612      @Override                                                                                                     
 613      public boolean onCharacteristicChanged(BluetoothGatt gatt,                                                    
 614                                             BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic) {                          
 615          if (super.onCharacteristicChanged(gatt, characteristic)) {                                                
 616              return true;                                                                                          
 617          }                                                                                                         
 618          if (BangleJSConstants.UUID_CHARACTERISTIC_NORDIC_UART_RX.equals(characteristic.getUuid())) {              
 619              byte[] chars = characteristic.getValue();                                                             
 620              // check to see if we get more data - if so, increase out MTU for sending                             
 621              if (allowHighMTU && chars.length > mtuSize)                                                           
 622                  mtuSize = chars.length;                                                                           
 623              String packetStr = new String(chars);                                                                 
 624              LOG.info("RX: " + packetStr);                                                                         
 625 +            // logging                                                                                            
 626 +            receiveHistory += packetStr;                                                                          
 627 +            if (receiveHistory.length() > MAX_RECEIVE_HISTORY_CHARS)                                              
 628 +                receiveHistory = receiveHistory.substring(receiveHistory.length() - MAX_RECEIVE_HISTORY_CHARS);   
 629 +            // split into input lines                                                                             
 630              receivedLine += packetStr;                                                                            
 631              while (receivedLine.contains("\n")) {                                                                 
 632                  int p = receivedLine.indexOf("\n");                                                               
 633                  String line =  receivedLine.substring(0,p-1);                                                     
 634                  receivedLine = receivedLine.substring(p+1);                                                       
 635                  handleUartRxLine(line);                                                                           
 636              }                                                                                                     
 637 +            // Send an intent with new data                                                                       
 638 +            Intent intent = new Intent(BangleJSDeviceSupport.BANGLEJS_COMMAND_RX);                                
 639 +            intent.putExtra("DATA", packetStr);                                                                   
 640 +            intent.putExtra("SEQ", bangleCommandSeq++);                                                           
 641 +            LocalBroadcastManager.getInstance(getContext()).sendBroadcast(intent);                                
 642          }                                                                                                         
 643          return false;                                                                                             
 644      }                                                                                                             
 645                                                                                                                    
 646                                                                                                                    
 647      void transmitTime(TransactionBuilder builder) {                                                               
 648        long ts = System.currentTimeMillis();                                                                       
 649        float tz = SimpleTimeZone.getDefault().getOffset(ts) / (1000 * 60 * 60.0f);                                 
 650        // set time                                                                                                 
 651        String cmd = "\u0010setTime("+(ts/1000)+");";                                                               
 652        // set timezone                                                                                             
 653        cmd += "E.setTimeZone("+tz+");";                                                                            
 654        // write timezone to settings                                                                               
 655        cmd += "(s=>{s&&(s.timezone="+tz+")&&require('Storage').write('setting.json',s);})(require('Storage').readJS🔵
 656        uartTx(builder, cmd+"\n");                                                                                  
 657      }                                                                                                             
 658                                                                                                                    
 659      @Override                                                                                                     
 660      public boolean useAutoConnect() {                                                                             
 661          return true;                                                                                              
 662      }                                                                                                             
 663                                                                                                                    
 664 -                                                                                                                  
 665 +    private String renderUnicodeWordAsImage(String word) {                                                        
 666 +        // check for emoji                                                                                        
 667 +        boolean hasEmoji = false;                                                                                 
 668 +        if (EmojiUtils.getAllEmojis()==null)                                                                      
 669 +            EmojiManager.initEmojiData(GBApplication.getContext());                                               
 670 +        for(Emoji emoji : EmojiUtils.getAllEmojis())                                                              
 671 +            if (word.contains(emoji.getEmoji())) hasEmoji = true;                                                 
 672 +        // if we had emoji, ensure we create 3 bit color (not 1 bit B&W)                                          
 673 +        return "\0"+bitmapToEspruinoString(textToBitmap(word), hasEmoji ? BangleJSBitmapStyle.RGB_3BPP : BangleJSB🔵
 674 +    }                                                                                                             
 675                                                                                                                    
 676      public String renderUnicodeAsImage(String txt) {                                                              
 677          if (txt==null) return null;                                                                               
 678 -        // If we're not doing conversion, pass this right back                                                    
 679 +        /* If we're not doing conversion, pass this right back (we use the EmojiConverter                         
 680 +        As we would have done if BangleJSCoordinator.supportsUnicodeEmojis had reported false */                  
 681          Prefs devicePrefs = new Prefs(GBApplication.getDeviceSpecificSharedPrefs(gbDevice.getAddress()));         
 682          if (!devicePrefs.getBoolean(PREF_BANGLEJS_TEXT_BITMAP, false))                                            
 683 -            return txt;                                                                                           
 684 -        // Otherwise split up and check each word                                                                 
 685 -        String words[] = txt.split(" ");                                                                          
 686 -        for (int i=0;i<words.length;i++) {                                                                        
 687 -            boolean isRenderable = true;                                                                          
 688 -            for (int j=0;j<words[i].length();j++) {                                                               
 689 -                char c = words[i].charAt(j);                                                                      
 690 +            return EmojiConverter.convertUnicodeEmojiToAscii(txt, GBApplication.getContext());                    
 691 +         // Otherwise split up and check each word                                                                
 692 +        String word = "", result = "";                                                                            
 693 +        boolean needsTranslate = false;                                                                           
 694 +        for (int i=0;i<txt.length();i++) {                                                                        
 695 +            char ch = txt.charAt(i);                                                                              
 696 +            if (" -_/:.,?!'\"&*()".indexOf(ch)>=0) {                                                              
 697 +                // word split                                                                                     
 698 +                if (needsTranslate) { // convert word                                                             
 699 +                    result += renderUnicodeWordAsImage(word)+ch;                                                  
 700 +                } else { // or just copy across                                                                   
 701 +                    result += word+ch;                                                                            
 702 +                }                                                                                                 
 703 +                word = "";                                                                                        
 704 +                needsTranslate = false;                                                                           
 705 +            } else {                                                                                              
 706                  // TODO: better check?                                                                            
 707 -                if (c<0 || c>255) isRenderable = false;                                                           
 708 -            }                                                                                                     
 709 -            if (!isRenderable)                                                                                    
 710 -                words[i] = "\0"+bitmapToEspruinoString(textToBitmap(words[i]));                                   
 711 -        }                                                                                                         
 712 -        return String.join(" ", words);                                                                           
 713 +                if (ch<0 || ch>255) needsTranslate = true;                                                        
 714 +                word += ch;                                                                                       
 715 +            }                                                                                                     
 716 +        }                                                                                                         
 717 +        if (needsTranslate) { // convert word                                                                     
 718 +            result += renderUnicodeWordAsImage(word);                                                             
 719 +        } else { // or just copy across                                                                           
 720 +            result += word;                                                                                       
 721 +        }                                                                                                         
 722 +        return result;                                                                                            
 723      }                                                                                                             
 724                                                                                                                    
 725      @Override                                                                                                     
 726      public void onNotification(NotificationSpec notificationSpec) {                                               
 727 +        for (int i=0;i<notificationSpec.attachedActions.size();i++) {                                             
 728 +            NotificationSpec.Action action = notificationSpec.attachedActions.get(i);                             
 729 +            if (action.type==NotificationSpec.Action.TYPE_WEARABLE_REPLY)                                         
 730 +                mNotificationReplyAction.add(notificationSpec.getId(), new Long(((long)notificationSpec.getId()<<4🔵
 731 +        }                                                                                                         
 732          try {                                                                                                     
 733              JSONObject o = new JSONObject();                                                                      
 734              o.put("t", "notify");                                                                                 
 735              o.put("id", notificationSpec.getId());                                                                
 736              o.put("src", notificationSpec.sourceName);                                                            
 737              o.put("title", renderUnicodeAsImage(notificationSpec.title));                                         
 738              o.put("subject", renderUnicodeAsImage(notificationSpec.subject));                                     
 739              o.put("body", renderUnicodeAsImage(notificationSpec.body));                                           
 740              o.put("sender", renderUnicodeAsImage(notificationSpec.sender));                                       
 741              o.put("tel", notificationSpec.phoneNumber);                                                           
 742              uartTxJSON("onNotification", o);                                                                      
 743          } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                               
 744              LOG.info("JSONException: " + e.getLocalizedMessage());                                                
 745          }                                                                                                         
 746      }                                                                                                             
 747                                                                                                                    
 748      @Override                                                                                                     
 749      public void onDeleteNotification(int id) {                                                                    
 750          try {                                                                                                     
 751              JSONObject o = new JSONObject();                                                                      
 752              o.put("t", "notify-");                                                                                
 753              o.put("id", id);                                                                                      
 754              uartTxJSON("onDeleteNotification", o);                                                                
 755          } catch (JSONException e) {

 757          }

 759                                                                                                                    
 760      @Override                                                                                                     
 761      public void onSetTime() {                                                                                     
 762          try {                                                                                                     
 763              TransactionBuilder builder = performInitialized("setTime");                                           
 764              transmitTime(builder);                                                                                
 765              builder.queue(getQueue());                                                                            
 766          } catch (Exception e) {                                                                                   
 767              GB.toast(getContext(), "Error setting time: " + e.getLocalizedMessage(), Toast.LENGTH_LONG, GB.ERROR);
 768          }                                                                                                         
 769      }                                                                                                             
 770                                                                                                                    
 771      @Override                                                                                                     
 772      public void onSetAlarms(ArrayList<? extends Alarm> alarms) {                                                  
 773          try {                                                                                                     
 774              JSONObject o = new JSONObject();                                                                      
 775              o.put("t", "alarm");                                                                                  
 776              JSONArray jsonalarms = new JSONArray();                                                               
 777              o.put("d", jsonalarms);                                                                               
 778                                                                                                                    
 779              for (Alarm alarm : alarms) {                                                                          
 780                  if (!alarm.getEnabled()) continue;                                                                
 781                  JSONObject jsonalarm = new JSONObject();                                                          
 782                  jsonalarms.put(jsonalarm);                                                                        
 783                                                                                                                    
 784                  Calendar calendar = AlarmUtils.toCalendar(alarm);                                                 
 785                                                                                                                    
 786                  jsonalarm.put("h", alarm.getHour());                                                              
 787                  jsonalarm.put("m", alarm.getMinute());                                                            
 788                  jsonalarm.put("rep", alarm.getRepetition());                                                      
 789              }                                                                                                     
 790              uartTxJSON("onSetAlarms", o);                                                                         
 791          } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                               
 792              LOG.info("JSONException: " + e.getLocalizedMessage());                                                
 793          }                                                                                                         
 794      }

 796      @Override                                                                                                     
 797      public void onSetCallState(CallSpec callSpec) {                                                               
 798          try {                                                                                                     
 799              JSONObject o = new JSONObject();                                                                      
 800              o.put("t", "call");                                                                                   
 801              String cmdName = "";                                                                                  
 802              try {                                                                                                 
 803                  Field fields[] = callSpec.getClass().getDeclaredFields();                                         
 804                  for (Field field : fields)                                                                        
 805                      if (field.getName().startsWith("CALL_") && field.getInt(callSpec) == callSpec.command)        
 806                          cmdName = field.getName().substring(5).toLowerCase();                                     
 807              } catch (IllegalAccessException e) {}                                                                 
 808              o.put("cmd", cmdName);                                                                                
 809              o.put("name", renderUnicodeAsImage(callSpec.name));                                                   
 810              o.put("number", callSpec.number);                                                                     
 811              uartTxJSON("onSetCallState", o);                                                                      
 812          } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                               
 813              LOG.info("JSONException: " + e.getLocalizedMessage());                                                
 814          }                                                                                                         
 815  }

 822      @Override                                                                                                     
 823      public void onSetMusicState(MusicStateSpec stateSpec) {                                                       
 824          try {                                                                                                     
 825              JSONObject o = new JSONObject();                                                                      
 826              o.put("t", "musicstate");                                                                             
 827              int musicState = stateSpec.state;                                                                     
 828              String[] musicStates = {"play", "pause", "stop", ""};                                                 
 829              if (musicState<0) musicState=3;                                                                       
 830              if (musicState>=musicStates.length) musicState = musicStates.length-1;                                
 831              o.put("state", musicStates[musicState]);                                                              
 832              o.put("position", stateSpec.position);                                                                
 833              o.put("shuffle", stateSpec.shuffle);                                                                  
 834              o.put("repeat", stateSpec.repeat);                                                                    
 835              uartTxJSON("onSetMusicState", o);                                                                     
 836          } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                               
 837              LOG.info("JSONException: " + e.getLocalizedMessage());                                                
 838          }                                                                                                         
 839      }

 841      @Override                                                                                                     
 842      public void onSetMusicInfo(MusicSpec musicSpec) {                                                             
 843          try {                                                                                                     
 844              JSONObject o = new JSONObject();                                                                      
 845              o.put("t", "musicinfo");                                                                              
 846              o.put("artist", renderUnicodeAsImage(musicSpec.artist));                                              
 847              o.put("album", renderUnicodeAsImage(musicSpec.album));                                                
 848              o.put("track", renderUnicodeAsImage(musicSpec.track));                                                
 849              o.put("dur", musicSpec.duration);                                                                     
 850              o.put("c", musicSpec.trackCount);                                                                     
 851              o.put("n", musicSpec.trackNr);                                                                        
 852              uartTxJSON("onSetMusicInfo", o);                                                                      
 853          } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                               
 854              LOG.info("JSONException: " + e.getLocalizedMessage());                                                
 855          }                                                                                                         
 856      }                                                                                                             
 857                                                                                                                    
 858      private void transmitActivityStatus() {                                                                       
 859          try {                                                                                                     
 860              JSONObject o = new JSONObject();                                                                      
 861              o.put("t", "act");                                                                                    
 862              o.put("hrm", realtimeHRM);                                                                            
 863              o.put("stp", realtimeStep);                                                                           
 864              o.put("int", realtimeHRMInterval);                                                                    
 865              uartTxJSON("onEnableRealtimeSteps", o);                                                               
 866          } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                               
 867              LOG.info("JSONException: " + e.getLocalizedMessage());                                                
 868          }                                                                                                         
 869      }                                                                                                             
 870                                                                                                                    
 871      @Override                                                                                                     
 872      public void onEnableRealtimeSteps(boolean enable) {                                                           
 873          if (enable == realtimeHRM) return;                                                                        
 874          realtimeStep = enable;                                                                                    
 875          transmitActivityStatus();                                                                                 
 876      }

1017      @Override                                                                                                     
1018      public void onSendWeather(WeatherSpec weatherSpec) {

1025              o.put("txt", weatherSpec.currentCondition);                                                           
1026              o.put("wind", weatherSpec.windSpeed);                                                                 
1027              o.put("wdir", weatherSpec.windDirection);
