1034                                                                                                                    
1035      public Bitmap textToBitmap(String text) {                                                                     
1036          Paint paint = new Paint(0); // Paint.ANTI_ALIAS_FLAG not wanted as 1bpp                                   
1037          paint.setTextSize(18);                                                                                    
1038          paint.setColor(0xFFFFFFFF);                                                                               
1039          paint.setTextAlign(Paint.Align.LEFT);                                                                     
1040          float baseline = -paint.ascent(); // ascent() is negative                                                 
1041          int width = (int) (paint.measureText(text) + 0.5f); // round                                              
1042          int height = (int) (baseline + paint.descent() + 0.5f);                                                   
1043          Bitmap image = Bitmap.createBitmap(width, height, Bitmap.Config.ARGB_8888);                               
1044          Canvas canvas = new Canvas(image);                                                                        
1045          canvas.drawText(text, 0, baseline, paint);                                                                
1046          return image;                                                                                             
1047      }                                                                                                             
1048                                                                                                                    
1049 +    public enum BangleJSBitmapStyle {                                                                             
1050 +        MONOCHROME,                                                                                               
1051 +        RGB_3BPP                                                                                                  
1052 +    };                                                                                                            
1053 +                                                                                                                  
1054 +    /** Used for writing single bits to an array */                                                               
1055 +    public static class BitWriter {                                                                               
1056 +        int n;                                                                                                    
1057 +        byte[] bits;                                                                                              
1058 +        int currentByte, bitIdx;                                                                                  
1059 +                                                                                                                  
1060 +        public BitWriter(byte[] array, int offset) {                                                              
1061 +            bits = array;                                                                                         
1062 +            n = offset;                                                                                           
1063 +        }                                                                                                         
1064 +                                                                                                                  
1065 +        public void push(boolean v) {                                                                             
1066 +            currentByte = (currentByte << 1) | (v?1:0);                                                           
1067 +            bitIdx++;                                                                                             
1068 +            if (bitIdx == 8) {                                                                                    
1069 +                bits[n++] = (byte)currentByte;                                                                    
1070 +                bitIdx = 0;                                                                                       
1071 +                currentByte = 0;                                                                                  
1072 +            }                                                                                                     
1073 +        }                                                                                                         
1074 +                                                                                                                  
1075 +        public void finish() {                                                                                    
1076 +            if (bitIdx > 0) bits[n++] = (byte)currentByte;                                                        
1077 +        }                                                                                                         
1078 +    }                                                                                                             
1079 +                                                                                                                  
1080      /** Convert an Android bitmap to a base64 string for use in Espruino.                                         
1081       * Currently only 1bpp, no scaling */                                                                         
1082 -    public static byte[] bitmapToEspruinoArray(Bitmap bitmap) {                                                   
1083 +    public static byte[] bitmapToEspruinoArray(Bitmap bitmap, BangleJSBitmapStyle style) {                        
1084          int width = bitmap.getWidth();                                                                            
1085          int height = bitmap.getHeight();                                                                          
1086 -        byte bmp[] = new byte[((height * width + 7) >> 3) + 3];                                                   
1087 -        int n = 0, c = 0, cn = 0;                                                                                 
1088 -        bmp[n++] = (byte)width;                                                                                   
1089 -        bmp[n++] = (byte)height;                                                                                  
1090 -        bmp[n++] = 1;                                                                                             
1091 +        int bpp = (style==BangleJSBitmapStyle.RGB_3BPP) ? 3 : 1;                                                  
1092 +        byte pixels[] = new byte[width * height];                                                                 
1093 +        final byte PIXELCOL_TRANSPARENT = -1;                                                                     
1094 +        final int ditherMatrix[] = {1*16,5*16,7*16,3*16}; // for bayer dithering                                  
1095 +        // if doing 3bpp, check image to see if it's transparent                                                  
1096 +        boolean allowTransparency = (style != BangleJSBitmapStyle.MONOCHROME);                                    
1097 +        boolean isTransparent = false;                                                                            
1098 +        byte transparentColorIndex = 0;                                                                           
1099 +        /* Work out what colour index each pixel should be and write to pixels.                                   
1100 +         Also figure out if we're transparent at all, and how often each color is used */                         
1101 +        int colUsage[] = new int[8];                                                                              
1102 +        int n = 0;                                                                                                
1103          for (int y = 0; y < height; y++) {                                                                        
1104              for (int x = 0; x < width; x++) {                                                                     
1105 -                boolean pixel = (bitmap.getPixel(x, y) & 255) > 128;                                              
1106 -                c = (c << 1) | (pixel?1:0);                                                                       
1107 -                cn++;                                                                                             
1108 -                if (cn == 8) {                                                                                    
1109 -                    bmp[n++] = (byte)c;                                                                           
1110 -                    cn = 0;                                                                                       
1111 -                    c = 0;                                                                                        
1112 -                }                                                                                                 
1113 -            }                                                                                                     
1114 -        }                                                                                                         
1115 -        if (cn > 0) bmp[n++] = (byte)c;                                                                           
1116 -        //LOG.info("BMP: " + width + "x"+height+" n "+n);                                                         
1117 -        // Convert to base64                                                                                      
1118 +                int pixel = bitmap.getPixel(x, y);                                                                
1119 +                int r = pixel & 255;                                                                              
1120 +                int g = (pixel >> 8) & 255;                                                                       
1121 +                int b = (pixel >> 16) & 255;                                                                      
1122 +                int a = (pixel >> 24) & 255;                                                                      
1123 +                boolean pixelTransparent = allowTransparency && (a < 128);                                        
1124 +                if (pixelTransparent) {                                                                           
1125 +                    isTransparent = true;                                                                         
1126 +                    r = g = b = 0;                                                                                
1127 +                }                                                                                                 
1128 +                // do dithering here                                                                              
1129 +                int ditherAmt = ditherMatrix[(x&1) + (y&1)*2];                                                    
1130 +                r += ditherAmt;                                                                                   
1131 +                g += ditherAmt;                                                                                   
1132 +                b += ditherAmt;                                                                                   
1133 +                int col = 0;                                                                                      
1134 +                if (style == BangleJSBitmapStyle.MONOCHROME)                                                      
1135 +                    col = ((r+g+b) >= 768)?1:0;                                                                   
1136 +                else if (style == BangleJSBitmapStyle.RGB_3BPP)                                                   
1137 +                    col = ((r>=256)?1:0) | ((g>=256)?2:0) | ((b>=256)?4:0);                                       
1138 +                if (!pixelTransparent) colUsage[col]++; // if not transparent, record usage                       
1139 +                // save colour, mark transparent separately                                                       
1140 +                pixels[n++] = (byte)(pixelTransparent ? PIXELCOL_TRANSPARENT : col);                              
1141 +            }                                                                                                     
1142 +        }                                                                                                         
1143 +        // if we're transparent, find the least-used color, and use that for transparency                         
1144 +        if (isTransparent) {                                                                                      
1145 +            // find least used                                                                                    
1146 +            int minColUsage = -1;                                                                                 
1147 +            for (int c=0;c<8;c++) {                                                                               
1148 +                if (minColUsage<0 || colUsage[c]<minColUsage) {                                                   
1149 +                    minColUsage = colUsage[c];                                                                    
1150 +                    transparentColorIndex = (byte)c;                                                              
1151 +                }                                                                                                 
1152 +            }                                                                                                     
1153 +            // rewrite any transparent pixels as the correct color for transparency                               
1154 +            for (n=0;n<pixels.length;n++)                                                                         
1155 +                if (pixels[n]==PIXELCOL_TRANSPARENT)                                                              
1156 +                    pixels[n] = transparentColorIndex;                                                            
1157 +        }                                                                                                         
1158 +        // Write the header                                                                                       
1159 +        int headerLen = isTransparent ? 4 : 3;                                                                    
1160 +        byte bmp[] = new byte[(((height * width * bpp) + 7) >> 3) + headerLen];                                   
1161 +        bmp[0] = (byte)width;                                                                                     
1162 +        bmp[1] = (byte)height;                                                                                    
1163 +        bmp[2] = (byte)(bpp + (isTransparent?128:0));                                                             
1164 +        if (isTransparent) bmp[3] = transparentColorIndex;                                                        
1165 +        // Now write the image out bit by bit                                                                     
1166 +        BitWriter bits = new BitWriter(bmp, headerLen);                                                           
1167 +        n = 0;                                                                                                    
1168 +        for (int y = 0; y < height; y++) {                                                                        
1169 +            for (int x = 0; x < width; x++) {                                                                     
1170 +                int pixel = pixels[n++];                                                                          
1171 +                for (int b=bpp-1;b>=0;b--)                                                                        
1172 +                    bits.push(((pixel>>b)&1) != 0);                                                               
1173 +            }                                                                                                     
1174 +        }                                                                                                         
1175          return bmp;                                                                                               
1176      }                                                                                                             
1177                                                                                                                    
1178      /** Convert an Android bitmap to a base64 string for use in Espruino.                                         
1179       * Currently only 1bpp, no scaling */                                                                         
1180 -    public static String bitmapToEspruinoString(Bitmap bitmap) {                                                  
1181 -        return new String(bitmapToEspruinoArray(bitmap), StandardCharsets.ISO_8859_1);                            
1182 +    public static String bitmapToEspruinoString(Bitmap bitmap, BangleJSBitmapStyle style) {                       
1183 +        return new String(bitmapToEspruinoArray(bitmap, style), StandardCharsets.ISO_8859_1);                     
1184      }                                                                                                             
1185                                                                                                                    
1186      /** Convert an Android bitmap to a base64 string for use in Espruino.                                         
1187       * Currently only 1bpp, no scaling */                                                                         
1188 -    public static String bitmapToEspruinoBase64(Bitmap bitmap) {                                                  
1189 -        return Base64.encodeToString(bitmapToEspruinoArray(bitmap), Base64.DEFAULT).replaceAll("\n","");          
1190 +    public static String bitmapToEspruinoBase64(Bitmap bitmap, BangleJSBitmapStyle style) {                       
1191 +        return Base64.encodeToString(bitmapToEspruinoArray(bitmap, style), Base64.DEFAULT).replaceAll("\n","");   
1192      }                                                                                                             
1193                                                                                                                    
1194      /** Convert a drawable to a bitmap, for use with bitmapToEspruino */                                          
1195      public static Bitmap drawableToBitmap(Drawable drawable) {                                                    
1196          final int maxWidth = 32;                                                                                  
1197          final int maxHeight = 32;                                                                                 
1198          /* Return bitmap directly but only if it's small enough. It could be                                      
1199          we have a bitmap but it's just too big to send direct to the bangle */                                    
1200          if (drawable instanceof BitmapDrawable) {                                                                 
1201              BitmapDrawable bitmapDrawable = (BitmapDrawable) drawable;                                            
1202              Bitmap bmp = bitmapDrawable.getBitmap();                                                              
1203              if (bmp != null && bmp.getWidth()<=maxWidth && bmp.getHeight()<=maxHeight)                            
1204                  return bmp;                                                                                       
1205          }                                                                                                         
1206          /* Otherwise render this to a bitmap ourselves.. work out size */                                         
1207          int w = maxWidth;                                                                                         
1208          int h = maxHeight;                                                                                        
1209          if (drawable.getIntrinsicWidth() > 0 && drawable.getIntrinsicHeight() > 0) {                              
1210              w = drawable.getIntrinsicWidth();                                                                     
1211              h = drawable.getIntrinsicHeight();                                                                    
1212              // don't allocate anything too big, but keep the ratio                                                
1213              if (w>maxWidth) {                                                                                     
1214                  h = h * maxWidth / w;                                                                             
1215                  w = maxWidth;                                                                                     
1216              }                                                                                                     
1217              if (h>maxHeight) {                                                                                    
1218                  w = w * maxHeight / h;                                                                            
1219                  h = maxHeight;                                                                                    
1220              }                                                                                                     
1221          }                                                                                                         
1222          /* render */                                                                                              
1223          Bitmap bitmap = Bitmap.createBitmap(w, h, Bitmap.Config.ARGB_8888); // Single color bitmap will be created🔵
1224          Canvas canvas = new Canvas(bitmap);                                                                       
1225          drawable.setBounds(0, 0, canvas.getWidth(), canvas.getHeight());                                          
1226          drawable.draw(canvas);                                                                                    
1227          return bitmap;                                                                                            
1228      }                                                                                                             
1229  }

 119  public class BangleJSDeviceSupport extends AbstractBTLEDeviceSupport {                                            
 120      private static final Logger LOG = LoggerFactory.getLogger(BangleJSDeviceSupport.class);                       
 121                                                                                                                    
 122      private BluetoothGattCharacteristic rxCharacteristic = null;                                                  
 123      private BluetoothGattCharacteristic txCharacteristic = null;                                                  
 124      private boolean allowHighMTU = false;                                                                         
 125      private int mtuSize = 20;                                                                                     
 126 -                                                                                                                  
 127 +    int bangleCommandSeq = 0; // to attempt to stop duplicate packets when sending Local Intents                  
 128 +                                                                                                                  
 129 +    /// Current line of data received from Bangle.js                                                              
 130      private String receivedLine = "";                                                                             
 131 +    /// All characters received from Bangle.js for debug purposes (limited to MAX_RECEIVE_HISTORY_CHARS). Can be d🔵
 132 +    private String receiveHistory = "";                                                                           
 133      private boolean realtimeHRM = false;                                                                          
 134      private boolean realtimeStep = false;                                                                         
 135      private int realtimeHRMInterval = 30*60;                                                                      
 136 +                                                                                                                  
 137 +    private final LimitedQueue/*Long*/ mNotificationReplyAction = new LimitedQueue(16);                           
 138 +                                                                                                                  
 139 +    /// Maximum amount of characters to store in receiveHistory                                                   
 140 +    public static final int MAX_RECEIVE_HISTORY_CHARS = 100000;

 142      // Local Intents - for app manager communication                                                              
 143      public static final String BANGLEJS_COMMAND_TX = "banglejs_command_tx";                                       
 144      public static final String BANGLEJS_COMMAND_RX = "banglejs_command_rx";                                       
 145      // Global Intents                                                                                             
 146      private static final String BANGLE_ACTION_UART_TX = "com.banglejs.uart.tx";                                   
 147                                                                                                                    
 148      public BangleJSDeviceSupport() {                                                                              
 149          super(LOG);                                                                                               
 150          addSupportedService(BangleJSConstants.UUID_SERVICE_NORDIC_UART);                                          
 151                                                                                                                    
 152          registerLocalIntents();                                                                                   
 153          registerGlobalIntents();                                                                                  
 154      }                                                                                                             
 155                                                                                                                    
 156      private void registerLocalIntents() {                                                                         
 157          IntentFilter commandFilter = new IntentFilter();                                                          
 158 +        commandFilter.addAction(GBDevice.ACTION_DEVICE_CHANGED);                                                  
 159          commandFilter.addAction(BANGLEJS_COMMAND_TX);                                                             
 160          BroadcastReceiver commandReceiver = new BroadcastReceiver() {                                             
 161              @Override                                                                                             
 162              public void onReceive(Context context, Intent intent) {                                               
 163                  switch (intent.getAction()) {                                                                     
 164                      case BANGLEJS_COMMAND_TX: {                                                                   
 165                          String data = String.valueOf(intent.getExtras().get("DATA"));                             
 166                          try {                                                                                     
 167                              TransactionBuilder builder = performInitialized("TX");                                
 168                              uartTx(builder, data);                                                                
 169                              builder.queue(getQueue());                                                            
 170                          } catch (IOException e) {                                                                 
 171                              GB.toast(getContext(), "Error in TX: " + e.getLocalizedMessage(), Toast.LENGTH_LONG, G🔵
 172                          }                                                                                         
 173                          break;                                                                                    
 174 +                    }                                                                                             
 175 +                    case GBDevice.ACTION_DEVICE_CHANGED: {                                                        
 176 +                        LOG.info("ACTION_DEVICE_CHANGED " + gbDevice.getStateString());                           
 177 +                        receiveHistory += "\n================================================\nACTION_DEVICE_CHANG🔵
 178                      }                                                                                             
 179                  }                                                                                                 
 180              }                                                                                                     
 181          };                                                                                                        
 182          LocalBroadcastManager.getInstance(GBApplication.getContext()).registerReceiver(commandReceiver, commandFil🔵
 183      }                                                                                                             
 184                                                                                                                    
 185      private void registerGlobalIntents() {                                                                        
 186          IntentFilter commandFilter = new IntentFilter();                                                          
 187          commandFilter.addAction(BANGLE_ACTION_UART_TX);                                                           
 188          BroadcastReceiver commandReceiver = new BroadcastReceiver() {                                             
 189              @Override                                                                                             
 190              public void onReceive(Context context, Intent intent) {                                               
 191                  switch (intent.getAction()) {                                                                     
 192                      case BANGLE_ACTION_UART_TX: {                                                                 
 193                          /* In Tasker:                                                                             
 194                            Action: com.banglejs.uart.tx                                                            
 195                            Cat: None                                                                               
 196                            Extra: line:Terminal.println(%avariable)                                                
 197                            Target: Broadcast Receiver                                                              
 198                                                                                                                    
 199                            Variable: Number, Configure on Import, NOT structured, Value set, Nothing Exported, NOT 🔵
 200                           */                                                                                       
 201                          Prefs devicePrefs = new Prefs(GBApplication.getDeviceSpecificSharedPrefs(gbDevice.getAddre🔵
 202                          if (!devicePrefs.getBoolean(PREF_DEVICE_INTENTS, false)) return;                          
 203                          String data = intent.getStringExtra("line");                                              
 204                          if (data==null) {                                                                         
 205                              GB.toast(getContext(), "UART TX Intent, but no 'line' supplied", Toast.LENGTH_LONG, GB🔵
 206                              return;                                                                               
 207                          }                                                                                         
 208                          if (!data.endsWith("\n")) data += "\n";                                                   
 209                          try {                                                                                     
 210                              TransactionBuilder builder = performInitialized("TX");                                
 211                              uartTx(builder, data);                                                                
 212                              builder.queue(getQueue());                                                            
 213                          } catch (IOException e) {                                                                 
 214                              GB.toast(getContext(), "Error in TX: " + e.getLocalizedMessage(), Toast.LENGTH_LONG, G🔵
 215                          }                                                                                         
 216                          break;                                                                                    
 217                      }                                                                                             
 218                  }                                                                                                 
 219              }                                                                                                     
 220          };                                                                                                        
 221          GBApplication.getContext().registerReceiver(commandReceiver, commandFilter);                              
 222      }                                                                                                             
 223                                                                                                                    
 224      @Override                                                                                                     
 225      protected TransactionBuilder initializeDevice(TransactionBuilder builder) {                                   
 226          LOG.info("Initializing");                                                                                 
 227                                                                                                                    
 228          gbDevice.setState(GBDevice.State.INITIALIZING);                                                           
 229          gbDevice.sendDeviceUpdateIntent(getContext());                                                            
 230          gbDevice.setBatteryThresholdPercent((short) 30);                                                          
 231                                                                                                                    
 232          rxCharacteristic = getCharacteristic(BangleJSConstants.UUID_CHARACTERISTIC_NORDIC_UART_RX);               
 233          txCharacteristic = getCharacteristic(BangleJSConstants.UUID_CHARACTERISTIC_NORDIC_UART_TX);               
 234          builder.setGattCallback(this);                                                                            
 235          builder.notify(rxCharacteristic, true);                                                                   
 236                                                                                                                    
 237          Prefs devicePrefs = new Prefs(GBApplication.getDeviceSpecificSharedPrefs(gbDevice.getAddress()));         
 238          allowHighMTU = devicePrefs.getBoolean(PREF_ALLOW_HIGH_MTU, false);                                        
 239                                                                                                                    
 240          uartTx(builder, " \u0003"); // clear active line                                                          
 241                                                                                                                    
 242          Prefs prefs = GBApplication.getPrefs();                                                                   
 243          if (prefs.getBoolean("datetime_synconconnect", true))                                                     
 244            transmitTime(builder);                                                                                  
 245          //sendSettings(builder);                                                                                  
 246                                                                                                                    
 247          // get version                                                                                            
 248                                                                                                                    
 249          gbDevice.setState(GBDevice.State.INITIALIZED);                                                            
 250          gbDevice.sendDeviceUpdateIntent(getContext());                                                            
 251                                                                                                                    
 252          getDevice().setFirmwareVersion("N/A");                                                                    
 253          getDevice().setFirmwareVersion2("N/A");                                                                   
 254                                                                                                                    
 255          LOG.info("Initialization Done");                                                                          
 256                                                                                                                    
 257          return builder;                                                                                           
 258      }                                                                                                             
 259                                                                                                                    
 260      /// Write a string of data, and chunk it up                                                                   
 261      private void uartTx(TransactionBuilder builder, String str) {                                                 

 262          LOG.info("UART TX: " + str);                                                                              
 263          byte[] bytes;                                                                                             
 264          bytes = str.getBytes(StandardCharsets.ISO_8859_1);                                                        
 265          // FIXME: somehow this is still giving us UTF8 data when we put images in strings. Maybe JSON.stringify is🔵
 266          for (int i=0;i<bytes.length;i+=mtuSize) {                                                                 
 267              int l = bytes.length-i;                                                                               
 268              if (l>mtuSize) l=mtuSize;                                                                             
 269              byte[] packet = new byte[l];                                                                          
 270              System.arraycopy(bytes, i, packet, 0, l);                                                             
 271              builder.write(txCharacteristic, packet);                                                              
 272          }                                                                                                         
 273      }                                                                                                             
 274                                                                                                                    
 275                                                                                                                    
 276      /// Write a string of data, and chunk it up                                                                   























































 277      public String jsonToString(JSONObject jsonObj) {                                                              
 278          String json = jsonObj.toString();                                                                         
 279          // toString creates '\u0000' instead of '\0'                                                              
 280          // FIXME: there have got to be nicer ways of handling this - maybe we just make our own JSON.toString (see🔵
 281          json = json.replaceAll("\\\\u000([01234567])", "\\\\$1");                                                 
 282          json = json.replaceAll("\\\\u00([0123456789abcdef][0123456789abcdef])", "\\\\x$1");                       
 283          return json;                                                                                              
 284          /*String json = "{";                                                                                      
 285          Iterator<String> iter = jsonObj.keys();                                                                   
 286          while (iter.hasNext()) {                                                                                  
 287              String key = iter.next();                                                                             
 288              Object v = jsonObj.get(key);                                                                          
 289              if (v instanceof Integer) {                                                                           
 290                  // ...                                                                                            
 291              } else // ..                                                                                          
 292              if (iter.hasNext()) json+=",";                                                                        
 293          }                                                                                                         
 294          return json+"}";*/                                                                                        







 295      }                                                                                                             
 296                                                                                                                    
 297      /// Write a JSON object of data                                                                               
 298      private void uartTxJSON(String taskName, JSONObject json) {                                                   
 299          try {                                                                                                     
 300              TransactionBuilder builder = performInitialized(taskName);                                            
 301              uartTx(builder, "\u0010GB("+jsonToString(json)+")\n");                                                
 302              builder.queue(getQueue());                                                                            
 303          } catch (IOException e) {                                                                                 
 304              GB.toast(getContext(), "Error in "+taskName+": " + e.getLocalizedMessage(), Toast.LENGTH_LONG, GB.ERRO🔵
 305          }                                                                                                         
 306      }                                                                                                             
 307                                                                                                                    
 308      /// Write JSON object of the form {t:taskName, err:message}                                                   
 309                                                                                                                    
 310      private void uartTxJSONError(String taskName, String message) {                                               
 311          uartTxJSONError(taskName,message,null);                                                                   
 312      }                                                                                                             
 313                                                                                                                    
 314      private void uartTxJSONError(String taskName, String message,String id) {                                     
 315          JSONObject o = new JSONObject();                                                                          
 316          try {                                                                                                     
 317              o.put("t", taskName);                                                                                 
 318              if( id!=null)                                                                                         
 319                  o.put("id", id);                                                                                  
 320              o.put("err", message);                                                                                
 321          } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                               
 322              GB.toast(getContext(), "uartTxJSONError: " + e.getLocalizedMessage(), Toast.LENGTH_LONG, GB.ERROR);   
 323          }                                                                                                         
 324          uartTxJSON(taskName, o);                                                                                  
 325      }                                                                                                             
 326                                                                                                                    
 327                                                                                                                    
 328                                                                                                                    
 329      private void handleUartRxLine(String line) {                                                                  
 330          LOG.info("UART RX LINE: " + line);                                                                        
 331                                                                                                                    

 332          if (">Uncaught ReferenceError: \"GB\" is not defined".equals(line))                                       
 333            GB.toast(getContext(), "Gadgetbridge plugin not installed on Bangle.js", Toast.LENGTH_LONG, GB.ERROR);  
 334          else if (line.length() > 0 && line.charAt(0)=='{') {                                                      

 335              // JSON - we hope!                                                                                    
 336              try {                                                                                                 
 337                  JSONObject json = new JSONObject(line);                                                           
 338                  LOG.info("UART RX JSON parsed successfully");                                                     
 339                  handleUartRxJSON(json);                                                                           
 340              } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                           
 341                  LOG.info("UART RX JSON parse failure: "+ e.getLocalizedMessage());                                
 342                  GB.toast(getContext(), "Malformed JSON from Bangle.js: " + e.getLocalizedMessage(), Toast.LENGTH_L🔵
 343              }                                                                                                     
 344          } else {                                                                                                  
 345              LOG.info("UART RX line started with "+(int)line.charAt(0)+" - ignoring");                             
 346          }                                                                                                         
 347      }                                                                                                             
 348                                                                                                                    
 349      private void handleUartRxJSON(JSONObject json) throws JSONException {                                         
 350          String packetType = json.getString("t");                                                                  
 351          switch (packetType) {                                                                                     
 352              case "info":                                                                                          
 353                  GB.toast(getContext(), "Bangle.js: " + json.getString("msg"), Toast.LENGTH_LONG, GB.INFO);        
 354                  break;                                                                                            
 355              case "warn":                                                                                          
 356                  GB.toast(getContext(), "Bangle.js: " + json.getString("msg"), Toast.LENGTH_LONG, GB.WARN);        
 357                  break;                                                                                            
 358              case "error":                                                                                         
 359                  GB.toast(getContext(), "Bangle.js: " + json.getString("msg"), Toast.LENGTH_LONG, GB.ERROR);       
 360                  break;                                                                                            
 361              case "ver": {                                                                                         
 362                  if (json.has("fw1"))                                                                              
 363                      getDevice().setFirmwareVersion(json.getString("fw1"));                                        
 364                  if (json.has("fw2"))                                                                              
 365                      getDevice().setFirmwareVersion2(json.getString("fw2"));                                       
 366              } break;                                                                                              
 367              case "status": {                                                                                      
 368                  GBDeviceEventBatteryInfo batteryInfo = new GBDeviceEventBatteryInfo();                            
 369                  if (json.has("bat")) {                                                                            
 370                      int b = json.getInt("bat");                                                                   
 371                      if (b < 0) b = 0;                                                                             
 372                      if (b > 100) b = 100;                                                                         
 373                      batteryInfo.level = b;                                                                        
 374                      batteryInfo.state = BatteryState.BATTERY_NORMAL;                                              
 375                  }                                                                                                 
 376                  if (json.has("chg") && json.getInt("chg") == 1) {                                                 
 377                      batteryInfo.state = BatteryState.BATTERY_CHARGING;                                            
 378                  }                                                                                                 
 379                  if (json.has("volt"))                                                                             
 380                      batteryInfo.voltage = (float) json.getDouble("volt");                                         
 381                  handleGBDeviceEvent(batteryInfo);                                                                 
 382              } break;                                                                                              
 383              case "findPhone": {                                                                                   
 384                  boolean start = json.has("n") && json.getBoolean("n");                                            
 385                  GBDeviceEventFindPhone deviceEventFindPhone = new GBDeviceEventFindPhone();                       
 386                  deviceEventFindPhone.event = start ? GBDeviceEventFindPhone.Event.START : GBDeviceEventFindPhone.E🔵
 387                  evaluateGBDeviceEvent(deviceEventFindPhone);                                                      
 388              } break;                                                                                              
 389              case "music": {                                                                                       
 390                  GBDeviceEventMusicControl deviceEventMusicControl = new GBDeviceEventMusicControl();              
 391                  deviceEventMusicControl.event = GBDeviceEventMusicControl.Event.valueOf(json.getString("n").toUppe🔵
 392                  evaluateGBDeviceEvent(deviceEventMusicControl);                                                   
 393              } break;                                                                                              
 394              case "call": {                                                                                        
 395                  GBDeviceEventCallControl deviceEventCallControl = new GBDeviceEventCallControl();                 
 396                  deviceEventCallControl.event = GBDeviceEventCallControl.Event.valueOf(json.getString("n").toUpperC🔵
 397                  evaluateGBDeviceEvent(deviceEventCallControl);                                                    
 398              } break;                                                                                              
 399              case "notify" : {                                                                                     
 400                  GBDeviceEventNotificationControl deviceEvtNotificationControl = new GBDeviceEventNotificationContr🔵
 401                  // .title appears unused                                                                          
 402                  deviceEvtNotificationControl.event = GBDeviceEventNotificationControl.Event.valueOf(json.getString🔵
 403                  if (json.has("id"))                                                                               
 404                      deviceEvtNotificationControl.handle = json.getInt("id");                                      
 405                  if (json.has("tel"))                                                                              
 406                      deviceEvtNotificationControl.phoneNumber = json.getString("tel");                             
 407                  if (json.has("msg"))                                                                              
 408                      deviceEvtNotificationControl.reply = json.getString("msg");                                   
 409 +                /* REPLY responses don't use the ID from the event (MUTE/etc seem to), but instead                
 410 +                * they use a handle that was provided in an action list on the onNotification.. event  */         
 411 +                if (deviceEvtNotificationControl.event == GBDeviceEventNotificationControl.Event.REPLY) {         
 412 +                    Long foundHandle = (Long)mNotificationReplyAction.lookup((int)deviceEvtNotificationControl.han🔵
 413 +                    if (foundHandle!=null)                                                                        
 414 +                        deviceEvtNotificationControl.handle = foundHandle;                                        
 415 +                }                                                                                                 
 416                  evaluateGBDeviceEvent(deviceEvtNotificationControl);                                              
 417              } break;                                                                                              
 418              case "act": {                                                                                         
 419                  BangleJSActivitySample sample = new BangleJSActivitySample();                                     
 420                  sample.setTimestamp((int) (GregorianCalendar.getInstance().getTimeInMillis() / 1000L));           
 421                  int hrm = 0;                                                                                      
 422                  int steps = 0;                                                                                    
 423                  if (json.has("hrm")) hrm = json.getInt("hrm");                                                    
 424                  if (json.has("stp")) steps = json.getInt("stp");                                                  
 425                  int activity = BangleJSSampleProvider.TYPE_ACTIVITY;                                              
 426                  /*if (json.has("act")) {                                                                          
 427                      String actName = "TYPE_" + json.getString("act").toUpperCase();                               
 428                      try {                                                                                         
 429                          Field f = ActivityKind.class.getField(actName);                                           
 430                          try {                                                                                     
 431                              activity = f.getInt(null);                                                            
 432                          } catch (IllegalAccessException e) {                                                      
 433                              LOG.info("JSON activity '"+actName+"' not readable");                                 
 434                          }                                                                                         
 435                      } catch (NoSuchFieldException e) {                                                            
 436                          LOG.info("JSON activity '"+actName+"' not found");                                        
 437                      }                                                                                             
 438                  }*/                                                                                               
 439                  sample.setRawKind(activity);                                                                      
 440                  sample.setHeartRate(hrm);                                                                         
 441                  sample.setSteps(steps);                                                                           
 442                  try (DBHandler dbHandler = GBApplication.acquireDB()) {                                           
 443                      Long userId = getUser(dbHandler.getDaoSession()).getId();                                     
 444                      Long deviceId = DBHelper.getDevice(getDevice(), dbHandler.getDaoSession()).getId();           
 445                      BangleJSSampleProvider provider = new BangleJSSampleProvider(getDevice(), dbHandler.getDaoSess🔵
 446                      sample.setDeviceId(deviceId);                                                                 
 447                      sample.setUserId(userId);                                                                     
 448                      provider.addGBActivitySample(sample);                                                         
 449                  } catch (Exception ex) {                                                                          
 450                      LOG.warn("Error saving activity: " + ex.getLocalizedMessage());                               
 451                  }                                                                                                 
 452                  // push realtime data                                                                             
 453                  if (realtimeHRM || realtimeStep) {                                                                
 454                      Intent intent = new Intent(DeviceService.ACTION_REALTIME_SAMPLES)                             
 455                              .putExtra(DeviceService.EXTRA_REALTIME_SAMPLE, sample);                               
 456                      LocalBroadcastManager.getInstance(getContext()).sendBroadcast(intent);                        
 457                  }                                                                                                 
 458              } break;                                                                                              
 459              case "http": {                                                                                        
 460                  Prefs devicePrefs = new Prefs(GBApplication.getDeviceSpecificSharedPrefs(gbDevice.getAddress())); 
 461                  String _id=null;                                                                                  
 462                  try {                                                                                             
 463                      _id = json.getString("id");                                                                   
 464                  } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                       
 465                  }                                                                                                 
 466                  final String id = _id;                                                                            
 467                                                                                                                    
 468                                                                                                                    
 469                  if (BuildConfig.INTERNET_ACCESS && devicePrefs.getBoolean(PREF_DEVICE_INTERNET_ACCESS, false)) {  
 470                      RequestQueue queue = Volley.newRequestQueue(getContext());                                    
 471                      String url = json.getString("url");                                                           
 472                                                                                                                    
 473                      String _xmlPath = "";                                                                         
 474                      try {                                                                                         
 475                          _xmlPath = json.getString("xpath");                                                       
 476                      } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                   
 477                      }                                                                                             
 478                      final String xmlPath = _xmlPath;                                                              
 479                      // Request a string response from the provided URL.                                           
 480                      StringRequest stringRequest = new StringRequest(Request.Method.GET, url,                      
 481                              new Response.Listener<String>() {                                                     
 482                                  @Override                                                                         
 483                                  public void onResponse(String response) {                                         
 484                                      JSONObject o = new JSONObject();                                              
 485                                      if (xmlPath.length() != 0) {                                                  
 486                                          try {                                                                     
 487                                              InputSource inputXML = new InputSource(new StringReader(response));   
 488                                              XPath xPath = XPathFactory.newInstance().newXPath();                  
 489                                              response = xPath.evaluate(xmlPath, inputXML);                         
 490                                          } catch (Exception error) {                                               
 491                                              uartTxJSONError("http", error.toString(),id);                         
 492                                              return;                                                               
 493                                          }                                                                         
 494                                      }                                                                             
 495                                      try {                                                                         
 496                                          o.put("t", "http");                                                       
 497                                          if( id!=null)                                                             
 498                                              o.put("id", id);                                                      
 499                                          o.put("resp", response);                                                  
 500                                      } catch (JSONException e) {                                                   
 501                                          GB.toast(getContext(), "HTTP: " + e.getLocalizedMessage(), Toast.LENGTH_LO🔵
 502                                      }                                                                             
 503                                      uartTxJSON("http", o);                                                        
 504                                  }                                                                                 
 505                              }, new Response.ErrorListener() {                                                     
 506                          @Override                                                                                 
 507                          public void onErrorResponse(VolleyError error) {                                          
 508                              JSONObject o = new JSONObject();                                                      
 509                              uartTxJSONError("http", error.toString(),id);                                         
 510                          }                                                                                         
 511                      });                                                                                           
 512                      queue.add(stringRequest);                                                                     
 513                  } else {                                                                                          
 514                      if (BuildConfig.INTERNET_ACCESS)                                                              
 515                          uartTxJSONError("http", "Internet access not enabled, check Gadgetbridge Device Settings",🔵
 516                      else                                                                                          
 517                          uartTxJSONError("http", "Internet access not enabled in this Gadgetbridge build",id);     
 518                  }                                                                                                 
 519              } break;                                                                                              
 520              case "intent": {                                                                                      
 521                  Prefs devicePrefs = new Prefs(GBApplication.getDeviceSpecificSharedPrefs(gbDevice.getAddress())); 
 522                  if (devicePrefs.getBoolean(PREF_DEVICE_INTENTS, false)) {                                         
 523                      String action = json.getString("action");                                                     
 524                      JSONObject extra = json.getJSONObject("extra");                                               
 525                      Intent in = new Intent();                                                                     
 526                      in.setAction(action);                                                                         
 527                      if (extra != null) {                                                                          
 528                          Iterator<String> iter = extra.keys();                                                     
 529                          while (iter.hasNext()) {                                                                  
 530                              String key = iter.next();                                                             
 531                              in.putExtra(key, extra.getString(key));                                               
 532                          }                                                                                         
 533                      }                                                                                             
 534                      LOG.info("Sending intent " + action);                                                         
 535                      this.getContext().getApplicationContext().sendBroadcast(in);                                  
 536                  } else {                                                                                          
 537                      uartTxJSONError("intent", "Android Intents not enabled, check Gadgetbridge Device Settings"); 
 538                  }                                                                                                 
 539              }                                                                                                     
 540              default : {                                                                                           
 541                  LOG.info("UART RX JSON packet type '"+packetType+"' not understood.");                            
 542              }                                                                                                     
 543          }                                                                                                         
 544      }                                                                                                             
 545                                                                                                                    
 546      @Override                                                                                                     
 547      public boolean onCharacteristicChanged(BluetoothGatt gatt,                                                    
 548                                             BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic) {                          
 549          if (super.onCharacteristicChanged(gatt, characteristic)) {                                                
 550              return true;                                                                                          
 551          }                                                                                                         
 552          if (BangleJSConstants.UUID_CHARACTERISTIC_NORDIC_UART_RX.equals(characteristic.getUuid())) {              
 553              byte[] chars = characteristic.getValue();                                                             
 554              // check to see if we get more data - if so, increase out MTU for sending                             
 555              if (allowHighMTU && chars.length > mtuSize)                                                           
 556                  mtuSize = chars.length;                                                                           
 557              String packetStr = new String(chars);                                                                 
 558              LOG.info("RX: " + packetStr);                                                                         
 559 +            // logging                                                                                            
 560 +            receiveHistory += packetStr;                                                                          
 561 +            if (receiveHistory.length() > MAX_RECEIVE_HISTORY_CHARS)                                              
 562 +                receiveHistory = receiveHistory.substring(receiveHistory.length() - MAX_RECEIVE_HISTORY_CHARS);   
 563 +            // split into input lines                                                                             
 564              receivedLine += packetStr;                                                                            
 565              while (receivedLine.contains("\n")) {                                                                 
 566                  int p = receivedLine.indexOf("\n");                                                               
 567                  String line =  receivedLine.substring(0,p-1);                                                     
 568                  receivedLine = receivedLine.substring(p+1);                                                       
 569                  handleUartRxLine(line);                                                                           
 570              }                                                                                                     





 571          }                                                                                                         
 572          return false;                                                                                             
 573      }                                                                                                             
 574                                                                                                                    
 575                                                                                                                    
 576      void transmitTime(TransactionBuilder builder) {                                                               
 577        long ts = System.currentTimeMillis();                                                                       
 578        float tz = SimpleTimeZone.getDefault().getOffset(ts) / (1000 * 60 * 60.0f);                                 
 579        // set time                                                                                                 
 580        String cmd = "\u0010setTime("+(ts/1000)+");";                                                               
 581        // set timezone                                                                                             
 582        cmd += "E.setTimeZone("+tz+");";                                                                            
 583        // write timezone to settings
