 584        cmd += "(s=>{s&&(s.timezone="+tz+")&&require('Storage').write('setting.json',s);})(require('Storage').readJS🔵
 585        uartTx(builder, cmd+"\n");                                                                                  
 586      }                                                                                                             
 587                                                                                                                    
 588      @Override                                                                                                     
 589      public boolean useAutoConnect() {                                                                             
 590          return true;                                                                                              
 591      }                                                                                                             
 592                                                                                                                    
 593 -                                                                                                                  
 594 +    private String renderUnicodeWordAsImage(String word) {                                                        
 595 +        // check for emoji                                                                                        
 596 +        boolean hasEmoji = false;                                                                                 
 597 +        if (EmojiUtils.getAllEmojis()==null)                                                                      
 598 +            EmojiManager.initEmojiData(GBApplication.getContext());                                               
 599 +        for(Emoji emoji : EmojiUtils.getAllEmojis())                                                              
 600 +            if (word.contains(emoji.getEmoji())) hasEmoji = true;                                                 
 601 +        // if we had emoji, ensure we create 3 bit color (not 1 bit B&W)                                          
 602 +        return "\0"+bitmapToEspruinoString(textToBitmap(word), hasEmoji ? BangleJSBitmapStyle.RGB_3BPP : BangleJSB🔵
 603 +    }                                                                                                             
 604                                                                                                                    
 605      public String renderUnicodeAsImage(String txt) {                                                              
 606          if (txt==null) return null;                                                                               
 607 -        // If we're not doing conversion, pass this right back                                                    
 608 +        /* If we're not doing conversion, pass this right back (we use the EmojiConverter                         
 609 +        As we would have done if BangleJSCoordinator.supportsUnicodeEmojis had reported false */                  
 610          Prefs devicePrefs = new Prefs(GBApplication.getDeviceSpecificSharedPrefs(gbDevice.getAddress()));         
 611          if (!devicePrefs.getBoolean(PREF_BANGLEJS_TEXT_BITMAP, false))                                            
 612 -            return txt;                                                                                           
 613 -        // Otherwise split up and check each word                                                                 
 614 -        String words[] = txt.split(" ");                                                                          
 615 -        for (int i=0;i<words.length;i++) {                                                                        
 616 -            boolean isRenderable = true;                                                                          
 617 -            for (int j=0;j<words[i].length();j++) {                                                               
 618 -                char c = words[i].charAt(j);                                                                      
 619 +            return EmojiConverter.convertUnicodeEmojiToAscii(txt, GBApplication.getContext());                    
 620 +         // Otherwise split up and check each word                                                                
 621 +        String word = "", result = "";                                                                            
 622 +        boolean needsTranslate = false;                                                                           
 623 +        for (int i=0;i<txt.length();i++) {                                                                        
 624 +            char ch = txt.charAt(i);                                                                              
 625 +            if (" -_/:.,?!'\"&*()".indexOf(ch)>=0) {                                                              
 626 +                // word split                                                                                     
 627 +                if (needsTranslate) { // convert word                                                             
 628 +                    result += renderUnicodeWordAsImage(word)+ch;                                                  
 629 +                } else { // or just copy across                                                                   
 630 +                    result += word+ch;                                                                            
 631 +                }                                                                                                 
 632 +                word = "";                                                                                        
 633 +                needsTranslate = false;                                                                           
 634 +            } else {                                                                                              
 635                  // TODO: better check?                                                                            
 636 -                if (c<0 || c>255) isRenderable = false;                                                           
 637 -            }                                                                                                     
 638 -            if (!isRenderable)                                                                                    
 639 -                words[i] = "\0"+bitmapToEspruinoString(textToBitmap(words[i]));                                   
 640 -        }                                                                                                         
 641 -        return String.join(" ", words);                                                                           
 642 +                if (ch<0 || ch>255) needsTranslate = true;                                                        
 643 +                word += ch;                                                                                       
 644 +            }                                                                                                     
 645 +        }                                                                                                         
 646 +        if (needsTranslate) { // convert word                                                                     
 647 +            result += renderUnicodeWordAsImage(word);                                                             
 648 +        } else { // or just copy across                                                                           
 649 +            result += word;                                                                                       
 650 +        }                                                                                                         
 651 +        return result;                                                                                            
 652      }                                                                                                             
 653                                                                                                                    
 654      @Override                                                                                                     
 655      public void onNotification(NotificationSpec notificationSpec) {                                               
 656 +        for (int i=0;i<notificationSpec.attachedActions.size();i++) {                                             
 657 +            NotificationSpec.Action action = notificationSpec.attachedActions.get(i);                             
 658 +            if (action.type==NotificationSpec.Action.TYPE_WEARABLE_REPLY)                                         
 659 +                mNotificationReplyAction.add(notificationSpec.getId(), new Long(((long)notificationSpec.getId()<<4🔵
 660 +        }                                                                                                         
 661          try {                                                                                                     
 662              JSONObject o = new JSONObject();                                                                      
 663              o.put("t", "notify");                                                                                 
 664              o.put("id", notificationSpec.getId());                                                                
 665              o.put("src", notificationSpec.sourceName);                                                            
 666              o.put("title", renderUnicodeAsImage(notificationSpec.title));                                         
 667              o.put("subject", renderUnicodeAsImage(notificationSpec.subject));                                     
 668              o.put("body", renderUnicodeAsImage(notificationSpec.body));                                           
 669              o.put("sender", renderUnicodeAsImage(notificationSpec.sender));                                       
 670              o.put("tel", notificationSpec.phoneNumber);                                                           
 671              uartTxJSON("onNotification", o);                                                                      
 672          } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                               
 673              LOG.info("JSONException: " + e.getLocalizedMessage());                                                
 674          }                                                                                                         
 675      }                                                                                                             
 676                                                                                                                    
 677      @Override                                                                                                     
 678      public void onDeleteNotification(int id) {                                                                    
 679          try {                                                                                                     
 680              JSONObject o = new JSONObject();                                                                      
 681              o.put("t", "notify-");                                                                                
 682              o.put("id", id);                                                                                      
 683              uartTxJSON("onDeleteNotification", o);                                                                
 684          } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                               
 685              LOG.info("JSONException: " + e.getLocalizedMessage());                                                
 686          }                                                                                                         
 687      }                                                                                                             
 688                                                                                                                    
 689      @Override                                                                                                     
 690      public void onSetTime() {                                                                                     
 691          try {                                                                                                     
 692              TransactionBuilder builder = performInitialized("setTime");                                           
 693              transmitTime(builder);                                                                                
 694              builder.queue(getQueue());                                                                            
 695          } catch (Exception e) {                                                                                   
 696              GB.toast(getContext(), "Error setting time: " + e.getLocalizedMessage(), Toast.LENGTH_LONG, GB.ERROR);
 697          }                                                                                                         
 698      }                                                                                                             
 699                                                                                                                    
 700      @Override                                                                                                     
 701      public void onSetAlarms(ArrayList<? extends Alarm> alarms) {                                                  
 702          try {                                                                                                     
 703              JSONObject o = new JSONObject();                                                                      
 704              o.put("t", "alarm");                                                                                  
 705              JSONArray jsonalarms = new JSONArray();                                                               
 706              o.put("d", jsonalarms);                                                                               
 707                                                                                                                    
 708              for (Alarm alarm : alarms) {                                                                          
 709                  if (!alarm.getEnabled()) continue;                                                                
 710                  JSONObject jsonalarm = new JSONObject();                                                          
 711                  jsonalarms.put(jsonalarm);                                                                        
 712                                                                                                                    
 713                  Calendar calendar = AlarmUtils.toCalendar(alarm);                                                 
 714                                                                                                                    
 715                  jsonalarm.put("h", alarm.getHour());                                                              
 716                  jsonalarm.put("m", alarm.getMinute());                                                            
 717                  jsonalarm.put("rep", alarm.getRepetition());                                                      
 718              }                                                                                                     
 719              uartTxJSON("onSetAlarms", o);                                                                         
 720          } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                               
 721              LOG.info("JSONException: " + e.getLocalizedMessage());                                                
 722          }                                                                                                         
 723      }                                                                                                             
 724                                                                                                                    
 725      @Override                                                                                                     
 726      public void onSetCallState(CallSpec callSpec) {                                                               
 727          try {                                                                                                     
 728              JSONObject o = new JSONObject();                                                                      
 729              o.put("t", "call");                                                                                   
 730              String cmdName = "";                                                                                  
 731              try {                                                                                                 
 732                  Field fields[] = callSpec.getClass().getDeclaredFields();                                         
 733                  for (Field field : fields)                                                                        
 734                      if (field.getName().startsWith("CALL_") && field.getInt(callSpec) == callSpec.command)        
 735                          cmdName = field.getName().substring(5).toLowerCase();                                     
 736              } catch (IllegalAccessException e) {}                                                                 
 737              o.put("cmd", cmdName);                                                                                
 738              o.put("name", renderUnicodeAsImage(callSpec.name));                                                   
 739              o.put("number", callSpec.number);                                                                     
 740              uartTxJSON("onSetCallState", o);                                                                      
 741          } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                               
 742              LOG.info("JSONException: " + e.getLocalizedMessage());                                                
 743          }                                                                                                         
 744  }                                                                                                                 
 745                                                                                                                    
 746      @Override                                                                                                     
 747      public void onSetCannedMessages(CannedMessagesSpec cannedMessagesSpec) {                                      
 748                                                                                                                    
 749      }                                                                                                             
 750                                                                                                                    
 751      @Override                                                                                                     
 752      public void onSetMusicState(MusicStateSpec stateSpec) {                                                       
 753          try {                                                                                                     
 754              JSONObject o = new JSONObject();                                                                      
 755              o.put("t", "musicstate");                                                                             
 756              int musicState = stateSpec.state;                                                                     
 757              String[] musicStates = {"play", "pause", "stop", ""};                                                 
 758              if (musicState<0) musicState=3;                                                                       
 759              if (musicState>=musicStates.length) musicState = musicStates.length-1;                                
 760              o.put("state", musicStates[musicState]);                                                              
 761              o.put("position", stateSpec.position);                                                                
 762              o.put("shuffle", stateSpec.shuffle);                                                                  
 763              o.put("repeat", stateSpec.repeat);                                                                    
 764              uartTxJSON("onSetMusicState", o);                                                                     
 765          } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                               
 766              LOG.info("JSONException: " + e.getLocalizedMessage());                                                
 767          }                                                                                                         
 768      }                                                                                                             
 769                                                                                                                    
 770      @Override                                                                                                     
 771      public void onSetMusicInfo(MusicSpec musicSpec) {                                                             
 772          try {                                                                                                     
 773              JSONObject o = new JSONObject();                                                                      
 774              o.put("t", "musicinfo");                                                                              
 775              o.put("artist", renderUnicodeAsImage(musicSpec.artist));                                              
 776              o.put("album", renderUnicodeAsImage(musicSpec.album));                                                
 777              o.put("track", renderUnicodeAsImage(musicSpec.track));                                                
 778              o.put("dur", musicSpec.duration);                                                                     
 779              o.put("c", musicSpec.trackCount);                                                                     
 780              o.put("n", musicSpec.trackNr);                                                                        
 781              uartTxJSON("onSetMusicInfo", o);                                                                      
 782          } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                               
 783              LOG.info("JSONException: " + e.getLocalizedMessage());                                                
 784          }                                                                                                         
 785      }                                                                                                             
 786                                                                                                                    
 787      private void transmitActivityStatus() {                                                                       
 788          try {                                                                                                     
 789              JSONObject o = new JSONObject();                                                                      
 790              o.put("t", "act");                                                                                    
 791              o.put("hrm", realtimeHRM);                                                                            
 792              o.put("stp", realtimeStep);                                                                           
 793              o.put("int", realtimeHRMInterval);                                                                    
 794              uartTxJSON("onEnableRealtimeSteps", o);                                                               
 795          } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                               
 796              LOG.info("JSONException: " + e.getLocalizedMessage());                                                
 797          }                                                                                                         
 798      }                                                                                                             
 799                                                                                                                    
 800      @Override                                                                                                     
 801      public void onEnableRealtimeSteps(boolean enable) {                                                           
 802          if (enable == realtimeHRM) return;                                                                        
 803          realtimeStep = enable;                                                                                    
 804          transmitActivityStatus();                                                                                 
 805      }

 809

 814                                                                                                                    
 815      }

 818      public void onAppStart(UUID uuid, boolean start) {                                                            
 819                                                                                                                    
 820      }                                                                                                             
 821                                                                                                                    
 822      @Override                                                                                                     
 823      public void onAppDelete(UUID uuid) {                                                                          
 824                                                                                                                    
 825      }                                                                                                             
 826                                                                                                                    
 827      @Override

 837      @Override                                                                                                     
 838      public void onFetchRecordedData(int dataTypes) {                                                              
 839 -                                                                                                                  
 840 +        if (dataTypes == RecordedDataTypes.TYPE_DEBUGLOGS) {                                                      
 841 +            File dir;                                                                                             
 842 +            try {                                                                                                 
 843 +                dir = FileUtils.getExternalFilesDir();                                                            
 844 +            } catch (IOException e) {                                                                             
 845 +                return;                                                                                           
 846 +            }                                                                                                     
 847 +            SimpleDateFormat dateFormat = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyyMMdd-HHmmss", Locale.US);                     
 848 +            String filename = "banglejs_debug_" + dateFormat.format(new Date()) + ".log";                         
 849 +            File outputFile = new File(dir, filename );                                                           
 850 +            LOG.warn("Writing log to "+outputFile.toString());                                                    
 851 +            try {                                                                                                 
 852 +                BufferedWriter writer = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(outputFile));                           
 853 +                writer.write(receiveHistory);                                                                     
 854 +                writer.close();                                                                                   
 855 +                receiveHistory = "";                                                                              
 856 +                GB.toast(getContext(), "Log written to "+filename, Toast.LENGTH_LONG, GB.INFO);                   
 857 +            } catch (IOException e) {                                                                             
 858 +                LOG.warn("Could not write to file", e);                                                           
 859 +                return;                                                                                           
 860 +            }                                                                                                     
 861 +        }                                                                                                         
 862      }

 874      @Override                                                                                                     
 875      public void onEnableRealtimeHeartRateMeasurement(boolean enable) {                                            
 876          if (enable == realtimeHRM) return;                                                                        
 877          realtimeHRM = enable;                                                                                     
 878          transmitActivityStatus();                                                                                 
 879      }

 881      @Override                                                                                                     
 882      public void onFindDevice(boolean start) {                                                                     
 883          try {                                                                                                     
 884              JSONObject o = new JSONObject();                                                                      
 885              o.put("t", "find");                                                                                   
 886              o.put("n", start);                                                                                    
 887              uartTxJSON("onFindDevice", o);                                                                        
 888          } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                               
 889              LOG.info("JSONException: " + e.getLocalizedMessage());                                                
 890          }                                                                                                         
 891      }

 900          } catch (JSONException e) {

 902          }                                                                                                         
 903      }

 946      @Override                                                                                                     
 947      public void onSendWeather(WeatherSpec weatherSpec) {                                                          
 948          try {                                                                                                     
 949              JSONObject o = new JSONObject();                                                                      
 950              o.put("t", "weather");                                                                                
 951              o.put("temp", weatherSpec.currentTemp);                                                               
 952              o.put("hum", weatherSpec.currentHumidity);                                                            
 953              o.put("code", weatherSpec.currentConditionCode);                                                      
 954              o.put("txt", weatherSpec.currentCondition);                                                           
 955              o.put("wind", weatherSpec.windSpeed);                                                                 
 956              o.put("wdir", weatherSpec.windDirection);                                                             
 957              o.put("loc", weatherSpec.location);                                                                   
 958              uartTxJSON("onSendWeather", o);                                                                       
 959          } catch (JSONException e) {                                                                               
 960              LOG.info("JSONException: " + e.getLocalizedMessage());                                                
 961          }                                                                                                         
 962      }                                                                                                             
 963                                                                                                                    
 964      public Bitmap textToBitmap(String text) {                                                                     
 965          Paint paint = new Paint(0); // Paint.ANTI_ALIAS_FLAG not wanted as 1bpp                                   
 966          paint.setTextSize(18);                                                                                    
 967          paint.setColor(0xFFFFFFFF);                                                                               
 968          paint.setTextAlign(Paint.Align.LEFT);                                                                     
 969          float baseline = -paint.ascent(); // ascent() is negative                                                 
 970          int width = (int) (paint.measureText(text) + 0.5f); // round                                              
 971          int height = (int) (baseline + paint.descent() + 0.5f);                                                   
 972          Bitmap image = Bitmap.createBitmap(width, height, Bitmap.Config.ARGB_8888);                               
 973          Canvas canvas = new Canvas(image);                                                                        
 974          canvas.drawText(text, 0, baseline, paint);                                                                
 975          return image;                                                                                             
 976      }                                                                                                             
 977                                                                                                                    
 978 +    public enum BangleJSBitmapStyle {                                                                             
 979 +        MONOCHROME,                                                                                               
 980 +        RGB_3BPP                                                                                                  
 981 +    };                                                                                                            
 982 +                                                                                                                  
 983 +    /** Used for writing single bits to an array */                                                               
 984 +    public static class BitWriter {                                                                               
 985 +        int n;                                                                                                    
 986 +        byte[] bits;                                                                                              
 987 +        int currentByte, bitIdx;                                                                                  
 988 +                                                                                                                  
 989 +        public BitWriter(byte[] array, int offset) {                                                              
 990 +            bits = array;                                                                                         
 991 +            n = offset;                                                                                           
 992 +        }                                                                                                         
 993 +                                                                                                                  
 994 +        public void push(boolean v) {                                                                             
 995 +            currentByte = (currentByte << 1) | (v?1:0);                                                           
 996 +            bitIdx++;                                                                                             
 997 +            if (bitIdx == 8) {                                                                                    
 998 +                bits[n++] = (byte)currentByte;                                                                    
 999 +                bitIdx = 0;                                                                                       
1000 +                currentByte = 0;                                                                                  
1001 +            }                                                                                                     
1002 +        }                                                                                                         
1003 +                                                                                                                  
1004 +        public void finish() {                                                                                    
1005 +            if (bitIdx > 0) bits[n++] = (byte)currentByte;                                                        
1006 +        }                                                                                                         
1007 +    }                                                                                                             
1008 +                                                                                                                  
1009      /** Convert an Android bitmap to a base64 string for use in Espruino.                                         
1010       * Currently only 1bpp, no scaling */                                                                         
1011 -    public static byte[] bitmapToEspruinoArray(Bitmap bitmap) {                                                   
1012 +    public static byte[] bitmapToEspruinoArray(Bitmap bitmap, BangleJSBitmapStyle style) {                        
1013          int width = bitmap.getWidth();                                                                            
1014          int height = bitmap.getHeight();                                                                          
1015 -        byte bmp[] = new byte[((height * width + 7) >> 3) + 3];                                                   
1016 -        int n = 0, c = 0, cn = 0;                                                                                 
1017 -        bmp[n++] = (byte)width;                                                                                   
1018 -        bmp[n++] = (byte)height;                                                                                  
1019 -        bmp[n++] = 1;                                                                                             
1020 +        int bpp = (style==BangleJSBitmapStyle.RGB_3BPP) ? 3 : 1;                                                  
1021 +        byte pixels[] = new byte[width * height];                                                                 
1022 +        final byte PIXELCOL_TRANSPARENT = -1;                                                                     
1023 +        final int ditherMatrix[] = {1*16,5*16,7*16,3*16}; // for bayer dithering                                  
1024 +        // if doing 3bpp, check image to see if it's transparent                                                  
1025 +        boolean allowTransparency = (style != BangleJSBitmapStyle.MONOCHROME);                                    
1026 +        boolean isTransparent = false;                                                                            
1027 +        byte transparentColorIndex = 0;                                                                           
1028 +        /* Work out what colour index each pixel should be and write to pixels.                                   
1029 +         Also figure out if we're transparent at all, and how often each color is used */                         
1030 +        int colUsage[] = new int[8];                                                                              
1031 +        int n = 0;                                                                                                
1032          for (int y = 0; y < height; y++) {                                                                        
1033              for (int x = 0; x < width; x++) {                                                                     
1034 -                boolean pixel = (bitmap.getPixel(x, y) & 255) > 128;                                              
1035 -                c = (c << 1) | (pixel?1:0);                                                                       
1036 -                cn++;                                                                                             
1037 -                if (cn == 8) {                                                                                    
1038 -                    bmp[n++] = (byte)c;                                                                           
1039 -                    cn = 0;                                                                                       
1040 -                    c = 0;                                                                                        
1041 -                }                                                                                                 
1042 -            }                                                                                                     
1043 -        }                                                                                                         
1044 -        if (cn > 0) bmp[n++] = (byte)c;                                                                           
1045 -        //LOG.info("BMP: " + width + "x"+height+" n "+n);                                                         
1046 -        // Convert to base64                                                                                      
1047 +                int pixel = bitmap.getPixel(x, y);                                                                
1048 +                int r = pixel & 255;                                                                              
1049 +                int g = (pixel >> 8) & 255;                                                                       
1050 +                int b = (pixel >> 16) & 255;                                                                      
1051 +                int a = (pixel >> 24) & 255;                                                                      
1052 +                boolean pixelTransparent = allowTransparency && (a < 128);                                        
1053 +                if (pixelTransparent) {                                                                           
1054 +                    isTransparent = true;                                                                         
1055 +                    r = g = b = 0;                                                                                
1056 +                }                                                                                                 
1057 +                // do dithering here                                                                              
1058 +                int ditherAmt = ditherMatrix[(x&1) + (y&1)*2];                                                    
1059 +                r += ditherAmt;                                                                                   
1060 +                g += ditherAmt;                                                                                   
1061 +                b += ditherAmt;                                                                                   
1062 +                int col = 0;                                                                                      
1063 +                if (style == BangleJSBitmapStyle.MONOCHROME)                                                      
1064 +                    col = ((r+g+b) >= 768)?1:0;                                                                   
1065 +                else if (style == BangleJSBitmapStyle.RGB_3BPP)                                                   
1066 +                    col = ((r>=256)?1:0) | ((g>=256)?2:0) | ((b>=256)?4:0);                                       
1067 +                if (!pixelTransparent) colUsage[col]++; // if not transparent, record usage                       
1068 +                // save colour, mark transparent separately                                                       
1069 +                pixels[n++] = (byte)(pixelTransparent ? PIXELCOL_TRANSPARENT : col);                              
1070 +            }                                                                                                     
1071 +        }                                                                                                         
1072 +        // if we're transparent, find the least-used color, and use that for transparency                         
1073 +        if (isTransparent) {                                                                                      
1074 +            // find least used                                                                                    
1075 +            int minColUsage = -1;                                                                                 
1076 +            for (int c=0;c<8;c++) {                                                                               
1077 +                if (minColUsage<0 || colUsage[c]<minColUsage) {                                                   
1078 +                    minColUsage = colUsage[c];                                                                    
1079 +                    transparentColorIndex = (byte)c;                                                              
1080 +                }                                                                                                 
1081 +            }                                                                                                     
1082 +            // rewrite any transparent pixels as the correct color for transparency                               
1083 +            for (n=0;n<pixels.length;n++)                                                                         
1084 +                if (pixels[n]==PIXELCOL_TRANSPARENT)                                                              
1085 +                    pixels[n] = transparentColorIndex;                                                            
1086 +        }                                                                                                         
1087 +        // Write the header                                                                                       
1088 +        int headerLen = isTransparent ? 4 : 3;                                                                    
1089 +        byte bmp[] = new byte[(((height * width * bpp) + 7) >> 3) + headerLen];                                   
1090 +        bmp[0] = (byte)width;                                                                                     
1091 +        bmp[1] = (byte)height;                                                                                    
1092 +        bmp[2] = (byte)(bpp + (isTransparent?128:0));                                                             
1093 +        if (isTransparent) bmp[3] = transparentColorIndex;                                                        
1094 +        // Now write the image out bit by bit                                                                     
1095 +        BitWriter bits = new BitWriter(bmp, headerLen);                                                           
1096 +        n = 0;                                                                                                    
1097 +        for (int y = 0; y < height; y++) {                                                                        
1098 +            for (int x = 0; x < width; x++) {                                                                     
1099 +                int pixel = pixels[n++];                                                                          
1100 +                for (int b=bpp-1;b>=0;b--)                                                                        
1101 +                    bits.push(((pixel>>b)&1) != 0);                                                               
1102 +            }                                                                                                     
1103 +        }                                                                                                         
1104          return bmp;                                                                                               
1105      }                                                                                                             
1106                                                                                                                    
1107      /** Convert an Android bitmap to a base64 string for use in Espruino.                                         
1108       * Currently only 1bpp, no scaling */                                                                         
1109 -    public static String bitmapToEspruinoString(Bitmap bitmap) {                                                  
1110 -        return new String(bitmapToEspruinoArray(bitmap), StandardCharsets.ISO_8859_1);                            
1111 +    public static String bitmapToEspruinoString(Bitmap bitmap, BangleJSBitmapStyle style) {                       
1112 +        return new String(bitmapToEspruinoArray(bitmap, style), StandardCharsets.ISO_8859_1);                     
1113      }                                                                                                             
1114                                                                                                                    
1115      /** Convert an Android bitmap to a base64 string for use in Espruino.                                         
1116       * Currently only 1bpp, no scaling */                                                                         
1117 -    public static String bitmapToEspruinoBase64(Bitmap bitmap) {                                                  
1118 -        return Base64.encodeToString(bitmapToEspruinoArray(bitmap), Base64.DEFAULT).replaceAll("\n","");          
1119 +    public static String bitmapToEspruinoBase64(Bitmap bitmap, BangleJSBitmapStyle style) {                       
1120 +        return Base64.encodeToString(bitmapToEspruinoArray(bitmap, style), Base64.DEFAULT).replaceAll("\n","");   
1121      }                                                                                                             
1122                                                                                                                    
1123      /** Convert a drawable to a bitmap, for use with bitmapToEspruino */                                          
1124      public static Bitmap drawableToBitmap(Drawable drawable) {                                                    
1125          final int maxWidth = 32;                                                                                  
1126          final int maxHeight = 32;                                                                                 
1127          /* Return bitmap directly but only if it's small enough. It could be                                      
1128          we have a bitmap but it's just too big to send direct to the bangle */                                    
1129          if (drawable instanceof BitmapDrawable) {                                                                 
1130              BitmapDrawable bitmapDrawable = (BitmapDrawable) drawable;                                            
1131              Bitmap bmp = bitmapDrawable.getBitmap();                                                              
1132              if (bmp != null && bmp.getWidth()<=maxWidth && bmp.getHeight()<=maxHeight)                            
1133                  return bmp;                                                                                       
1134          }                                                                                                         
1135          /* Otherwise render this to a bitmap ourselves.. work out size */                                         
1136          int w = maxWidth;                                                                                         
1137          int h = maxHeight;                                                                                        
1138          if (drawable.getIntrinsicWidth() > 0 && drawable.getIntrinsicHeight() > 0) {                              
1139              w = drawable.getIntrinsicWidth();                                                                     
1140              h = drawable.getIntrinsicHeight();                                                                    
1141              // don't allocate anything too big, but keep the ratio                                                
1142              if (w>maxWidth) {                                                                                     
1143                  h = h * maxWidth / w;                                                                             
1144                  w = maxWidth;                                                                                     
1145              }                                                                                                     
1146              if (h>maxHeight) {                                                                                    
1147                  w = w * maxHeight / h;                                                                            
1148                  h = maxHeight;                                                                                    
1149              }                                                                                                     
1150          }                                                                                                         
1151          /* render */                                                                                              
1152          Bitmap bitmap = Bitmap.createBitmap(w, h, Bitmap.Config.ARGB_8888); // Single color bitmap will be created🔵
1153          Canvas canvas = new Canvas(bitmap);                                                                       
1154          drawable.setBounds(0, 0, canvas.getWidth(), canvas.getHeight());                                          
1155          drawable.draw(canvas);                                                                                    
1156          return bitmap;                                                                                            
1157      }                                                                                                             
1158  }
